Update to the update:  2 days ago I wrote a review about the lack of landscape.  Yesterday an update came out that fixed it!  I should‚Äôve asked for a fix that lets me get 50% off everything I buy thru the app. (Lol)  App works great again, time to go shopping.

title: Kindle Books and movies
review: I actually love Amazon...usually. I buy a lot of things off of it. I‚Äôve had two problems though. The first is that I live in a rural area and sometimes it‚Äôs hard to return things because I don‚Äôt have a UPS store close to me. The other thing that bugs me even more is that when I try to buy a kindle book or a movie on my phone it won‚Äôt let me. Very frustrating! I‚Äôve even tried deleting their app from my phone and reinstalling it...three times. It still won‚Äôt let me. I‚Äôm hoping that by submitting a review someone will see this flaw in their system and fix the problem.

title: Won‚Äôt let you see things by low-high price
review: For some reason the app doesn‚Äôt let you see everything arranged by low to high price. It only shows a small amount of the items you searched for when you click the sort button from by relevance to by price low-high the number of options lowers significantly where you might only have a couple choices, even though when it was sorted by relevance there may have been 10,000 items. Kind of ridiculous when you can‚Äôt see everything in the order of price.

title: Signing to see orders on mobile
review: Lately the app has been making it very frustrating to track, look up, or view orders placed. It makes you sign in to see orders and then says something went wrong and you have no choice to click back onto the main page. It‚Äôs been very very frustrating and moderately infuriating. I think it‚Äôs just a glitch from the last update. Otherwise this app is the best thing created for those who don‚Äôt have access to desktops or any computer. I‚Äôd still recommend this to anyone, but that update though......

title: Implementation in iOS 11 a set back
review: Until the recent release of the iOS 11 version of the app I would‚Äôve given it five stars. Since then I was really close to giving it a one it will not allow you to sign on to check your account will not let you sign in to do purchases the only thing it‚Äôs good for us to look and see what‚Äôs out there and then I have to go on the browser version to accomplish any buys very great disappointment

title: Beyond frustrated
review: I write this in the hopes the developers see this. I am beyond frustrated that features I have used in the past and liked are constantly being changed by new updates. This goes for on the iPhone app or on my PC. In particular, I used to be able to view one of my friends wish lists by any of the following options: purchased, unpurchased or all. I can now only view by unpurchased. Can you please either put it back the way it was or advise how I can do this again.

title: Pretty annoying now
review:
I‚Äôll be searching for an item; I have all my filters in place and I‚Äôve scrolled quite a ways down. I find an item to look at, realize it‚Äôs not what I want and click to go back to the search page. Annoyingly, the whole page is reloaded and my spot and my filters are all reset. 
I know the app didn‚Äôt do this before, this new version gets really frustrating.

The app also won‚Äôt let me look at review or even the ‚Äòother people have liked this‚Äô section.

title: Update Malfunction?
review: Is it just me or did the update totally mess up the ability to listen to music while you shop? I‚Äôve been using this app for years and had no problem with anything until now. I am in the middle when it comes to the ‚Äúspeedy‚Äù delivery. Always click the prime button and get ready to checkout and then it tells me that it‚Äôs going to take a week or more. I‚Äôm overlooking that because of the world we live in now. I think IT team kinda got lazy on this update. Keep trying guys!

title: Rising costs
review: Ive been a prime member for 10 plus years. The  average annual 5% inflation isn‚Äôt what bothers me. The actual lack of following through on the same day, next day or 2 day shipping you pay for, comes with a lot of disappointment and excuses. Additionally, the cost of products I find more often than not, is no longer competitive. The only reason why people will stay with service, will be the delivery because it‚Äôs otherwise non beneficial. Target and other services are cheaper and quicker.

title: White screen
review:
This has happened for awhile, but too often when I click on a product, it‚Äôll just send me to a blank white screen. Then I have to hit the back arrow or even restart the app sometimes, and then I lose the product I was looking at. This has been happening for months now and clearly tons of other people have this issue, so I don‚Äôt understand why they haven‚Äôt fixed it yet
Also turns my phone so hot sometimes that my hand is actually uncomfortable and I have to shut the whole app down‚Ä¶also very annoying

title: Needs work!
review:
I invested in a subscription to get the full perks of the app. However. Still very mediocre experience. The wide distance radius drives me insane!!! I don‚Äôt want men from 1000 miles away able to swipe on me when I have no interest in THAT long of a long distance relationship. Ugh please turn off this feature, seriously. It‚Äôs terrible. Make it optional! What the point of preferences when Upward has already decided to show me every user it has! 
I‚Äôve also noticed men will not fill out their profiles and I think this should be mandatory. Putting ‚Äúwill fill out later‚Äù or ‚Äújust checking this out‚Äù is ridiculous.

title: Buggy, screen blanks out constantly
review:
I‚Äôm going back to the desktop browser, this is stupid for such a massive corporation to consistently have these bugs and errors. Biggest one is when I click on an item the screen goes white and I have to start over. Eff that I don‚Äôt like Bezos anyways and need to be off my phone more.

I‚Äôve done the standard fixes (close it out, restart the phone, delete and reinstall, etc.) and it doesn‚Äôt fix it. This has been through various versions but the area of focus seems to be ease of consumer use so we buy more stuff and not actually fixing problems.

title: From better to worse
review: This latest update killed off a couple great features. When looking at my order history a) it used to have all my open (non-delivered) orders at the top. Now they are buried by expected delivery date. So that LEGO Star Wars Saga game that is pre-ordered with an expected delivery at the end of 2022 can‚Äôt be found. B) items that have shipped no longer state ‚ÄúShipped‚Äù or ‚Äúout for delivery ‚Äú on the main orders list. I have to waste more time clicking each order to see if it has shipped or not.

title: Sunday Delivery Angela FIroz
review:
I received two boxes today of which one was mine and the other belonged to my neighbor on the left - I opened both packages without looking at the names on the boxes -
I have had this problem in the past the drivers are careless and don‚Äôt bother to look at the different names and addresses -I called my neighbor immediately and told her I had her package and opened it by mistake please please tell your drivers to be very careful with their deliveries not good and very upsetting to me that this continues to happen time and time again - must have better quality control and attention to detail when delivering 
Angela FIroz A loyal customer

title: ‚ö†Ô∏èread the small letters of the a agree‚ö†Ô∏è
review: It‚Äôs all good for a cupl√© of orders until drivers mess up with deliveries ! Here n there you pay the ‚Äúprime‚Äù thinking this will solve the problem ! After 5 yrs of been loyal paying my ‚Äúprime‚Äù I would expect changes that are never happening!

title: Post purchase shows blank screen
review: For about the past week or so (can‚Äôt recall if there was an update or not), when you click submit on your purchase the app shows a blank screen and you don‚Äôt get an in-app confirmation. I have to check my email to see if I‚Äôve gotten the purchase confirmation email. Once I know I have it then I know the purchase went through. I then have to go back to the app, click back, which takes me to the shopping cart/historical back until I get back to the main screen where I can see my order there as well. title: Alpha Brain
review: Only If you‚Äôre serious about taking your focus to the next level. I am constantly in meetings, and it continuously makes it hard to remain focused. To continuously train salespeople to be their best when at times, I‚Äôm not at my best. My mentality was if it isn‚Äôt illegal or if you‚Äôre not prescribed it, it dissent work. Alpha brain changed all that for me! it‚Äôs an excellent supplement, and I would recommend it highly

title: Search doesn‚Äôt work
review: With the most recent update and new iOS, search is useless.  I will write a term (for example ‚ÄúNAS drive‚Äù) and instead of showing me the results it will take me back to search with additional options.  Selecting any of these continues this never-ending loop.  Only happens on my iPad, and iPhone app is working perfectly.  However I do all of my purchasing on my iPad, hence the 1-star.

title: I used to love it
review: I‚Äôm against paying for prime now as it hardly makes a difference in delivery times. Also, they kind of screwed the USPS with prices (although I understand that USPS agreed to this contract) which runs the actual delivery personnel into the ground. 2 day or same day delivery do not exist anymore yet the price to remain a prime member does not fluctuate. Kind of shady. The tracking system for prime is pretty bad now as well as their estimations of delivery time. I‚Äôm just kind of tired of giving this company money and will look elsewhere for product and delivery means. If you wish to continue using them, by all means, enjoy getting screwed over üòÖ

title: Money stolen
review: I recently got locked out of my account just because I was having trouble loading money on, and it was viewed as ‚Äúsuspicious activity‚Äù. My account was then closed. When I said that I had a 60$ balance on the account, they then said i could not get that money back and I couldn‚Äôt even transfer it to a new account. I feel like I was just robbed but I can‚Äôt do anything about it!!!!!

title: App is great overall, with just two changes I‚Äôd make.
review:
As the title says, the app is great and makes everything so easy. 

Two things to change, the biggest being making it quicker to switch from my business account to personal and vice versa. It‚Äôs a hassle to have to go into settings to do it, would be easier if there was a quicker way. Also, I would make a feature that allows me to transfer something from my personal cart to business a one click solution. Sometimes I shop on the wrong profile and have to start over. 

The second smaller item to change is defaulting to subscribe and save. Many things it does this for I would never need to order in a subscription basis. 

If these two things were changed it would be five stars.

title: The app crashes, and no longer works.
review: I have a teen account, meaning that I need to ask permission from my parents for an order. All goes well, I have my items in my cart, I select the shipping address and payment method, and then the app just sits there. Loading. And never loads. I have tried resetting my internet, logging in and out of my account, and even deleting and reinstalling the app itself, yet nothing has worked. The app had been excellent to this point, but it just stopped working.

title: Great! Needs a few more features
review:
This app is great, helps speed up workflow, however it‚Äôs missing a few key features. First off, I cannot view archived orders from here. I feel like I should be able to do that, with authentication being TouchID or FaceID or something similar. 
The other issue I‚Äôm having with the app is that it doesn‚Äôt have a dark mode. My eyes are sensitive and I could not find a way inside or outside of the app to display it in a ‚Äúdark mode‚Äù.

title: No more
review: I hope this reaches one of the people who are responsible for updating this new app I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôm not the only person who liked it the way it was and was able to navigate just fine if you want to continue changing your app and I have to relearn how to use the app that‚Äôs not investing in your customers that‚Äôs taking time away from your customers and I don‚Äôt believe that that is good business practice nor will I be continuing to use your app because unlike many other people I don‚Äôt wanna waste my time learning something new for a third time in a row

title: Great Helper
review:
It helps me greatly, especially in this time we are all in. I was able to get the things that I need in the right time without problem.

Also, Amazon‚Äôs delivery is efficient and right on time without worries about my packages being late or what is happening. The update on the delivery‚Äôs status is quite impressive compare to others that‚Äôs either took so long or giving a bad status update at worst. All in all, I‚Äôm very satisfied.

title: Amazing!
review: The best part of the app is how user friendly it is. As a true introvert, I hate calling and talking to a human verbally. This app makes life so easy that with a few clicks you can resolve the issue easily or if it‚Äôs a little more complicated you can have a IM chat. The customer service is the BEST I‚Äôve ever had in a company. For being such a big company, the customer service is a friendly and introvert friendly. So much so that I came to the apple app to write it. I love this app!

title: Thought you were better then this
review: This is unbelievable this app is amazing but I saw this witch is just so rude so I was scrolling through when I see this a wall artist work on as an example to show how the copics work now I saw her video on this SHE DIDN'T EVEN USE COPICS I mean com on are you turning into wish or something and it‚Äôs not like she can do anything but this outrageous I mean she didn‚Äôt even use those markers false advertising and stolen artwork used without permission I really thought you weren‚Äôt gonna stoop this low I really thought you were the good guys üòî sadly disappointed

title: Lost functionality = lost business
review: Searching and browsing through products is now an excruciating process of getting inaccurate results; scrolling through excessive promoted products; and going through multiple refreshing screens each time a filter is applied.  App was more useful when you could select multiple filters and then applying them all at once.  And once you get down to relevant results, you can only see a dozen or so products before having to click to the next results screen.  Unless I know specifically what I‚Äôm product I‚Äôm looking for, I hesitate to browse for other things I might otherwise like.  App is complete garbage now.

title: This latest update fixed my app again!!!
review:
This latest update ruined my app!   The back and cart buttons have become randomly unresponsive.  I‚Äôm having to click on one of my list items at the bottom of the screen and then click back in through the cart.  Please fix this.  It‚Äôs really annoying!

Update:  I only had to deal with this for one day as this morning‚Äôs update made the app great again!   Thanks!!!

title: No way to save to Pinterest
review: Amazons app and online site on the phone don‚Äôt allow me to pin anything. When I try to pin it says no images found, or this site doesn‚Äôt allow pins. I don‚Äôt have this problem with my laptop or any other sites. This is soooo annoying because I want to be able to save things I want to buy later to my Pinterest so I can remember them. Plus it‚Äôs stupid because you lose potential sales because the app is not Pinterest comparable. I mean more pins=more product exposure=more people buying those products=amazon gets more money and I‚Äôm happy because I‚Äôve saved the product. This current situation is a lose lose. Tell Besos. This is urgent.

title: E-books prices gone!
review: The new update did away with the pricing info on e-books and it's causing me serious inconvenience. As a regular user of the mobile app, I'm aware that we cannot purchase Kindle books directly. However, I use the app to compare prices, track discounts, & add to wish list (for later purchase on the computer) since I'm on my mobile devices more frequently. I simply don't have the time or patience to click into each individual book's page to find out the price. Please bring back the pricing info, thank you!

title: Can‚Äôt flick through pictures
review:
A couple of updates ago, when you click a picture in the reviews, you could click through to all the customer pictures. Now, you have to go the the end, click on ‚Äúsee more‚Äù, to click through them all. If there aren‚Äôt enough pictures, you can only see them individually, by clicking the X and going back to the list of pictures. This is frustrating and not sure how it improves customer experience.
Other than that annoyance, the app hasn‚Äôt given me any issues.

title: No Kindle Downloads?!
review: I used to purchase, download, and read books and magazines from this app into the Kindle app on my mobile device. Now, it only lets me download a sample, but tells me I must use my computer to actually purchase and download the whole book. It tells me downloads to mobile devices are not supported. What‚Äôs up with that?! It will download a sample, so why not the whole book. It will download the whole book if I subscribe to Kindle Unlimited. This makes no sense whatsoever! I don‚Äôt use a computer anymore, only my mobile device. I need to be able to purchase electronic downloads of books and magazines from this app again. Please fix this!!!

title: Can‚Äôt click on things
review: Since using this app for my baby registry, I‚Äôve discovered tons of issues. I often can‚Äôt click on items in my registry (it doesn‚Äôt display sizes selected and I have to go to the item each time to remind myself what I‚Äôve registered for) and have to minimize it, wait a few minutes, and try again. When I do manage to click on an item on my registry, the back button takes me back to all of my lists, not my registry. Recently I can‚Äôt even access my registry at all and have to go through Safari. I try to click on my lists but it‚Äôs like there is no link. Nothing happens.

title: Can‚Äôt view my orders
review:
For some reasons, I can log in and buy stuff, but when I‚Äôm trying to view my orders to check the status, it told me to put my password again, so I punch the very same password that I use to login and it says ‚Äú incorrect password or email address‚Äù.
Seriously? I just logged in with the same email address and the same password, I don‚Äôt remember that I had a different set of account to view my orders.
So I just punch the bottom says ‚Äú.I forgot my password‚Äù so I can get a brand new password to login so I can see my stupid orders that you guys kept so secret about, and guess what? Not even the new password that I just changed seconds ago works. What the hell is gong on?

title: Autoplay review videos in the listing of items? Awful.
review: The app was awesome and easy to shop, view item listing, etc. Now some items are showing an autoplay video review when scrolling through items and it‚Äôs awful. You can‚Äôt see the item, you see someone‚Äôs home video of them modeling the item. That‚Äôs great when I go into the item‚Äôs listing and check out the reviews but not as I‚Äôm scrolling to see items available. Can‚Äôt find a way to turn it off either. If there is a way, I‚Äôd gladly change my review to 5 stars. But that one thing is actually extremely off-putting while attempting to shop.

title: Excellent service and always on time delivery!
review: The last year and a half has been an amazing experience shopping with amazing.  The selfless customer service is always diligent and helpful.  Thank you so much for everyone‚Äôs hard work especially during this difficult period in world history concerning the epidemic.   Again thank you for your service to make America happy!

title: Cancelling my Prime, not worth the money
review: Used to be a good thing, now they switch the shipping on you constantly.  Ordered the Blink outdoor cameras that had same day shipping, said same day shipping after checkout, only to be notified later that it would be next day, or possibly later than that if they notify me tomorrow that it's delayed again.  That or they change the shipping between the shopping screen  and checkout. usually from same or next day shipping to... well, who knows how long it could take.  I‚Äôve waited a week before for Prime "next day shipping" items.  Way to let your customer service slip.  üëé

title: Features not well considered
review:
So many things are easy on the website and difficult or impossible on this app. Let's take a simple one: get a PDF of an order invoice, (so it can be submitted for reimbursement, for example). The app cannot do it at all. Can't even VIEW the invoice. You can view/print/save it on the website, but not in the app. The app should be _better_ than the website, not worse.

And on a Magic Keyboard equipped iPad Pro, the bottom bar items are not reachable ‚Äî a tribute to sloppy/incomplete testing!

title: Hate the new update Sept 2021
review: I don't know how this is for phones but I hate the new update on my tablet.  I hate that it rotates my screen to portrait for no reason and I have to close and open it again to get it back to landscape.   It cuts off so I can't see what's on the right side of the screen even when I get it back in the proper orientation.  I tried to add an item to one of my lists and there was no option for it anywhere that I could find.  The bottom part of the screen is often just blank.  This update was not ready to go live.  Try again.

title: Worst Service
review: Their terms of service for PRIME are not being followed. I understand where we are at right now but refund PRIME now then till it‚Äôs over. Non of my features are being received. Also I don‚Äôt watch their channel cause they have the worst lineup. Netflix has better shows and movies. The app doesn‚Äôt work half the time and when checking out locks up and won‚Äôt show things so I have to go online to the web site and it works. This company is becoming like all the others worthless. Things show available next day if you order now and 100% of the time didn't show for 3-5 days instead.

title: Slow delivery even after paying prime membership
review:
I have been a prime member for at least 4 years but my orders always take one week to arrive. I have called in twice to ask why and the customer service always apologize and say it won‚Äôt happen again then go ahead to promise a 20 dollars refund which they never issue. Am getting really frustrated with this and am considering canceling my prime membership because it doesn‚Äôt help me at all waiting one week for items that are promised to arrive in two days if you are a prime member. 

Regards 
Martha Remme

title: Need a better way to let people know there is a change in a delivery
review: So today noticed a item was going to be delivered tomorrow is now coming in on the 20th y‚Äôall need to contact the person and let them know it has changed and if they want to cancel or keep the item(s) cause one day notice is not acceptable I can understand if it was 3 days but one day no sir thank you and have a good day

title: Lazy workers and unhelpful
review: So I ordered a package and it took weeks to get here or so it says.... when it ‚Äúarrived‚Äù they said the package was delivered in a mailbox I don‚Äôt even have. Surprise surprise it wasn‚Äôt there. So I contacted customer service and they told me they would refund me in 2-3 business days. A weeks go by and they tell me that it was sent here but I went up there as soon as they said it arrived to no package. They refused to give me a refund and insisted I go to the police if my package was stolen but it still there fault if I didn‚Äôt get my package because they will not take responsibility for their workers mishaps.

title: Wrong address constantly, but otherwise exceptional!
review:
They‚Äôve been delivering my packages to another street for years. Today, they left my package inside my neighbor‚Äôs gate. I have no way to get inside, because my neighbor doesn‚Äôt live there‚Äîit‚Äôs just a horse corral. Then, they wouldn‚Äôt even let me write a review and tell them! This app is very frustrating. 

The ordering process is fast and easy, though.

title: What happened to the app??
review: I‚Äôve been using the app for years.  Suddenly, the cart has disappeared, I can‚Äôt ‚Äúgo back‚Äù to the previous page, and when I WAS able to view my cart (I could when I first opened the app, before all navigation disappeared) I would click on items in my cart and it wouldn‚Äôt take me to the item page.  I had to power off my iPad to reset it, but after the initial look at the cart -again-, all navigation disappeared, no search button, no nothing except the check out bar.  But that didn‚Äôt work either!

title: Where did the customer reviews go??
review: I don‚Äôt understand why I can no longer access the customer reviews for certain products. Some have a practically hidden link to access them and others don‚Äôt show them at all but at the top it says (for instance) 3,673 reviews - well how do I get to them? I‚Äôm not sure when this change happened but please put the reviews back where they were for all products; they help many of us decide whether or not to buy. The rest of the app is pretty good but this particular issue is infuriating.

title: Communication Needs  Improvement
review:
When a messages is sent saying that a Subscribe and Save item is not available the message does not state what specific item has been cancelled.  That‚Äôs poor customer service and poor communication. 

I have multiple items which all come the same day of the month. When I go to my account to view the items it appears that they ALL will all be arriving. None say cancelled. It‚Äôs impossible to tell what‚Äôs been cancelled so then it‚Äôs a waiting game until my delivery day. This is just poor communication.  

Put the item name in the dang email! Communicate clearly for goodness sake.

title: Please fix your auto-correct
review:
Please review and fix your auto-correct software. It is doing an infuriatingly bad job and makes it difficult to write reviews from phone. I find it choosing unintuitive entries and not allowing much room for the user to determine the correct entry. Worst auto-correct algorithms I have seen in use. I suggest better QE before rolling something like this out. 

Otherwise, five star app.

title: Don‚Äôt upgrade
review: These recent versions changed the way search results load. You only get 10 per page the. You have to load a new page. Really frustrating when trying to shop and and compare. I wish the old way was an option in settings where you just kept scrolling. Because it was a lot easier to scroll back up to a previous product.

title: problems with payment revise
review: I was trying to buy some LED lights. when u ordered them everything was perfectly fine. but then it started to ask me for a payment revise and every time i would accept it, it would change the date of my package arriving. at first it was supposed to arrive after christmas but then it asked me for a payment revise and it changed the date to the 6th of january. i didn‚Äôt think much of it, but then it asked me for a payment revise again and i accepted it and it changes the date of my package arriving to the 9th of january!

title: Drag feature no more
review: I‚Äôm beyond upset that the drag feature is not available on the APP anymore, now it‚Äôs an inconvenient heart to press in place of it. The drag feature was great I don‚Äôt know what ridiculous idea possibly have someone a reason to remove it from the app! why it‚Äôs not available to use! Is mind bottling, It was great just to drag the items I wanted, needed or considered buying at the top of my finger tips, please bring it back!

title: They stole from me
review: I once had prime membership, I cancelled on the app. I kept getting charged, contacted support and they said ‚Äúheres a refund and it has been cancelled‚Äù. Many MONTHS later i noticed I was charged $7. Contacted them again and the person said I had no membership and as soon as I said i had proof he said he saw something. Apparently I had a student account and that he would refund me for the months. Morale or the story they stole money from me for months even though I contacted them the first time to cancel. Im so angry and I hope no one goes through this. Im a college student and $7 adds up fast. This is so ridiculous, hopefully this issue was fixed the second time around.

title: No platform to find friends wishlists through app or online
review: I have no issues ordering for myself, but trying to locate wishlists for friends is impossible. I tried locating wishlists through the app and online and there is no platform to search for a friends wishlist that is easily accessible. I contacted customer service via messaging and it was requested if someone could call me to resolve the issue which I found ridiculous.

title: Problem with trade-in barcode scanner
review: Writing a review because I couldn‚Äôt find any other way to provide app feedback. When you try to use the barcode scanner to add items to your trade-in account, it won‚Äôt actually read any barcodes. You center the barcode between the arrows as instructed, but the app doesn‚Äôt register anything. It might say ‚ÄúHold steady‚Äù from time to time, but will not scan. Tried with multiple different items on my iPhone 6S. Must be a bug or something. With no option to key in a barcode, it really hurts the trade-in feature.

title: Problems with recent updates
review:
For a couple of months now I have been unable to access my orders on the app. I click on ‚Äúorders‚Äù and get a ‚Äúsorry something went wrong‚Äù error. Now, as of today (at least I discovered it today), I cannot log in to place an order. I put items in my cart while I was on my computer, then later went to buy them on the app. When it checks my face id to log me in my face is recognized but I get the same error message.

I‚Äôm not sure if this is an iphone x specific issue but it‚Äôs pretty annoying.

title: Pleasing Grandson
review: My grandson always likes to sit next to me so I‚Äôve purchased a chair he chose and let him make press the order button and he‚Äôs very pleased doing this now if only at six years of age he could have a job because I‚Äôve created a shopaholic üòÇüòÇ he definitely doesn‚Äôt need his grandmother‚Äôs habits but this chair is great and great price , Thank you for having a very good product making children happy ü§£üíØüíú

title: Not exactly the same
review: Refund policy is clear but refunds on the exact items are not.    I returned two of the same item and the information that was sent to me on the return information was different from what I returned. I would like a clearer understanding of the information is the amount of the one item different front the wrong item in the amount of refund. I think this will be helpful to the customer or to make sure that the refunds are for the exact items. The breakdown information otherwise is very helpful, unfortunately they dropped the ball on this one. Not satisfied on this order.

title: Watching video reviews uses phone speaker
review: I love shopping on this app to buy or potentially buy items when I‚Äôm not sure I should buy so I go to the reviews and for some reason when I play the video it plays thru the phone speaker and not the main speaker where I can hear it clearly same thing happens when I look at a video on the item that has images plus the video that‚Äôs where this issue happens too

title: Order history change
review:
The most annoying thing on the iPad version was the display order of order history. I shows chronologically regardless of order status.  

Until the last update, the iPhone would always prioritize undelivered items on the top of the order history. All delivered items were then chronological by order or delivery date.  

With the last update the iPhone now matches the iPad and version everything is chronological regardless of order status. This means I have to scroll though several delivered items to find the ones I am still waiting on.  The worst are preordered items that don‚Äôt ship for months after the order. 

Since I live in a rural area the majority of my shopping is online and the last update just created more hassle for me anytime I want to check the status on an item that is enroute or waiting to be shipped.

title: Order all of the things
review: Generally decent app and mostly intuitive. My complaints are for the placement of the categories. You sort of need to dig to find the Warehouse deals and Treasure Truck categories. Also, regularly drops me from the page I‚Äôm searching - doesn‚Äôt totally crash but times out and goes immediately blank (and I do have the latest app update). But it does the job and I can usually find things on the go.

title: Constant White Screen
review: Every time I get in the app, the screen just goes white. When I view an item, it goes white, which I have to go back and find the item again because it goes back to the top. I cannot search anything with the screen constantly going white. I had no idea how to report this because there‚Äôs no option to report an issue with the app. Please fix this and also have an option to report bugs, or at least easy to find.

title: Add to list gone
review: Love the app, but since about two days ago my ‚Äúadd to list‚Äù button that is usually below the ‚Äúadd to cart‚Äù block is gone! I don‚Äôt like the heart and having it automatically save to a generic wish list. I liked the option to click and ALL my lists popped up so I could EASILY CHOOSE what list I wanted it on. PLEASE fix it back! This makes it so much more cumbersome to shop through the app and honestly makes me want to delete it and be done with it all together because it‚Äôs frustrating!

title: Literally makes everything so difficult.
review: I tried ordering a couple of things from here the first thing was headphones but then I cancelled because I had got a ride to go get them from the store shortly after I log back in my account is locked for suspicious activity and now every time I try buying something it just locks any account I make and says something about suspicious activity and billing address but I‚Äôm simple person I just simply close the whole app and go to another service like Walmart where so far I haven‚Äôt had any problems. It‚Äôs disappointing considering all the hype around this company.

title: What happened?
review:
Can‚Äôt contact the app developers directly, so this will have to do. Today, I can only see about 2/3 rds of the app screen because there is a giant white window at the bottom blocking my ability to read further on products. It has one thing on it at the bottom - once you scroll & scroll - ‚Äúadd to card‚Äù.

Please fix this annoying problem. There was nothing wrong with the old screen & ordering.

title: Needs Improvements
review:
The app does its job, it allows customers to buy products on their mobile device. However, a lot of improvements could be made here. 
1. The app layout is very old school and difficult to navigate
2. No dark theme/night mode. This one‚Äôs a killer for any night owls who want to do some late night shopping 
3. There are no official order transcripts/receipts, just future and past shipments (from what I could find at least)
4. The app color scheme is a little jarring and a little ugly in my opinion, I‚Äôd much rather see different comforting shades of blue and brown instead of just a blinding white and light blue on every page 

If a few changes were made to this app, I would totally give it the 5 stars it deserves. But until some changes are made, I have to stick to the 3 star rating purely for the app‚Äôs functionality.

title: This is for APP reviews, people
review:
These reviews are for the app itself, not Amazon‚Äôs service. Your lost package has no relevance here. 

That said, this version of the app is terrible. It crashes every couple minutes and I‚Äôve been using my phone‚Äôs browser to track my packages because the app won‚Äôt load the order page.

I wanted to find out if anyone had the same issue, but I can‚Äôt, because of all the idiots that are spamming up the reviews complaining about missing packages ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

title: Frustrated
review: When I use the SmileAmazon feature they donate to a charity, so I like to shop using SmileAmazon. I prefer to use my iPad but the SmileAmazon feature is not available on it. Apparently the only way to use SmileAmazon is on my iPhone. So, I do my searching and putting in my cart using my iPad, but place the final order using my iPhone so I can get the donation to my charity. I find that to be rather poor programming.

title: Move the shopping cart back to the top
review: The recent update on iOS left me scrambling to find my shopping cart. That is just a frustrating experience. What website or app puts a shopping cart at the bottom of the page? It makes no sense. The new app color is just jarring to the eyes. Please revert to the darker color. It Kinder to the eyes. The new interface has sent me back to using the website on computer rather than the app on my phone.

title: Bring back drag to wish list
review: Love the app, but the last update must have taken away the drag and drop feature for wish lists. That was one of my favorite things about the app. It made it so easy to add things and find items on your wish lists. I liked having the wish list tray at the bottom where I could always see it and add to it easily. Please bring that feature back.

title: Could be better
review: The delivery dates could be earlier. I wasn‚Äôt here for the old version of the app but I think the present app could be better. There were a few things that were difficult to find and I dislike the fact that after you buy a product, it doesn‚Äôt tell you the price that you‚Äôve paid. Like sometimes I‚Äôll want to remember how much I‚Äôve paid for that item or to calculate the total amount I‚Äôve spent. That is one very frustrating aspect.

title: Manufacturing locations
review:
What happened to the ability to filter for products made in the USA? Or wherever the consumer is from for that matter. I am having to look this up myself through the manufacturer‚Äôs website, and at that point I might as well just order through their website. Amazons biggest asset to me is convenience, and if there was a way to filter products to where they come from again I would go back to not needing anywhere else to look.

Update: STILL CAN NOT FILTER WHERE PRODUCT IS MANUFACTURED AT. Doesn‚Äôt have to be an automatic setting, but should be something I can use as a filter if I want.

title: Sudden Update wiped my Account
review: Got an automatic update with complete overhaul of app‚Äîwhich I didn‚Äôt know I would get but I suppose that‚Äôs on me for not knowing I was allowing that‚Äîbut now everything is wiped clear from my account. My orders are all blank, my Lists are all gone..have waited 2 days hoping it would work itself out, have signed out and back in...I guess I‚Äôll delete the app and reinstall and hoping that will work. Why do a major overhaul of the app in the middle of a global pandemic when everyone is pretty dependent on ordering. Seems like a poor plan.

title: It‚Äôs a good app
review: It‚Äôs been a good app to buy stuff but lately I tried to buy 2 items and when they got here the package was empty, I called costumer service and they gave me a refund and I re-ordered the item to actually get it and I payed for a 1 day delivery and I‚Äôm disappointed of the answer I got that it is delayed and it will arrive 2 days after the expected delivery day. I don‚Äôt know why the problem if I‚Äôve been ordering quite a few things and it was fine until now. Now I had to wait 5 days to get my items (that I payed extra to get in a day).

title: Newest Update is Clunky
review:
Some recent updates to the app are quite frustrating. Who tested this??
If you try to select multiple search options it doesn‚Äôt let you at the same time. For example, if you try to search for multiple ‚Äòbrands‚Äô of a product, it brings you back to the search criteria after selecting one. If you want to select multiple, you can‚Äôt do this at the same time. Along with any other search or sort criteria. Another frustrating item - you have to click on ‚Äònext‚Äô to see additional products instead of being able to scroll down through all  items meeting your criteria. Horrible design.

title: Love it... But one annoying issue
review: I love the app and use it daily... my only issue is with the Customer QA section.  For example a product I viewed had 100+ question/answers but when I click the ‚ÄúShow All ## Answered Questions‚Äù the app only showed 12 of them.  There was no way to page through either... i verified on the my pc using a browser that the questions were spanned across linked pages.. this is very annoying.  I hope someone can look into this... Thanks!

title: Nothing works
review: I get a picture of a dog saying there is no internet while I‚Äôm online on other apps. I can‚Äôt reach customer support. It won‚Äôt let me sign in. This has been going on for 3 months. The only thing the app lets me do is write a review. I can sign in and order on a laptop but nothing and no help for the app. How does such a giant company fail so bad with their app? There‚Äôs literally no way for me to use the app, and no explanation or person I can reach.

title: About to go to 3-Stars but...
review:
App works well but I agree with previous User feedback:  

1) MOBILE PRINTING (AirPrint et. Al.) - why can‚Äôt we print Return Shipping Labels from the APP?? It makes no sense nor is it efficient to force the User experience OUT of the mobile app into a separate e-mail or browser to print a Return Shipping Label on returns. High Priority to fix plz!

2) ADS - auto play ads are NOT COOL. You are going to continue to drive DOWN ratings (& Customer Experience) at the cost of a few $$$ of revenue...App Rating will drop to 3-stars if this continues

title: Card verification issues
review: I love the app except for one thing.  I don‚Äôt want to have to verify my stupid credit card for purchases regardless of where I choose to ship it. It makes my purchases less convenient because when I‚Äôm relaxing and shopping online, I don‚Äôt want to go get my wallet and dig out my credit card info.  My Account has a password, my credit cards have protection against fraud.  Please don‚Äôt over regulate me.  Ugh!!

title: Can‚Äôt sign in on iPhone X
review: Yesterday I changed my password from my computer. Since then I have not been able to sign back in on the iPhone app. I signed out and tried multiple times to log in and couldn‚Äôt even get to a screen where I was asked to enter my username/password. I went as far as to delete and reinstall the app, but still no luck. Tested on multiple working WiFi networks and on cellular network, makes no difference. No other apps have issues, but every time I attempt to sign in, I‚Äôm greeted with a ‚ÄúSorry, something went wrong. Please try again‚Äù message. Stick to using the mobile version of the site or a full browser version.

title: Liked the old app better. THE NEW ONE HAS A FLAW!
review:
The old app had a menu at the bottom of page. The new one uses the three horizontal bars for the menu symbol which some casual users may not know.  The FLAW in the new app occurs when viewing watches.  If you click on the picture of the watch
to see a rotating view of the watch that is what was seen with the old app.  When clicking on same with the new app it takes you back to the main menu and you have to start all over.

title: Fix the app!!
review:
Literally loved this app until a few months ago. The app requires to enter password OR to use your Touch ID to either review past and recent orders, and to make purchases. As others have stated it does not work and says ‚Äúan error has occurred‚Äù. 

To make it more irritating every item I had in my ‚Äúsave for later‚Äù has completely disappeared. So I had to relocate things and just put them in my cart when I was ready to buy or having it sit in my cart until I can get to a computer. It won‚Äôt even link up and show when I go from the app to the computer either it turns out.

title: What happened to landscape view???
review:
I love this app on my iPad and have used it for years. Opened it today and it only opens in portrait view!  Very annoying.  It is very unnatural to use the iPad in portrait view.  Please fix this as soon as possible if you want people to continue shopping from their iPads!  Right now it is awkward and inefficient.

Update:  Landscape view is back!  Thank you for correcting this.  The pleasant shopping experience is back!

title: More improvements needed on costumer reviews app
review:
So far the starting page is good has easy to navigate, but it does need some love in the comment section with better flow of people personal image been shown it feel so old trying to view them wish it would be more sliding and reading review of the image that was uploaded but the user. 

Also if there can be a butting for same day pick up items that would be amazing. Yes there is prime button but that 2day shipping what if need it soon or something. But so far it‚Äôs good and I have any issues with the app.

title: Best shopping app ever!!!!
review: I have gotten so many thing off of this app and they all came undamaged and right when they said they would. I‚Äôve only needed to return a few things and it was really easy to do so. It‚Äôs great for last minute shopping or just browsing for things that look cool. They have everything from a $3.00 lego set to a $1,000 grill. Anything you‚Äôll ever need is on this app.

title: 9.21.1 Fixed Landscape Issue
review:
The app is OK, although it lacks a few features like the ability to filter reviews, view review comments, view review images and video, and a few other small things. It is at least usable to look up items to add to a wishlist for further investigation when I am back at my desktop. I‚Äôve never used it to place an order, so I can‚Äôt comment on that.

Update to original complaint review: 9.20.0 broke landscape mode on iPad, but that was fixed a few days later in 9.21.1 after a deluge of negative reviews.

title: Horrible customer service in prime
review: Disappointed in pay this supposed prime to have my delivery being in the next day and what happens I just don‚Äôt receive my product at all, every time I receive a product is late never in the estimated time, so that‚Äôs why the review and also my dissatisfaction with this service that I use to like but now doesn‚Äôt worth at all, and talk in the customer service is horrible as well they don‚Äôt even care that my product won‚Äôt arrive and saying that I have to wait more 3 days to receive come on now take care of your customer or you will lose one by one

title: Delivery & Time
review: I decided to take an early step and purchase gifts for my children for the holidays, placed the orders and got the delivery time but it took 3 days before I got the email confirmation that the order has shipped. The delivery date passed and was told that the order was running late (no big deal) 2 more days go by and still late and then finally told that the order would be arriving today. I waited all the way until 10pm and still didn‚Äôt receive anything after a whole week. Very dissatisfied and disappointed. I would rate 0 stars if I could for their delivery and scheduling, an absolutely joke.

title: Motion sickness from auto play video previews while searching products
review:
Like another reviewer pointed out, there are video previews when searching for an item. It‚Äôs really making me feel uneasy and not a very good feature to have. I hope there is a way to at least disable that because now I can‚Äôt shop on the app until it‚Äôs GONE. 

It‚Äôs also very hard to tell what a product is this way unless you gotta sit there and watch each video just to see what the heck the product is. Way easier before to just look at an image.

title: Simplicity
review:
Finally a company that cares about its customers. Listening to there feedback and problems with actual issues form within there process of service. Yes there is problems  and mistakes but they listen when you speak. Majority is spot on good product delivery on time, good quality customer service 
Thank you for putting the customer/consumer first‚Ä¶finally

title: stuff arrives broken constantly
review: Can y‚Äôall calm down on your warehouse workers? Because I‚Äôm very tired of my stuff constantly arriving broken and having to go out of my way to find a Kohls to return it to. I‚Äôd rather receive my item a week later than have to constantly return everything. I‚Äôm sure my account is flagged at this point from all of the returns. Boxes that arrived to me in a return bag that end up being empty, glass coffee carafes that are broken, plastic tubs that are broken, items that aren‚Äôt even the color I ordered. It‚Äôs ridiculous. Ease up on your workers because everything‚Äôs being sent out super sloppily.

title: Shipping
review:
Not about the app. I ordered a few items and was notified that items would arrive on Sunday and Monday. Not a problem. Got updated email they would arrive early on Friday, great. Got another email saying second package arriving on Friday also. Awesome. Nothing came on Friday. Received yet another email saying second package not showing up until Wednesday. Bummer. Got two packages on Saturday and still waiting for third. 
Doesn‚Äôt seem very organized so don‚Äôt count on packages arriving when they tell you.

title: BAD BAD BAD UPGRADE
review: I could always depend on this app to work perfect but not anymore.  If you think that your changes are for the better, then you‚Äôre mistaken. It now works like crap on the iPad and I have nothing but trouble with it. I loved that i could use this app vertically or horizontally.  Now it just changes on its own.  It does not function properly and is a real serious problem. PLEASE FIX IT BY RETURNING IT BACK TO ITS PREVIOUS LEVEL.

title: Give me my money back
review: I had a $40 gift card and I spent it on things but instead of buying them together I bought them separately so it was easier to get shipping that I was paying for they called me suspicious and said that they were locking my account for suspicious activity for 24 hours it‚Äôs almost been two full days and I have not got my account back and it won‚Äôt let me do anything about it so that‚Äôs $40 down the drain and it won‚Äôt let me create any other accounts so I need my $40 and I need my account back or least my account that I can still get the items that I bought

title: Fix this
review: I find it highly irritating that you don't let us search for what we actually want anymore. I understand you want to sell more, but some thing need to be specific in the search engine. For instance, you can show me all the little girls clothing in the world, but my daughter will not fit them. So why aggravate me to the point of just going to target & lose my business?  Also, i needed beads, i needed a certain size do why show me everything BUT what i need?  Let your search engine reflect what we actually want, THEN show me all the pretty colors of beads. Its not a real store, so its unpleasant to be forced to "browse"

title: Great app if you know how to use it.
review: This app is great has almost anything I need the one thing I will say is I wish I could get the packages quicker but it does not really matter if I‚Äôm still getting the right thing and not a piece of garbage.  I like how you can just add something to your cart then you go to the your cart and it is all there overall great app. And always remember TRUMP 2024 make America great again DEMOCRATS CHEATED.

title: Trouble ordering
review: I have been trying for over a week to place an order and the app won‚Äôt let me. I get the item in my cart and when I try to purchase it, the little wheel just spins and spins and finally stops and it is a blank page. I have been a prime customer for years and am seriously considering cancelling my subscription if this is not fixed.

title: Back Button
review: What happened to the back button when in the shopping cart page?!? I can deal with everything else like the useless filters that should be the first choice when using a cellphone, hunting around for the sign out button, and the pastel aqua green header (black was more professional). I need my back button back in the shopping cart page. Pleeease!

title: Good app overall, revise how charged are displayed
review:
The app is good overall and I like their recent design changes, much simpler navigation now. 

My only complaint is that the order history should be shown per card charge, not per item charge. So if I bought 3 items in one order they‚Äôre shown individually in the app, but my bank account shows the total order charge placed. This makes it very difficult when I‚Äôm budgeting to align charges with orders placed. Please revise how this is displayed.

title: Item color choices not available
review: I have contacted support on this issue twice and none of the solutions work. The color choices for items do not work. If you select to view a different color for an item it only shows the original color not the one you wish to see.  This only seems to be a problem on Apple devices.

title: Newer version still awful!
review: Just loaded new update. I now see reviews are hidden since my last one never showed up and some fake reviewers. The layout feels like Windows from the 80s and bar on the bottom on top of the page covering what I‚Äôm trying to read rather than layered (maybe delivered to bar space can be used on home page and remove the large ad space on top of product page).  Who is your focus group? Maybe get another focus group that spans through all different types of users. Or did you rollout our web version on mobile app? As I said before in my review that wasn‚Äôt posted, change it back please.

title: Quicker and Easier
review: I feel like using the app is quicker and easier than going on my laptop. I will often times select items for purchase move them to my cart. The app then allows me to move the items to a list by for later that I can easily find in the app. I find that on the website navigating the different lists is hard. The app is great.

title: Your new app update is horrible!
review:
You‚Äôve taken the most important part of managing your orders and account and thrown that to the bottom of the screen...like an afterthought...and given more prominence to ads and ‚Äúpromoted products‚Äù at the top. 

Way to go with putting ads over customer service and convenience. I used to love this app, now, you get 3 stars...and I‚Äôm being generous with that.

title: Keeps logging me out, no continuous scrolling
review:
Every time I use the app I have to sign in to place orders or view account info. This may be multiple times within an hour if the app is jettisoned in the background. 

Was working fine for years and then suddenly broke. Trying a reinstall to see if that helps...

And why take away continuous scrolling? It is making it harder for me to buy stuff. Is that what you want?

title: Hate the ‚Äúbuy now‚Äù feature
review:
Hate the one click ‚Äúbuy now‚Äù feature. Why is it on the item page, and why is it next to ‚Äúadd to cart‚Äù option? At most it should be an option on the ‚Äúcart‚Äù page.

Sometimes the page is redrawn while you are selecting ‚Äúadd to cart‚Äù and instead becomes a ‚Äúbuy now‚Äù that cannot be cancelled!  

A page popped-up immediately with a ‚Äúcancel‚Äù option. I selected that. The graphics indicated the selection was accepted. However the order went through anyway! Now I owe $6 in shipping (could have been worse). But now I also need to buy something else to make the order enough to qualify for free shipping!!

title: Landscape mode on iPad fixed
review: This app was pretty buggy last year, and support was useless, but finally, a few months ago it was finally fixed, and worked very well.  But recently it became stuck in portrait mode on the iPad. Now, just a few days later, it's been fixed! I have a feeling they switched development teams, since the app works perfectly now, and the response time for bugs is impressive.

title: 2 day prime is complete lie
review: I have now had 3 orders not delivered on time. One order delivered to two different locations. Called or chatted with customer service each time, each time told this won‚Äôt happen again. Well it just happened again. Your loyalty of customer service and your operations needs a ton of work. I‚Äôm about to pull my prime membership seeing how I‚Äôm paying and you aren‚Äôt delivering!!! Jet is almost 5 stars and are looking like a much better option!

title: Needs to have better wishlist management options
review:
So the app does not allow me to do all the things the website does and that is frustrating. I would suggest that you update the ability to edit your wishlist on the phone app the same way you can on your computer. For example, I can edit the order in which things are listed on the website. (Like a wishlist ranking system) I can‚Äôt do this on the app. To me...that should be a easy drag option...a given. But nope...not an option. 

Love the apps usefulness aside from that.

title: Disappointed
review: I bought something as a gift for my husband who shares the account with me. To keep it a surprise, I archived the order so that it wouldn‚Äôt appear in My Orders. Everything was fine on the computer. However when I opened this app on my phone, an image of my gift became the cover of the My Orders section on the homepage even though the order details are not seen in the order list. He uses the same app with the same account. The image is enough to give it away. I‚Äôve tried everything to change the cover but without luck. I even tried placing another order in hopes of having the image replaced. Didn‚Äôt work. Very disappointed!

title: Problem with viewing lists
review:
The app is pretty useful in general. However, when I click on my lists, I can‚Äôt click ‚ÄúView Lists‚Äù to be able to see all of them (I have a couple of different ones.) 
This has happened for a while now. I even deleted the app a couple of times and re-downloaded it. It worked for maybe one day and then after that it stopped working again. Also sometimes when I type part of the word and see the suggestion listed on the drop down, I can‚Äôt click on it.

title: Great app!!
review: I don‚Äôt understand why people are giving bad ratings on this app but I feel like it is a very useful app. I can order something on the app in one day and it comes the next. It is a great way to have an online list got any occasion that others can manage and help buy those items. My packages come sealed and packaged in well manner. I definitely recommend this app.

title: A few annoying things that need to be fixed
review:
First‚ÄîI hate hate when you are looking at an item and your finger is anywhere around the heart icon (add to shopping list) it will buzz and you have to hit back button. So, so annoying. PLEASE fix!

Also I hate that you can‚Äôt enlarge pics and info that are tiny in description. Also annoying.

title: Orders tab
review: Before, I could‚Äôve given this app 4 to 5 stars but after the lastest update, not so much. First it took me a long time to find my orders. I‚Äôm constantly checking my orders, so I want to be able to go right to it. I used to be able to click on my cart and hit orders. You have short cuts added so why on earth wouldn‚Äôt you have created one for orders? Unless I‚Äôm missing something. And can‚Äôt be the only one to feel this way. Hopefully this gets fixed in the next update

title: Downgrade?
review: I‚Äôm not sure what changes were made to the App, but I do definitely know changes happened. When on the App now, at times the screen will freeze and not allow you to do anything, or sometimes the entire screen will just disappear leaving it blank. When that happens you need to go back and restart whatever it is you were doing. And when it was a long search, looking at many items, it‚Äôs a real frustration. Half the time I just close out the App and perhaps I‚Äôll go back to it later.

title: Syringes for insulin
review:
I was buying insulin syringes for the last few years and there was never a problem.

All of the sudden they cannot be delivered to my address even if I provided my doctor address????

Satisfaction is now zero. I would give you -5 stars if I could unfortunately the lowest I can do is one.

This is how you lose customers and get a bad name, you do something for years and then of the sudden you change your policy without notification without explanation and then I posted the question why it cannot be delivered and nobody to answer. In capital letters nobody to answer!!!

If I have a choice and I will probably find one I would never purchase from you again. So much lost of trust you cost by doing things like that. I‚Äôve seen others having the same problems from New York and from New Jersey probably have some I‚Äôve seen one post. Do you want to get my trust back then send me the next year supply for free

.......Dariusz Nasiek

title: Disappointing
review: This app is very disappointing. I have ordered several items and have had bad luck with getting my products by the promised date. When order something and it is time sensitive I want it on time. If it is not time sensitive then ok. I have had this issue a few times now! They should not give a promise date if it will not arrive by that date. Be cause of this problem and the fact that they tell me that they can not cancel my item and refund my money I will be singing out of this app and discontinue using it. I will shop at a local store where I know I will get my products.

title: Latest update on iPad does not work
review: Latest update rotates iPad screen to portrait view. It can be corrected by manually rotating to portrait and back to landscape. However, the add to cart button is not visible and I cannot order. There is also a large white rectangle at the bottom of the screen which takes up most of the viewing area. iPad iOS version 14.7.1. Please fix.

title: App update issue
review: Keeps flipping to portrait mode, I always use my iPad in landscape mode, no settings control to select this an an option, when I tilt iPad to different positions it temporarily corrects but next page you navigate to it goes back to portrait mode, will need to see on other changes‚Ä¶ Delivery Drivers have always been professional and considerate, but contacting Customer Service is actually non existent when you need to pass on some detailed information on any issues

title: From Great to Greed!
review: App is no longer efficient because trying to collect too much information that can be used to coerce buyers into buying items that they didn‚Äôt open the app to purchase. Additionally, because I have 2 accounts that I use on 1 mobile phone, my actions are not predictable and therefore the app gets confused and I am not able to accomplish what I intended to. Thanks

title: A watermelon & an avocado
review: Just wanted to alert Whole Foods to a training issue - the person packing my order placed an avocado into the bag with a small-sized watermelon.  Do you think that‚Äôs a good idea?  Also, the delivery person placed the 4 bags on the sunny sidewalk in front of my front steps, instead of on the shaded front steps (which every other delivery person has done).  Not huge issues‚Ä¶ again, I just wanted to provide feedback for training purposes.

title: Passable when it works
review:
I run into instances around once a week where I need to reinstall the app to get it to open. Otherwise it crashes on opening.

However, even when it works, the app isn‚Äôt good. It‚Äôs a cheap ‚Äúcross-platform‚Äù app that suffers from every bug/glitch/lag you can think of. Buttons aren‚Äôt responsive, screens are slow, and oftentimes it simply shows the website to deal with instead of an app layout.

Use the website on a desktop if you need to do anything quickly or without headache. It‚Äôs better in every way.

title: Good app but one problem I had
review: I made an order with my mom‚Äôs card asking her permission first since I don‚Äôt have one myself and it came up to approximately $257 and I find out 3 days later when I‚Äôm supposed to get my first package that everything is on hold and I fill out everything I need to and it says I‚Äôll get a response within 24 hours, I better get a response because my mom didn‚Äôt spend all that money for no reason

title: Could not order from Whole Foods
review: On Thursday I spent hours putting in my food order and picked a delivery time for Friday morning. Instead of the delivery l got a message to put in my substitution preferences. By then there was no time for the order to be filled so l had to pick another delivery time: 2 to 4pm. I was not sure this system was working since l had not received any acknowledgement of the receipt of my order from Whole Foods. Upon checking my computer l found my cart still open and waiting fo me to place my order! Luckily l got an evening delivery time so l did get my groceries before 8pm. I will not use this app for grocery orders in future.

title: Website is better than this
review: The current version of the app in Sept 2020 is basically useless. My Account doesn‚Äôt work. The entire app is less useful than the website... so just use the webpage and you‚Äôll be so much happier. This is a mess. It‚Äôs also very difficult and sometimes impossible to share an item with someone else, to view it. Terrible.

title: Recent Update Issues
review: The app has always served its purpose well enough. However with the recent update I have began to notice that when you click into an item you loose the ability to go back. Additionally you loose the ability to even click into similar items. The only way to resume using the app it so force close it and open back up starting your search over again. Hopefully we see an update soon to resolve this issue.

title: Horrible customer service
review: If I could rate negative I would. Being charged twice for an item and having to go through the transaction multiple (5) times, they finally say... have you contacted your financial institution for a refund. I had already provided all statements and multiple conversations about this issue. Then to boot the last conversation is just left by Rep. No goodbye no resolve just gone. Worst customer service ever.

title: Worst customer service
review:
I engaged in a text chat with customer service, I believe out of a call center. He was unwilling to help me resolve my problem. I told him to forget it that I‚Äôd gotten ahold of the number for the Seattle corporate office. Now he won‚Äôt stop messaging me. As I type this I keep getting notifications. 
The issue I had comes from a terrible delivery person. Rather than drop off at my door (just got another message from their customer service person) as is my preference he likes to go to my apartments leasing office and flirt with the girls that work there. Office closed early and now I can‚Äôt get my package, which I need today, until Monday which is 2 days away.

title: No more continuous shipping page
review: Why, do I suddenly have to keep hitting next to go through pages of something that I‚Äôm looking for? I want it back to where all I have to keep doing is to keep scrolling through the items I‚Äôm looking for. What happened to the simplicity of the app, why all these changes making it more inconvenient for your shoppers?  Also, no longer saves my login even with the ‚Äòbox‚Äô checked and ‚Äòyour cart is empty‚Äô when I know it is not. Never had problems like this the last 8 years....

title: Was good... once
review:
Since the last update I've given up, deleted the app, and am back to shopping from my desktop browser.

It's a shame when a company delivers pain instead of delight. Between having to constantly log in and the new unnecessary cascading filter pages, I‚Äôm over it. 

Oh and the tertiary authentication option (email or call customer service) just loops you back to the sign in screen. Seriously did all the critical thinkers get fired over there?

title: Gets worse with every update
review: Used to be a great APP, now its more of a crAPP.  Used to be able to drag n drop to wishlists, used to be able to copy text for an easy google search on something, used to be able to display wishlist and browse at the same time, all this and much more is either gone or made more difficult.  Most aggravating is the fact that in any given sitting with this app I must enter, enter, and re-enter my password so many times its a waste of my time to use the app.  I get it...security...but asking me 15 times to enter my password for every little thing I do during 10 minutes of usage is beyond absurd.  What a joke.

title: Drag and drop feature removed :(
review: I loved the option, when browsing, to hold down on an item and drag it to your wish list. Now you have to click on the item and tap the heart which adds it to the list you last saved something too and you are unable to change the default list before saving something. This makes browsing much less enjoyable or convenient. I really liked using the app but now it‚Äôs just a pain. I hope they bring back the drag and drop feature.

title: Developers: One flaw with this app...
review:
I love the convenience of every other feature this app offers. Except for the ‚ÄúRecommendations based on your viewing history‚Äù...
If I‚Äôve bought it...I don‚Äôt want to see it or a hundred different versions of it as recommendations to buy over and over again...
Please build in a feature to select the history of items you want removed from recommendations. That will clear up my browsing and seem less like spam.
Thanks.

title: Taking money off my card
review: So I got my little brother books and flash cards. First, the mailman didn‚Äôt knock on the door when he came, and left my box outside. I got the flash cards, however my books wasn‚Äôt in the same package. It came with some cheap hair dye and a key ring.I DIDN‚ÄôT ASK FOR NO DYE AND A KEY RING. They sent me a replacement. This happened in December, and it‚Äôs January and they took money out of my account for the replacement. On top of that, they also took money out for the first 30 day. My 30 days wasn‚Äôt up yet. So all together they took about $30 out my account without asking or telling about me this.  I regret the day I sighed up with them. Don‚Äôt do it they scam people.

title: Reinstallation fixes issues
review: I had issues with the app for a long while despite it‚Äôs up to date. Issues such as it keeps saying ‚Äúloading...‚Äù when viewing account or scanning gift cards. After I deleted it and reinstalled it, it works again. I also noticed the navigation interface had changed also. So be aware that App Update doesn‚Äôt always work. You will have to manually delete the app and reinstall it. 1 star less for this glitch.

title: Amazing experience.
review: I always do very well with purchases on the platform, the design of the application is very easy to find the products I always want, all the products arrive in record time and in excellent condition, it is very nice to know that behind the whole process there are many people who make the platform grow more every day and be the best in the world.

title: Buggy on iPad, and why is it so hard to share?
review:
New update: The old issues with iPad Pro have been fixed (thank you), but for months there‚Äôs been an issue where the Magic Keyboard touchpad jumps around unpredictably when hovering over the primary nav buttons. Test this with iPad Pro people!

Old review: the iPad app rotates constantly when using (for example if you light box something or go through checkout). Share tools are still unusable on iPad - I can‚Äôt text a link to anyone. Please enable the standard share sheet on iPad. Downgrading my review to one star.

title: Gift info
review: I placed an order without adding it was a gift and a note for recipient. I tried to immediately go back and do this but wouldn‚Äôt let me.  Suggest this is added as a feature.  I ended up having to cancel entire order and starting over. This has happened before.  Although the gift option is easier than it use to be

title: Ruling the world
review: This company is missing one star because it is to good. Everybody uses this company and they need to stop but we can‚Äôt cuz it has everything, it will one day rule our world and take over our way of getting anything and everything. Also it misses one star because of the money they stack on some products almost tripling the price when they are already making so much money. They are a evil empire and Jeff bezos is really Lex Luther.

title: Delivery instructions
review: I live in a neighborhood, well let‚Äôs just say things disappear. So when you asked for instructions as to where to put it I would really like it if you would follow the instructions and put it in the back so I don‚Äôt have to worry about it disappearing all they Gotta do is read my preferences! Other than that everything is just fine‚Ä¶‚Ä¶

title: Really, really bad at helping get into account
review: I rated it a one because I‚Äôm angry that they didn‚Äôt help me and I honestly couldn‚Äôt rate it any lower. I got locked out of my account and the menu wasn‚Äôt any help at all because it only has maybe four options to choose from and they‚Äôre all dead ends pretty much, and I tried to talk to customer support but they wanted all this information like what I have in my cart and my past three orders off the top of my head, because I can‚Äôt look at my account to tell them because I‚Äôm locked out of it. Who remembers what they order off the top of their head anyway?

title: No packages and no help.
review:
I have multiple packages that say they have been delivered all on different days. I have not received any of them. I have checked the address, I have tracked the packages and I have called. Nothing is helping. Obviously the packages are being delivered to the wrong house, but I can‚Äôt seem to get a hold of an actual person to figure this out. I have called, I have filed a claim. None of that is helping. 
I have 4 items. Some say they were delivered Tuesday, Dec. 14th and others say they were delivered on Wednesday, Dec. 15th. I have not seen any of them, and there has been someone at home on both of those days.

title: I have never had an on-time delivery.
review:
Put simply, the app has never given me realistic expectations for when anything should arrive. Every single order that I have ever made has been delayed sometimes by more than a week. 

Delays in and of themselves are not really an issue ‚Äî I understand that logistics is a difficult business, especially during a pandemic. But it‚Äôs incredibly problematic when the app tells me than an item can be delivered in three days or even overnight, only to check after I‚Äôve ordered the item and see that the delivery now won‚Äôt arrive until a week later.

title: Was much better before latest upgrade
review: The last upgrade on Sept 8th has some glitches which must be fixed. When using the app on my IPad when you go from home page to another page like my account the screen goes sideways and you have to turn your iPad upside down to get it to flip back the way you were using it. Also a large blank space on the bottom half of the homepage.

title: Can‚Äôt Add to Cart
review:
App was working fine until a few days ago. Suddenly, I‚Äôm not able to add items to my cart. When I try, I get an error message that says, ‚ÄúThere Was a Problem Adding to Cart.‚Äù I‚Äôve been having to switch to the website to place orders, which isn‚Äôt ideal since I prefer to use the app.

**Update: I uninstalled and re-installed the app. It‚Äôs working fine now.**

title: Healing the Wounds of War
review: The author has provided the reader with a clear and concise account of his personal insights as to how he dealt with the impact of the Post Traumatic Stress Syndrome. No doubt, it will greatly assist others who are struggling with this serious impediment. One that unknowingly may be preventing them from being able to reach their full potential. His writing describes how psychotherapy and the love of family and friends assisted in his recovery. His personal journey is a must read.

title: Can‚Äôt leave seller feedback on app
review: I would like to be able to leave a feedback on the third party that sells the product through Amazon‚Äôs (but I want it on the app). That way other people that buy from that seller will have somewhat of a clue. Even if that doesn‚Äôt happen, I would like to be able to rate the seller so that they can either improve or have the confidence that what they are doing is correct.

title: Has UI Faults...
review: The app itself is fine...  Until you go to watch a picture/video review submitted by a customer.  Then you will lose the back button arrow at the top of the app.  Then you have to swipe up to close the app and reopen it to get it back.  But then, you have to start over on your searches or whatever you were doing before the arrow back button disappeared.  Frustrating to say the least!

title: Good but could use some help
review:
I use this almost daily, but still has some glitches. 

It is difficult to find influencers‚Äô lists that you follow. Then when you click it, the app doesn‚Äôt let you scroll down. Sometimes after many attempts to scroll it will unlock; but it definitely gets stuck very regularly. This also happens when I try to scroll down on some of my lists as well. 

It‚Äôs also difficult to clock on items on your baby registry. I tap many times before it will let me edit.

title: Wish List Doesn't display correctly on iPad
review:
Current version doesn't display wish lists correctly on the iPAD...only shows anything on the left hand side.  Former versions would allow the user to select an item on the list, then it would display the full page using the whole screen.  Now it just displays in the list on the left hand side (using only 25% of the screen).  Very difficult to read and confirm options before adding to cart.

7/6/20 After recent updates, links to answers doesn‚Äôt work. Can‚Äôt ask a question.  Link to reviews doesn‚Äôt work either.

title: Used to be great... please fix it!!
review:
Whatever updates that have been done to this has severely messed the app up. 
I used to be able to browse and switch between apps and come back to where I was browsing but now anytime I go out of the app or the screen goes black even for a few seconds the shuts down or goes to the home page. 
It‚Äôs so aggravating when Im doing a search and looking at different items and if I talk to someone and the screen goes black or if I look at a text when I come back to the app and it‚Äôs cleared everything and is now back to the home screen. üò°üò°

title: Update for customer experience
review: I find the site is great but there is ALOT of room for improvement.  For example, create  a product number once you add a product to your inventory.  Second.
