Never gets me there!!! I am so angry because this app used to be perfect!!! Please fix this bugs soon!!

title: Glitch
review: The app itself works well for the most part, however, when I go to click on the bottom right to view my orders from my magic keyboard the cursor just flies somewhere and it makes getting to the order page a challenge. I hope they can fix this issue in the next update‚Ä¶. Frustrating‚Ä¶

title: Okay
review: Yes sometimes you guys sell things that you don‚Äôt have in stock and then tell me that you can‚Äôt get it after you taking my money and have me looking forward do you have an a product when you don‚Äôt deliver this is very upsetting you should not advertise stuff that you cannot deliver

title: Issues with loading
review: The app is having loading issues. After the new update it seems there may be a vulnerability in the app allowing outsiders to access your phone. Trying to delete & re-download app has not fixed the issue. This needs to be fixed ASAP! Haven‚Äôt had any issues with app until the new updated version. Which is why I give it a 3 star.

title: Approximate Delivery Time.
review:
I wish the estimate delivery date was more precise when we look for the description of the item. Sometimes it gets confusing just because certain items qualify for Prime. 

It should be specified 
PRIME but it will deliver weeks after purchase when that‚Äôs the case.

title: Best thing on the planet
review: It‚Äôs so convenient to just look at something and you need it fast and tap on it. Buy it now and you get it just when it says it will be here. Extremely convenient because I‚Äôm very busy and don‚Äôt have time to go looking in the stores for it. Can‚Äôt live without it.

title: Product description
review: I love this app, makes shopping online easy. Idk if they took out product description, but I‚Äôm not able to find it on any items. I like having it because some company don‚Äôt put the dimension of product and I want to know the approximate size of the item. If they could bring it back that would be great.

title: Update ruined using it on my iPad
review: This is the worst update you have had!  It has ruined my user experience.  Screen is constantly rotating.  Half of the screen is now blank!  Can‚Äôt search for products.  Please fix this or I will have to go somewhere else to make purchases.  I give the update an ‚ÄúF!‚Äù

title: Convenient
review: Not always good quality but definitely cost effective. You get what you pay for. Always check the reviews on the products you‚Äôre about to purchase and check the amount of people that have purchased the item.

title: Cathy sunshine
review: I like this website. It has everything I need to buy without getting In my car and going to store to wait on lines. It‚Äôs shipped to my house I don‚Äôt have to carry packages from the store to the car and from the car into my house. It saves me a lot of time. The returns are easy too.

title: Should be 4 1/2!

title: I spend all my money on this app

title: Bug with recent update
review:
The most recent update has a bug. It no longer has the ‚Äúbuy now‚Äù button on the product pages. It only has ‚Äúadd to cart.‚Äù  I always use ‚Äúbuy now‚Äù because my cart has a ton of items that I don‚Äôt want to buy yet. 

On a related note, I love that the website finally lets us select specific items in our cart to checkout with - I‚Äôm anxious for the app to do that too.

title: New Improved Design?

title: So dogwater

title: What happened?

title: Subscribe & Save
review: Love the most recent update to subscribe and save. I like the format of seeing items and how easy it is to skip the current delivery and it automatically moves it into your next scheduled slot instead of the old method of moving it a month at a time till you got it in the time frame you needed it. Keep up the improvements üòÄ

Update says ‚Äúfixed some bugs and App improvements. I don‚Äôt know about the bugs. But the ‚Äúimprovements‚Äù diminish my shopping experience. 

Seems like changes were made to the UI and navigation for the sole purposes of change. Reminds me of when a grocery store manager changes the location of items in the grocery store. 

If I have to start over locating things, I might as well shop at a store I‚Äôm equally confused in.

Before they had a list when you would search for something, and it would just scroll continuously. Now it‚Äôs a handful of items and then you have to click next.

When you looked at an item page there was a section that said ‚Äúcustomers who bought this bought X‚Äù. And then there was items recommended that were similar to the item page you were viewing. Now it‚Äôs only ‚Äúrecommended‚Äù items and nothing else.

The app is slower now, and it‚Äôs not handling data as fast.

title: SO GOOD

title: Do NOT use save yourself the trouble
review: I placed an order for a gift and I paid extra to have the 2 day guarantee and to no surprise it‚Äôs not gonna make it today. I‚Äôm not sure what‚Äôs wrong. I‚Äôm not trying to complain or pout, but I'm just not sure what‚Äôs happening.

title: website
review: why is ur website so bad? why after ive clearly created a list and try to add items to it later, the site acts as if it doesnt exist and keeps prompting me to create a new one?? the list ive already created and want to use should populate ugh finally i gave up and saw that the site was offering to put the items into a shopping list. i said ok ill add these to a shopping list. title: Worst
review: My package was suppose to be delivered at 10am-3pm today (November 26) and they ‚Äúattempted to deliver‚Äù it at 8am instead then when they could have left the package like the instructions said at the front door they didn‚Äôt now I have to wait an extra day to get my item!!! It‚Äôs not fair why couldn‚Äôt it be left at the front door like they usually leave the items and also why was it attempted to be delivered so early I was driving and didn‚Äôt know it was on it‚Äôs way because I didn‚Äôt check my phone this is ridiculous !!

title: Subscribe and save
review:
I‚Äôve tried canceling an order for 6 months!

title: Crashes CONSTANTLY

title: Horrible

title: Stop using my microphone
review: I‚Äôm not sure what the exact cause is, but this app constantly interrupts my audio output and the only reason I can guess at the moment is that my microphone is being accessed. Every time I close or even just leave the app, my music or pip tv is paused. Sometimes temporarily, sometimes until I press play again. This is an issue across devices and other users. It‚Äôs incredibly annoying and makes me wonder if my privacy is being breached. I have brought it up to tech support and nothing has come of it.

title: Recent update 10/21 iPhone
review: I don‚Äôt like th new update. It doesn‚Äôt give a time frame my packages will be delivered.  This doesn‚Äôt work for me because my packages sometimes get delivered to my neighbors instead of me. I only get them delivered because of this. I don‚Äôt trust my neighbors to give my packages to me if I‚Äôm not home to get them. I get things delivered on my days off because of this and being a day off I also have errands to run

title: Rude customer service agent
review: The customer service representative who was ‚Äúhelping‚Äù me with an order that was expected DAYS AGO and now has seemed to stop moving with no tracking updates IN TWO DAYS can‚Äôt even identify what state my items are in and thinks it‚Äôs cute to ask me if I want him to ‚Äúinvent information‚Äù to tell me. I was transferred to someone he claimed to be his manager who then informed me that the package was considered lost. Hopefully he looks into your customer service representative who thinks being snarky is a redeeming trait of someone representing your company. NOT HAPPY.

title: Bottom Navigation Bar Glitchy With Trackpad (Magic Keyboard)
review: When the iPad is in horizontal orientation and you try to use the trackpad (in my case, on the Magic Keyboard), the cursor disappears when over the bottom bar and you cannot tell what icon you are on. Icons are still clickable but its difficult to know where the cursor is. It makes navigating between the home, account, cart, and settings pages difficult.

title: Horrible since update
review:
The latest update forces portrait mode when using my iPad.
And it causes other problems that make ordering stuff nearly impossible.  Nobody tested this update properly, and whoever did so should be replaced with somebody better.
I am now forced to use my browser to review, search and order items.  This app is now useless.
Until this is fixed I advise anybody using an iPad not to download it.
I am very surprised that such a lousy update was allowed to be released in this terrible condition by a company with enormous resources.

title: Dishonest and a thief company
review: Stay away from these robbers. Sent me multiple used and defective items and upon returning they sent the money into my prime account and then after that closed my account. These people didn‚Äôt even give my $280 back and I even offered to send pictures of why I return an item where their tech support couldn‚Äôt even resolve the issue. Really disrespectful people they have once you really get to this situation. I‚Äôll be supporting my local stores who actually are customer oriented and won‚Äôt rip me off.

title: Problem with cart
review: I was saving up to get things for me but when I was looking for things, but as I looked at my cart to put the things I wanted later it said five which was wrong I have four I tried uninstalling and reinstalling didn‚Äôt work this doesn‚Äôt bother me much but it still annoying I hope this can get fixed.

title: It‚Äôs okay
review:
I do like the previous version, however they keep changing it. Now none of my orders are in chronological order. Things that are still due for delivery are lost in delivered orders, it‚Äôs lagging and now the notifications bell is gone. Stop changing the app! 

Bring back chronological order. Have items still to be delivered up top in order by delivery date, bring back the notifications bell, and make the app stop crashing. On iPhone and I‚Äôm tired of all the changes.

title: Didn‚Äôt have a problem until today
review: This app has always been super helpful and useful until today when I can barely have the app open for more that two seconds before it crashes and closes. I tried opening it multiple times and never once could I look for what I needed. I‚Äôm not saying the app is suddenly terrible- I just want to know why I‚Äôm now unable to use it?

title: Prime membership
review: While the products are great, I get that we are in a pandemic, the shipping times don‚Äôt meet the standard that prime once had. The shipping on a lot of prime items are the same as not paying for prime at all. Still have streaming services and good movies though. It would just be nice to see a privilege for shipping which is one of the main reasons for prime membership.

title: Sending multiple items with one order
review: I greatly appreciated that I order four items and a couple of them were soposed to come separate day‚Äôs but I received all four the same day I think that‚Äôs a option that should be offered more often

title: Love this app but....
review: Okay I can not express how much I beckon love this app for online shopping but there is just one problem when‚Äôre I want to see my saved/hearted/ or list my screen just freezes and I cannot scroll down to see what I have saved it‚Äôs a bummer but other than that I rate it 5/5!

title: Fix login bugs
review: I‚Äôve tried to login on multiple occasions and I‚Äôve even went so far as to reset my password and it keeps telling  me that my account is locked but it wants documents to prove that it‚Äôs the payment method I used to pay for my orders and I don‚Äôt have that information

title: Quit listening to me lol.
review: Every time I go on your app when I have sound coming through my speakers/earbuds, the sound stops for a few seconds and then starts again. My phone does that when I go to record something on Snapchat. That‚Äôs a little sketchy to me. I already know my phone listens to what I say but I really don‚Äôt need Jeff Bezos and his slave laborers listening to me, or even watching me. At least make it to where the sound doesn‚Äôt stop for a second so people don‚Äôt think that you‚Äôre listening/watching them. Thanks.

title: I have only a couple complaints
review:
I love using the App for my shopping:)
Sometimes there‚Äôs item that states one price but when you click to view it, it gives a completely different price. Or when searching for an item there will be a dozen unrelated items in the results. Besides these 2 üëé, I have been pleased with this App.

title: Poor System efficiency
review: I ordered phone cases and a few days later I was gifted some so when I went to cancel my order They said ‚Äúwait until it‚Äôs delivered and just refuse the delivery‚Äù That would of been smooth If it hadn‚Äôt come earlier than scheduled taking away my ability to do so. Now I have the package and they said they can‚Äôt start the return process until it gets updated in the system that my package arrived so Now I‚Äôm stuck with the package until then

title: Can‚Äôt drag items to wishlist
review: For what reason would you remove the drag and drop feature? I honestly cannot think of a reason. Who told you this was a good idea? Fire that person. And I can‚Äôt figure out how to switch items from one wishlist to another. Someone must have been bored when they made these changes.

title: 9/20 updates destroyed touch!
review:
Recent updates ruined the experience of this app in my iPad. Might as well use a browser. No more swiping through pictures, but instead you have to touch each tiny thumbnail! Ridiculous. Adding something to a wish list takes you off of the item screen and you have to backtrack to get to it. This is like using the browser version. Might as well delete it!
Please revert back to the stable, functional app I‚Äôve been using for years!!!

title: inconvenient
review: I am becoming extremely frustrated with the entire company and the lack of consideration for your customers. I have no idea as to why i have been logged out of my account HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE and i was asked for my billing statement yesterday to verify it‚Äôs me. you said within 24 hours i would be allowed back into my account however i still cannot get into it and i‚Äôm simply trying to buy speakers! i might file a lawsuit against your entire company because i have a gift card in the account which i can‚Äôt even access! you get a one star rating from me

title: False advertising on shipping!!
review: Too many times I have gone to purchase something that says receive tomorrow.  I put it in my cart, check out and it isn‚Äôt coming for 2 days!! Really? So when I ask them about it they say we can‚Äôt guarantee that shipping until you put it in your cart. Then don‚Äôt advertise it that way to start with. That‚Äôs false advertising-that‚Äôs so you can ‚Äúsay‚Äù you have X amount to next day items but you really don‚Äôt. And I do not live in a remote area!

title: Loathe new changes
review:
I miss the endless list of items I hate the next page button

I can‚Äôt stand the new auto correct search bar. If I am searching for something I want to search for exactly as I typed it typo and all this auto predicting what I want to search for is irritating. If I want to search for ‚Äúx large‚Äù item that‚Äôs what I want but it corrects it to ‚Äúlarge‚Äù and makes me select ‚Äúdid you mean x large‚Äù yes I mean x large.

I miss drag and drop to my favorite list.

title: It has gone downhill fast
review:
It use to be decent, now on my iPhone 11 Pro, it constantly logs me out and you have to type on the email and password again. (It doesn‚Äôt have faceID, or integrate with LastPass) so it‚Äôs painfully to re login every time I connect on a new network it feels like.

On top do this, they are pushing their own books and videos hard. Every few items is a books or video to stream Or read...  it is very frustrating, if I wanted to look for a book I would search the book category.

title: Great except for one thing
review: This is a really great app and I have placed a lot of orders. However, do not place two orders from a different seller and tried to cancel. You will get the error message that says we are sorry. An error occurred when we try to process your request. Rest of sure please try again in a few minutes and nothing work. Other than that one problem is it‚Äôs a great app.

title: Shopper
review: Please fix the glitches that came with the new update I am no longer able to buy anything because it signs me out after I‚Äôve signed in and I‚Äôm about to put an order through. Up until now the app has been my favorite shopping place I intend to buy more items as soon as I‚Äôm able to again.

title: The app needs some serious work
review: The app needs some serious work. There needs to be an easier way to find a shoe size. I hate having to go to men or women‚Äôs fashion then shoes them something else. Then scroll down several options and find the size I need.  Also when trying to contact a seller there needs to be an easier way to do it. Also please fix the messages from sellers part. I have been trying to respond to sellers to ask them a question but it says message failed to send please try again.  This has been going on for months.  Please fix ASAP !

title: Product videos will not play on iPad?
review: I have this app on both my iPhone and iPad. Videos included in the product listing by the seller will play on my iPhone, but not my iPad. I have tried all of the usual remedies - power down iPad, then power up; delete app, then reinstall; etc. - but nothing I‚Äôve done has fixed the problem. Interestingly, videos embedded within reviews by customer do work fine on my iPad; the problem seems to be confined to videos within the product listing. I love this app on my iPhone, but this problem on the iPad makes the app much less useful.

title: Customer support?
review: The customer support people seem entirely incompetent... and unable to help with the simple issue of setting up my existing prime account in the ap. After twenty minutes they offered no other solution than to sign in on a different device. Because apparently it‚Äôs the device and not the incompetent customer support. After emailing photos and everything of what the problem was they still seemed to have little to no understanding of the English language or what the issue at hand was. This app would be great if my prime membership could get set up on it.

title: Not for me
review: I used to really like this app now I can be looking at air compressors or tools if I go back to home site there is nothing there related to what I‚Äôm looking for? There will be things like women‚Äôs dresses, pots & pans, doilies. You get where I‚Äôm going. I‚Äôm a dude ! I‚Äôm just about ready to start shopping elsewhere! Every time I look at something it‚Äôs just gone! Takes forever to narrow down a search! I keep trying but it‚Äôs getting old

title: App goes blank
review: Love this app! But all of a sudden when I click on an item to view it, the screen goes blank. So then I have to go back and search for it again for it to load up, hopefully. Think it‚Äôs just an app issue. Please fix this! It‚Äôs really annoying.

title: Ugh with the constant recommendations in my shopping list
review: I use this app daily and for the most part it‚Äôs great and easy to use. What I‚Äôm not a fan of and gets more annoying everyday is the recommendations of things to buy that over power the items in my cart when I‚Äôm scrolling through it. It‚Äôs getting as bad as Facebook. I appreciate the recommendations but the manner in which they appear is discouraging and I can‚Äôt find an option to disable it!

title: So annoying!!
review: I go to the app and it says my name but when I try to buy something it ask me for my password and when I put it it says "something went wrong" It says it over and over. it had happen a several times already and I changed my password and it works for that day and if I want to buy again I have to change it so instead I go to my computer and do it from there. But it's annoying because I'm not home all the time. I got sick of it so I deleted it until somebody fix it.

title: Lost points
review: I tried to add to my order after I bought it. I ended up canceling that order and reordering it with the missed item. My point were gone so I called customer service and they gave me my points back right then. They were very thoughtful, helpful and polite. Great service!!

title: Bugs
review: Recently, I'll be browsing on my phone, and the app will go blank. The search bar at the top is still there, and the navigation bar at the bottom is still there, but the middle of the screen, where the products are, is empty. And no matter how long I wait, it doesn't come back. I need to go back and click again to get the product info again.

title: Scan Gift Cards not working
review:
Current download will only allow you to scan one gift card then the option to scan more cards is not present when you try to scan another card. To restore the scan function I deleted and reinstalled the app. Same thing, scan (via camera) one and done reverting back to manual entry. 
Really would help to fix this bug.

title: Great, except kindle purchases
review: Functionality is great for almost everything, but purchasing a book through kindle is still not possible in the shopping app or the kindle app. It‚Äôs super inconvenient to need to be in a web browser for that. It‚Äôs been years. This should really be fixed.

userName: Joan of ark the real one
title: Weird app for a tech company
review:
Do you like to buy things but not have a clear way to tell what was bought when? Do you like transactions to be opaque? Do you like being charged for things even though you returned them, then calling the company and being told it‚Äôs taken care of only for it to not be? Well then this app is for you. 

If you‚Äôd like to see the cost of the items you bought on the 17th of last month (instead of just each item individually), maybe try something else.

title: A to Z‚Ä¶.AMAZON!
review: With the exception of Food and Drug Stores, I haven‚Äôt visited a Box Store in 2 - 3 years.  With shopping on my ipad, and delivery in same, one or two days, why drive to a store, and burn inflation gasoline.  I have yet to need, or want an item that between A to Z on Amazon‚Äôs web site I could not find it.  Perfect shopping, delivered right to my front door.

title: Thank you Jeff and company
review: Thank you so much for everything you do. Honestly I never thought buying anything and everything could be this easy. I know people probably tell you this often at least I hope they do but either way I appreciate your company.

title: Updated app is horrible

I use an iPad Pro and in both screens portrait and landscape the buttons to add to cart and select various options are cropped by the edge of the screen. unable to swipe or zoom out to fix this. title: Love
review: Love the ease of use. Love how it shows related items. Love the ease of returns and how you can add more items to a return. Love how you can reorder something with the click of a button. Love how you can see reviews, search reviews, see specific feedback of reviews. So many things I can‚Äôt type them all.

title: this app is literally amazing .
review:
i love this app a lot. it‚Äôs super quick shipping , and the stuff is amazing. also AMAZING packaging !! i love the packaging so much . u guys deserve the world !! thank you !! and thank u so much for giving me lashes everytime i purchase a wig since i love lashes! i love you guys so much. if i could tip the drivers i would. you guys are amazing. thank youü§ç

<3

title: App works well, but some small tweaks needed
review:
The ‚ÄúLeave Seller Review‚Äù feature is almost totally hidden in the iOS app.

Here is how to find it: 
Click ‚Äúbottom right button (Triple line)‚Äù on main screen  ‚Äî> ‚ÄúCustomer Service‚Äù (very bottom) ‚Äî> ‚ÄúLeave Third-Party Seller Feedback‚Äù
Then there is a link to the page. I don‚Äôt know why is so buried, should be a simple thing to review.

title: Feedback
review: App is great & prime is amazing. I‚Äôm grateful for it but would also love the option to delay shipping. This is particularly helpful when purchasing gifts. For example, I want to buy the gift now but would love the option to delay shipping until next month so that the gift is delivered closer to the intended event. Thanks for consideration!

title: Not what it used to be
review: I used to be able to count on two-day delivery but delivery times are getting longer and/or coming in multiple boxes on multiple days. I‚Äôve also recently had two separate items just get lost and never show up ü§î. It also seems that there are more less-reputable vendors, and getting a good product is more challenging. Is paying for Prime worth it?

title: Complicated
review:
It looks sleek but don‚Äôt let the clean design fool you the organization of this new version of the app fails in every basic function!!
Not intuitive and stuff you need daily is buried under a million sub folders for design reasons alone!
Ease of use should be primary, design should never trump that

title: Okay but product suggestion AI is awful
review: I have no problems with the app generally which is why I‚Äôm giving it four stars, but I hate how the home page shows me items that I already have viewed and saved onto my wishlist. I wish that it would recommend me new products instead of showing me ones I‚Äôve already seen.

title: It‚Äôs fine
review: Not sure why I like the functionality of the site better, maybe it‚Äôs because I‚Äôve used it so much longer and the app isn‚Äôt better, it‚Äôs just different. It also irritates me that it vibrates my phone every time I add something to the cart. My brain goes like ‚Äúwhere did the notification go? Where did I even get a text on? Aaahhh!‚Äù

title: What‚Äôs with the new layout?????
review:
EVERYTHING HAS BEEN MOVED!!! Seriously, I‚Äôve been using this app for years and it was super convenient. BUT, now there‚Äôs a new bar at the bottom at the screen that holds the Cart, Home botton, etc. it‚Äôs location is super inconvenient and makes scrolling through search lists annoying and a hassle. Please go back to the old layout.

*EDIT (10/26): Please stop changing the layout. It was fine the way is was before. The cart update alert is an striking and unflattering orange color. The ‚Äúmore info‚Äù buttons for an item take up too much space.

title: New Version is Horrible!
review:
This newest update (Sept 2020) is useless to me. They've made it so it's no different than going to their website, which on a small device means I can't read the tiny text. 

The product pages don't allow "click to enlarge" the images anymore, and that's another huge problem! I don't have a computer so it's not like I can shop from it, instead.

I hate companies that go into my iPad and iPhone to change things without giving the option to say no. If I could revert back to the old version, I'd do it in a heartbeat.

title: New format is annoying
review:
The new format is such a pain. Really don‚Äôt need this right now with all the other stresses of Covid.  Why in the world would you think this is a good idea now?  Then I realized I started checking out other websites to avoid using this...
Might want to listen to your customers...

title: Ms. Simuka
review: I like this app it‚Äôs somewhat easy to navigate thru, trying to order certain products on payment plans are a little difficult to find sometimes.  Movie downloads are good quality and they don‚Äôt take very long to download or stream! Overall it has some problems but it‚Äôs got more positive things then the negative!

title: Refund and chat capability not available
review:
The app works fine for ordering but you will end up in a loop if you try to get a refund. I ordered an item but 
I never received it. When you try to get a refund, the app just takes you to the return page. There is NO way to ask for a refund. It also tells you to contact customer service by chat but that tab is not available and no phone number made available. Basically, they have stolen money from me by making it impossible to get a refund for an item I never received.

title: No quick login
review: The app is ok, I just wish it had quick login, like face recognition for iPhone, it‚Äôs frustrating having to put your login info every time you log in. Also would be nice if you can easily locate the seller to ask questions about the item, etc... like (eBay). But the quick login would be a plus!!!

title: Viewing items changed.
review: You used to be able to scroll forever through items. Now it only lets you see like 10 at a time and you have to hit next page. It‚Äôs pretty annoying when searching for stuff. I don‚Äôt use this app like I used to. Please change it back.

title: Awful update. Roll it back!
review: Hi guys, why?! Or why?! New update has paging?! You used to scroll through results, now you have to click Next every 10 secs?! Search is awful. The results are all over the place. The Compare feature is gone. And you add Fav list, but it‚Äôs not available on all items and it‚Äôs impossible to find it. Please roll back this update and get to the previous version. Not all updates are needed. Sometimes ‚Äúwhen it‚Äôs not broken, don‚Äôt fix it‚Äù is a really good rule to follow....

title: Used to love
review: I used to love this app but I HATE that I can only view 15 items per page now instead of just scrolling. MAJOR DISAPPOINTMENT! Also hate that I can‚Äôt click an item and drag it to my list I had to scroll and click add to list... both items really kept us in mind versus now the convenience of this app has changed.

title: Frustrating Changes! PLEASE FIX/IMPROVE
review: Why can‚Äôt I see search results in ‚Äúgallery/tiled‚Äù format instead of only list format? Makes for SO MUCH scrolling when lots of items are shown in search results.  Also, I hate that now when I want to SORT search results, after hitting FILTER button,  I have to scroll to the very bottom past the loooong list of filter options.  Please make it easier to shop search results by letting me see more items at one time (gallery view) and easily sorted the way I prefer.

title: Kindle purchases
review: For some reason the app no longer lets me purchase kindle books. When I change the format from hard copy to kindle the only option I have is to download a sample. Maybe I‚Äôm doing somewhat wrong but it‚Äôs been like this for a long time. I have to use the full site to purchase.

title: Please correct to prior way
review: Whatever has happened since the last time I‚Äôve been on the app, is not good. You‚Äôre loosing out on the instant gratification when every time I try to click on something I keep seeing the doggy error page, refresh after refresh-no change. I can‚Äôt shop for anything.. please add drag and drop back. And I don‚Äôt like the next page button. I much prefer the endless scroll. I‚Äôm sure people buy more when they can keep looking at things to buy.. please fix. I order sometimes multiple times a week from y‚Äôall.

title: Wishlist Tap and Drag Revival
review:
It would be much easier for customers if you would please bring back the tap and drag into wishlist mechanic, it‚Äôs gotten very tiring trying to make lists and forgetting you removed that feature. It streamlines comparison and quickens making lists.
 
Having to go to the side menu to go to your lists and choose to see one item at a time is extremely clunky and I genuinely hope you listen to your customers‚Äô complaints.

title: Why can‚Äôt you Copy and Paste???
review: No copy and paste function from any of the pages of images or links. And there‚Äôs also no Sharing button from the product pages so there‚Äôs no way to get out of the App and send info to your friends and family. Really annoying, that. Sure it‚Äôs great for buying things and putting things in your own lists and such but everything should be able to be copy and paste-able.

title: One click option
review:
Can you please get rid of this option. Accidentally clicked it and ordered something. Now I can‚Äôt even cancel. It doesn‚Äôt even have a confirmation or anything for when things like this happen. Please update this. Either make an extra verification or get rid of it completely.

Thanks

title: What happened to package X-ray?
review: One of the most useful features has been gone for a while and even though I was told by support that it would return, it has not. Very disappointed with the chat with support in the app too, I had to ask 5 different CSRs when it would return none of them were able to answer the question. I understand i should have been referred to an app support group but that didn‚Äôt happen. Even the link to app support on the iOS App Store was a dead end. PLEASE restore the package X-ray feature!!!!!

title: Lots of problems lately
review: Loved this app until a few days ago.  When I click on an item now, the description is not centered on the page and sometimes I can‚Äôt even find reviews.  Sentences are overlapping other sentences.  Also, there have been a few occasions where the option to put something in my cart or even buy it with one click is not there.  So, you‚Äôre losing business!  Should probably fix it.

title: App update may 15,2018
review:
The recent update has made the app crash a few times and the ‚Äúshare list‚Äù option does not work anymore
Update: all of a sudden today you can now share a list but now you cannot few your list fully. It only shows the first 4 items on my list. Very frustrating

title: 1 click is horrible
review:
The other day I added an item to my cart but never ordered it. Two days later I found out that what I had in my cart was shipped. I checked my cart and found that the item was still in my cart. I have a feeling it has to the 1 click option being glitchy. 
It‚Äôs quite unfortunate because I recently moved and did not get the chance to update my address. 
Now I am stuck paying for a product I didn‚Äôt even order, and don‚Äôt get the chance to return/refund it. 
I recommend never setting up the 1 click option!!

title: Amazing shopping
review: I love how you can find the items you want and it feels quite nice as well as the princes for everything, but there are certain items that are not available or sold out, overall, still a great place to shop!

title: Corrupt wrong and crooked
review: returned this book and they won‚Äôt refund me the money for it. I‚Äôve removed confirmation emails and tracking info for the item. Every time I talk to anyone about the situation they are extremely rude and are no help at all. Even though I have received emails from them stating the items been received they say that there is no records of me returning the items. The computer is crooked and quick to take money from my account but when the item has been returned they want to act like they can‚Äôt find the order or any history of me returning the book

title: MADDENING
review: The wholefoods part of the app is losing money. It says you can add or edit your cart before they start shopping. That has worked once in the past. That‚Äôs it. In edit, you cannot delete an item. You CANNOT add items to the order. You have to cancel the entire order, re-enter it, and lose your pick up time slot. The last couple of times, I went and bought my additional items somewhere else. There is no person to call, no human intervention. Just a dysfunctional app, costing them money.

title: Currently Useless - Cannot even sign in
review: Not sure what happened, but the app has become almost completely non responsive.  I was stuck on my business account and could not switch back to my personal account so I went ahead and deleted the app and reinstalled.  The good news is that I am no longer stuck on my biz account, bad news is the app is still completely non responsive and I can‚Äôt log in with any account.  On the bright side, maybe I‚Äôll save some money until this is resolved!

title: White Screen of Death
review:
There‚Äôs an 80% chance at any given moment that your screen will go blank while using the app. The only way to get off that blank screen is to go back. Good luck finding where you were though, because it‚Äôll lose your spot on the previous page too. 

This app is only good for finding your orders‚Äô status. Shopping is a nightmare.

This issue remains unacknowledged and unaddressed by the mobile development team after 6+ months of multiple user-submitted bug reports.

title: Buggy and lots errors
review: I use this app a lot as many people with prime do. For some reason it is not working today. I keep on getting errors and unable to add to kart. Even when I finally got what I wanted in my kart it all of sudden changed my ship dates from tomorrow to a week out on almost all 12 items. I had to cancel my order and redo. Still was difficult to get what I wanted to add and even making comments or liking post didn‚Äôt work.

title: Deliveries
review: This is one of the best services ever. The only reason there are 3 stars is because 99% of the drivers do not follow directions. Why have that option and they don‚Äôt use it. I live in an apartment complex and they just leave it out there and NEVER knock. Anyone an walk away with my stuff? I‚Äôm tired of it. I am home everytime I am expecting a delivery and it‚Äôs only a 1 bedroom Apt. so I would definitely hear it if they knocked.

title: Easy to Order, Quick Delivery
review: I enjoy the quick delivery and the ease of ordering.  I also appreciate the accuracy of my orders but if something isn‚Äôt right, then the no-hassle return policy makes doing business more pleasant. Then,  of course there‚Äôs the competitive pricing which is the icing on the cake.

title: EXPLORE and BUY
review:
I had a wonderful shopping time searching for items today and was very satisfied.  I ordered earlier and I am ordering once again right now.  

I will continue buying products I want as long as the prices remain very reasonable.  Especially in these terrible inflationary times.

Jerry C.

title: Almost perfect
review: For a couple months now whenever I click on reviews it‚Äôs not showing anything. I keep tapping but it will not go to the reviews. Sometimes I get it and then other times it won‚Äôt work. I have uninstalled and reinstalled and I have everything up-to-date. This is obviously a bug, please fix it.

title: Best no contact shopping
review: I don‚Äôt know where I would be without this app. It has made my life so much easier in today‚Äôs times. I never worry about my order having issues because the customer service is amazing and is always able to help.

title: Need better filters for Orders
review:
Please update the filter options for my Orders.
I need the ability to sort by delivery date. I need to be able to see quickly when each package will arrive. Sometimes an item ‚Äúruns late‚Äù this can cause that item to not be visible without a lot of scrolling. I would have just submitted a suggestion but the app doesn‚Äôt support that either.

title: Delivery date option was near IMPOSSIBLE to schedule!
review: I just wanted my gift to be delivered all at one time, even though it was being shipped in two separate shipments. Ended up having to cancel entire order, then re-order just to finally get the option to select the same delivery date for both shipments. Took 30 minutes instead of 10. Ridiculous!!!

title: Shipping
review: All my orders use to come in two days and now they are coming in a week. As soon as I change the address to a different house, it gets shipped in 2 days. I don‚Äôt know why my packages are now being delivered in a week to the address they were being delivered in 2 days!

title: Layout changes
review: I feel like my app freezes every time I go to my orders with the new navigation changes. It also really bothers me that I cannot see the size of previous orders when I click on ‚Äúorder details‚Äù, it‚Äôs cut off before it shows what size I ordered. Would also be nice if email confirmation showed what was ordered instead of just a price and order number. Thanks!

title: No intuitive way to change country settings
review: It was lot simpler in earlier versions of the app to change the country but not any longer. We used to change the country to order items for family back home (India). After menus and app changed, I haven‚Äôt yet figured out how to change the country. Don‚Äôt know why the team made a simple thing impossible. Things should become easier not harder. Very disappointed.

title: UNRELIABLE
review: For starters, customer service is not helpful, i even had to update somebody i was speaking with on something they did not know. Second, it says there is a hold on my account and they would contact me but have not and it‚Äôs been over a month, i‚Äôve checked my emails & any phone number that could possibly be connected to that specific account, i provided information to get back into my account and it did not accept it when i gave valid identification and everything that was asked for.

title: Shipping payment scam
review: Good app but it will always automatically choose the most expensive shipping option for you. If you click the ‚Äúbuy now‚Äù option you will have no choice but to pay the extra money. You have to go through your cart in order to even have the option of free delivery. Super immoral but big companies often do that for the extra money.

title: New Update
review: They removed your ability to see the reviews/stars when you search for things now which is inconvenient as you're forced to click on everything to find out if it has good or bad reviews + removed you being able to see if something is prime before clicking. not to mention the icons/thumbnail photos are way too big and unnecessary.

title: Good selection, but difficult organization.
review: I was able to find the 12 ton jack stands that I wanted, but searching for ‚Äú12 ton jack stands‚Äù brought up a lot of things that weren‚Äôt related to that. It also brought up two packs of 6 ton and four packs of 3 ton. It was after about an hour of looking that I found some rated for 12 ton each.

title: Delivery
review: Kinda upset I order a few things and it states a delivery date so I plan on that date for stuff to arrive. I get things two days or three days earlier a lot. I wouldn‚Äôt complain but I don‚Äôt live in a great area and it‚Äôs a matter of time before someone steals my stuff cause I‚Äôm not there.  I make sure that I‚Äôm there on delivery date That I have Also would like a am delivery for once but never happens. You would think if you lived in city that it would be am delivery.

title: Thank you
review:
I have had such a great experience with everything I have ordered. Even sending things back or refunds aren‚Äôt difficult. Sometimes I have to watch myself because I don‚Äôt think I have ever looked up something you don‚Äôt have. Always a customer 
Thank you

title: Slow
review: What is up with the app? It is usually fast and you can navigate through it like nothing. But lately it‚Äôs been lagging or is slow in the response time. I‚Äôve updated the app, updated my phone, I‚Äôve even restarted my phone several times. I‚Äôve tried using it with WiFi and on my cell network. It just isn‚Äôt as fast as it used to be. I know everyone uses it, but honestly wth!

title: Website is more reliable
review: Every time you open the app it loses what you‚Äôre looking at. And the time it takes to launch and flip through the app takes longer than opening the site in safari. The app is unnecessary and obnoxious lately.

title: One little thing I wish was added.
review: To be able to search sellers storefronts on mobile like we can do on desktop. I have a favorite seller that‚Äôs pretty close and stuff gets shipped quicker. I just would like to see easy access to see all of what they have to sell instead of having to force desktop on mobile.

title: The latest update is HORRIBLE!
review: It's bad enough that you changed the home screen menus and put them across the top of the screen instead of one drop down menu like it was for a long time. Now you have a bunch of stupid subcategories underneath options like recent orders, subscribe and save, etc. It's a cluster and a hideous mess. Bring back continuous scrolling and stop making half of what we see stupid advertisements trying to direct us to different sellers. If I wanted a constant sales pitch in my face I would shop on Facebook marketplace!!

title: Fix it!
review: You used to be able to print an invoice for a product you ordered. They took that feature away for some reason. After chatting with customer service they said to click on INVOICE which is under the order number. It does NOT say INVOICE under the order number. Customer service said the app must have a glitch. Is it ever going to be fixed? This is a must have for me.

title: Great service
review: Great service! I really love getting anything I need in one or two days, most of the time. I mean pretty much mean anything. We did need to go to the hardware store to get a new riding lawnmower a few weeks back. But I‚Äôm impressed to say the least. However the impact on my spending is less than desirable.

title: gift shopping made easy!
review: I really enjoy the ease of using your website to search for items on gift registries and for finding the special gift for my 10 grandchildren that live all over the country. Free shipping is a hugeAttraction to using your website. Great customer service as well

title: New App is awful!
review: Overnight, my home, menu & shopping cart icons moved to the bottom of mt screen. I search for a book at the top and I‚Äôm sent to FRESH... for food! WTH is going on?! If I choose the menu at the bottom, the list is giant! worst redesign ever! i want my older version back... it was so much more user friendly

title: Please fix
review: Please fix when so I‚Äôm scrolling down reviews and click on a picture from a review and go back, it goes all the way back up to the top it‚Äôs so frustrating and inconvenient. Same when I‚Äôm looking at all pictures under reviews when I go out of the picture it goes all the way back to the top

title: Night Mode Needed
review: I‚Äôd give it 5 stars but they really need to add a night/dark mode option for the iPhone. eBay and Facebook did it and it‚Äôs wonderful. In the evenings during commercials I like to do my online shopping/browsing and sometimes even when I turn my brightness down it‚Äôs still too bright. A lot of my apps have added dark mode...this is a great app they just need to keep up with the times.

title: Make it easy
review:
It would be nice if 1. Make it easy to find return labels and don‚Äôt do everything possible to hide it. Frustrating. We purchase a lot of things and shouldn‚Äôt have to struggle to return the few that may need to be returned.
2. Don‚Äôt cut me out of reviews simply because they don‚Äôt laid everything you sell. Let us be honest and not stop us from being able to review for being so.

title: Order List
review: I love the app. My only complaint is my orders list continues to show items that were delivered days ago. And these items are near the top so I have to scroll down to find out when my other items will be delivered. I would like an option for orders to show only undelivered orders. Or at least move the delivered orders down the list so that I can see the orders I am waiting on! :)

title: The 20 million Carter‚Äôs
review: I don‚Äôt know my screen time passcode I have to know it so I can buy a 99 hour timer but I don‚Äôt know the screen time passcode and I‚Äôm so sad about it aboss baby back in business season four is coming 2 days later and I really have to know the screen time passcode but how I think I have to see dad type it in so I can buy it to do the countdown I think it may arrive tomorrow I hope it‚Äôs not worth so many dollars and I‚Äôll see you later

title: Not that great app function
review: Its annoying when i scroll through picture reviews then click on a picture then go back it takes me all the way back to the top so if there are a lot of pictures i keep having to look through the same ones to get to new ones. and the filter for free shipping is a joke it shows PRIME free shipping 90% of the time which just pushes subscribing on you even more. Packages always come in nice though.

title: The latest updates are awful
review: I‚Äôm hating the latest updates to the app. The menu bar moving to the bottom gets in the way and doesn‚Äôt include everything the corner menu had, making navigation more difficult and time consuming.  Searches and product page loads feel slower, and some of the flat design elements blend in too much on the page. Collectively the UX experience has taken a huge step backwards. I‚Äôm sticking to the website until usability is back up to par.

title: Disappointed but not surprised
review: I just recently ordered a sports watch but when the email with the order tracking number from the usps came in it said that I ordered 3 watches even though I double checked the quantity of the order to see that I wasn‚Äôt ordering more than one and it said that I only ordered one so I was disappointed but not surprised because this isn‚Äôt the first time that they have done this. When I called customer service the person that attended me said that it was my fault and that I was to blame and he couldn‚Äôt do anything about it.

title: It‚Äôs annoying
review: You will buy something and it will be a success but it will tell you it‚Äôs coming on Tuesday but it doesn‚Äôt and tells you you have a problem with what you payed for and you have to keep doing it and it won‚Äôt give you your money back like why

title: App does not work properly
review: In the beginning I loved this app. However what I didn't know was if you change your passcode the whole app will malfunction. I have all of my app linked to my facial recognition so that no one can just access my accounts. This app does not offer facial recognition after you change your passcode! Tried calling customer service & they're all useless! No help at all! One agent said he'd email me instruction on how to reset it! Never got the email! Called back and the options they told me to try aren't even offeredü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è needles to say I'm pass irritated!

title: Not user intuitive
review:
Please please please spend some money/time to upgrade this app.

1. Next to impossible to close out of a review video, cannot click on review pictures without backing out of the photo gallery which makes no sense. I want to see a pic or video and easily close out. The x to close is somehow off the screen ü§î. 

2. The menu is so overwhelming and packed full. It‚Äôs as if when something new is created a new tab gets slapped in somewhere. The menu really needs to be streamlined, consolidated, better mapped. 

3. Search results are just weird. it‚Äôs usually easier to find an item through google. The 3 random options like best seller, styles under $, etc. shouldn‚Äôt be there, make that a filter a clean up the results. 

There are plenty more things but these are just some major annoyances.

title: ‚ÄúCan‚Äôt be shipped to your location‚Äù
review: Lately 80% of all the products that appear on my search can‚Äôt be shipped to my address even though I filtered the results to show the ones that can be shipped to my zip-code. The shipping costs are astronomical (I live in Puerto Rico) in comparison to other websites like new-egg,ebay and B&H. Note saying it again, this also happens even when I filter the products that can ship to me via my zip-code. This didn‚Äôt happen in the past and I feel like this aspect has gotten worst in the past 3 months.

title: I don‚Äôt like the changes
review: One of the recent updates has made it so when you shop on the app, click to look at something, then go back to the results screen, you‚Äôre taken all the way back to the top of the page. It used to not be that way, you‚Äôd be taken back to the approximate product you last clicked on. This change as well as several others makes it less user friendly.

title: CRASH CRASH CRASH!
review: I‚Äôve read many other reviews that have stressed the fact that the app is currently unusable, but considering I am now leaving a review means you guys still have yet to fix this issue. Apparently this is the only way to make you guys aware of the situation (that we know of...if you actually have been reading these reviews) since the ‚Äúapp support‚Äù option tries to launch the app, even though it‚Äôs not loading and keeps crashing. So here‚Äôs yet another customer informing and/or reminding you that this issues still needs to be fixed.

title: Pretty Good but
review: Overall this app is simple and easy to use. I really love getting alerts and pictures about my packages. It‚Äôs a great app. The one downside that I have is that you can‚Äôt purchase kindle books off the app, you have to open a web browser and purchase them from there. That‚Äôs the only inconvenience I have. Which isn‚Äôt quite that big of a deal. Overall pretty great.

title: Latest versions have major bug
review: App works fine while using it, until your screen turns off or you switch apps. There seems to be a bug that once the screen turns off (even for one second), the app closes completely and you have to start over

title: My 2¬¢
review:
Bring back endless scrolling!! These pages with a dozen results or so is a massive pain! I‚Äôm spending more time on other shopping apps because of this!ü§¨
At a minimum, allow the user to choose how many results per pager hey want to see. A step up from that would be bringing back the scrolling, one page at a time.

You also took away sellers pages. When I want to see a seller‚Äôs (or brand‚Äôs) offerings, I expect to tap their name (like in the past) and go to their storefront. This crap with making another search item out of the seller‚Äôs name has got to stop. It makes finding what I‚Äôm looking for unnecessarily difficult and utterly frustrating. 

WHATEVER Y‚ÄôALL DID, UNDO IT. IT WAS BETTER THE PREVIOUS WAY.

title: What Has Happened?
review: I use the app frequently and I‚Äôm being asked all of a sudden to log in every time I use the app. I am also being assaulted with ‚ÄúDo you want to enable notifications?‚Äù. Then you can‚Äôt scroll endlessly as before. The layout has changed and it‚Äôs now terrible. I don‚Äôt get what was wrong with the way things were.

title: Needs Look Inside
review: I‚Äôm giving this a 5* review, but I do see room for one improvement. I wish the app had the Look Inside feature. I go through the NYT book review every week, and I need to use the website rather than the app to choose books. This is a tiny little thing, so overall I still think it‚Äôs an excellent app.

title: Buggy
review:
I do not like these recent changes. I miss being able to see your shopping list (or any list) docked on screen while still shopping/viewing product pages. 
Also, I hate the new search results pages with the large pictures, I want to be able to see more items, and every time I have to go to the second page of results, I lose my search filters, so I‚Äôm only able to see the first page of results that are actually what I‚Äôm looking for. 
Not a fan.

title: Thumbs down
review: I don‚Äôt know if there was an update but this app went from one of my absolute favorites to absolute garbage in the matter of a day. The filter options after entering a search are sporadic and for some reason there are less options for filtering searches in general. You cannot select more than one without being kicked back to the product list and having to start over. It sounds absurd but this is quite literally one of the most irritating and frustrating issues I‚Äôve had. I‚Äôve stopped using the app entirely.

title: Great app, couple of things could be fixed
review: I love this app, use it all the time, but the shopping list view shown in the bottom and I don‚Äôt think you can get rid of it. It takes up space and can‚Äôt get to all of the items in the filter which is annoying. I also would love for the app to use amazonsmile, instead you have to go online for that. Otherwise, great app.

title: (Edit: fixed)broken after updating 4/2/18
review:
If having problems with this app delete it and reinstall. Works perfectly now, back to five stars. I left my old review below.
I shouldn‚Äôt have updated. Nothing was wrong with the app before. 5 stars before update. Now I cannot even look at my orders, much less track them. FIX THIS!

title: Plus and Minus
review:
This is a very intuitive shopping app and would like to see most other businesses model after Amazons design and functionality. However, the app is very slow when doing anything but check out. It amazes me that when shopping or searching anything at all this app is slow as crap. The second it‚Äôs time to check out, wiz bang the speed is amazing. I‚Äôm a prime member and shop with this app/amazon almost daily. Never ceases to amaze me.
FIX IT!!!

title: Horrible order, great customer service

title: Make the app fast and snappy again

title: Did rate it 2 stars but now 5 as i finally got the badge icon dealt with
review:
And I am the type that likes my notifications but I have checked through everything and cannot find any reason why the badge icon is still on there and it is annoying me 

Update finally got the badge icon to go away so now give it 5 stars

title: Better, but still buggy
review:

The only way to enter new text is by backing left to erase it. 
iOS 11.0.3, iPad Air 2, 64GB.

title: Fix the glitch!
review: The app won‚Äôt let me update anything! After trying to checkout 50 times, when I finally get to the checkout I can‚Äôt update shipping, point preferences etc. When checking out it asks for my password then I receive a ‚Äúsomething went wrong error‚Äù but if I keep trying it finally lets me checkout. Then in checkout it won‚Äôt let me change to free shipping or choose to use my points or not. It glitches and throws me back to my cart. Seriously the most frustrating app ever. I‚Äôd rather go to the store and buy what I need than have to mess with this dang app!

title: Poor performance
review: Ever since early December the app shuts  off then crashes on iOS and you can‚Äôt even access your wish list without it freezing up on you.  often times it doesn‚Äôt allow you to use the back button to go back to a page you looking at something is going on with this app.  not being fixed and good luck trying to find any customer service person or even a Technical . Support person to reported to ,the site keeps telling you go to the message boards , go to contact customer Service. Please fix this.

title: Buggy
review:
The app has been great until recently. I‚Äôll be looking at an item and the whole page will just go white and everything disappears. I‚Äôll go back, and the page starts over from the beginning; then, when scrolling it blanks out yet again. 

This is repetitive and honestly annoying.

title: Gets worse with each update
review:
Can‚Äôt filter the desired combination of brands. Once you select a brand several others are no longer selectable. 

When searching it shows a ‚Äúfrom‚Äù price of all the items in a listing instead the price of the item you searched for.   If a listing has several different items the price isn‚Äôt even close. 

Often becomes unresponsive. Right now I can‚Äôt even add an item to my cart.

title: Hate the new auto play videos!
review: I just want to quickly scroll to see the options when I‚Äôm searching for a product, but with the videos auto playing I have to wait until they‚Äôre done playing to see the product. If I want to watch a video I can simply click on the product. It doesn‚Äôt need to auto play in the search results.

title: Can‚Äôt customize shortcuts
review:
Please allow users to customize the ‚Äúshortcuts‚Äù in the pull up drawer on the bottom of the screen. 

 I believe it auto selects items to add, but I‚Äôd really like to see my orders there.  I should be able to rearrange them and remove existing ones if I do chose. 

 Either add a plus button to add more, or allow me to tap and hold on a menu item somewhere else in the app, and select add to shortcuts.

title: Glitchy‚Ä¶
review: Lately, the app has been acting glitchy, where everytime I‚Äôm trying to check out an item, the screen turns white all of a sudden. & I know it‚Äôs not my phone, because my mother is having the same trouble when she uses the app on hers. It‚Äôs very annoying, because then I have to go back, & it leads me to the homepage. Which means that I lose track of the item I was checking out, because the app had refreshed in the process. Like I said, VERY ANNOYING.

title: Prime but not really prime
review: We‚Äôve paid for prime for over a decade and it‚Äôs been on the decline for quite some time. Prime isn‚Äôt really the prime it use to be. So much so, we‚Äôve cancelled 2 of our 3 accounts. The last one is about to go as well. Services paid for, however services paid for not rendered. How many time should we order prime next day and have it arrive 3-5 days later if at all. What service are we paying for? Not prime obviously! Maybe the garbage streaming service offered that was always free?

title: This app was awesome until‚Ä¶

title: I need help asap!!!
review:

title: Blank page

title: Good company
review:
Every thing I have been pleased with. A couple of thing not so much. I could return  UPS picked up at my door.

title: Easy shopping App
review: Easy shopping app with tons of great products. Lately I am facing some performance issues, while clicking on some products the page doesn‚Äôt load or it disappear after loading for a moment. This experience is little frustrating but most of the times the app works great

title: Deliver Option
review: Having safer location easier and safer for items I order to get to me. Allowing me obtain my order and not to wait at home knowing it will not be stolen.  I had stopped shopping because of high crime and changing to safer delivery location gives me piece of mine. Thank you

title: Quality Authentic Options

title: Window Shopping without the Glass
review: The app is pretty solid where can access any menu items available in the website version. It has great security and extremely comfortable in using it to make purchases, write reviews, and browsing around.

title: Lookout for the vision impaired
review: The app overall is a good working app; however, it could be better. If you have a vision problem, you don‚Äôt have the ability to zoom in or out on the descriptions. Zoom only works on the pictures.  This makes it harder to work with the app. Sometimes I avoid this and go straight to the World Wide Web. So this renders the app useless for the vision impaired.
