title: Great but I would love to see my total receipt on the app as soon as I place the order.
review: Is there a way to see your total receipt from the app right after you hit place order. I hate that I can‚Äôt take a screenshot of my total bill immediately after purchasing.

title: Display pre-orders at top
review: As someone who pre-orders lots and lots of books, it‚Äôs very inconvenient to now have to scroll through months of orders just to find updates on those books I pre-ordered. This seems to be a newer update, because I remember when all orders that had not yet been delivered were displayed at the top of the list. Please restore that version of the Orders display. Or at least give the option to filter orders that have not yet been delivered.

title: App forces you to use portrait mode on iPad
review: I prefer to use my iPad in landscape mode, but this new update keeps changing the app to portrait mode even though I locked it. This is beyond annoying and very frustrating. Why can‚Äôt you let the user decide which mode to use like before? PLEASE FIX it ASAP!

title: App not working properly with voiceover on iPhone
review: I believe this issue started occurring after iOS 15 was installed on my iPhone. When I try using voiceover on the app, this occurs when I try to go into the orders tab, or click on an item after I search. VoiceOver will not navigate properly, and it seems to freeze up. I have tried restarting the phone, and reinstalling the app, but this did not help. Will you please make an update to fix this? Thanks.

title: About the new design
review: Overall it is way much more convenient than the old one. But the searching experience still bad. For example if I search ‚Äúaltalune‚Äù that is a brand sells candles and diffusers. The suggestion queries only have altalune candle but no altalune diffuser, that‚Äôs fine, but whenever I hit the search button, it automatically converts my query of ‚Äúaltalune‚Äù to ‚Äúalkaline‚Äù, like I can never get what I want in one single query?????????? Just, why you remove the ‚Äúdo you mean bla-bla-bla‚Äù notification.

title: It‚Äôs a love hate relationship
review: Delivery drivers don‚Äôt follow instructions and it can take a long time for refunds. Most of the time replacements are no longer available. prime tv is a great perk and even with the longer waiting for prime shipping the subscribe and save does make shopping easier. It‚Äôs too bad the 1-3 day shipping isn‚Äôt there anymore but I‚Äôm glad I don‚Äôt have to go to the store as frequently for needed items.

title: What did yall do
review: What did yall do? Why did yall make it so hard to find something. I put in the search bar, iPhone 12 mini battery replacement, an yall show nothing that has to do with it, why are y‚Äôall showing power banks im not searching for that it used to be so easy to find what im looking for if you look into my history i order a lot of battery kits to fix phones now I can‚Äôt cuz who thought this was a good idea made it impossible to so better fire that person lol cuz yall about to lose a lot of customers

title: Dark mode needed ASAP
review: Needs to be updated for dark mode as app is too bright!!!!! Also the update for ipad killed this app it literally is very unfriendly with ipad now. The app switches to landscape while in horizontal connected to magic keyboard case. Not sure if this will correct itself with iOS 15 being released on Monday the 20th but I really hope so. It‚Äôs very frustrating and also the pages are being cut off currently i am having that problem.

title: App is the worst.
review: It won‚Äôt even recognize my account. Just times out saying ‚ÄòSorry, something went wrong. Please try again.‚Äô  Even after the most recent update. I would have thought this wouldn‚Äôt be an issue but it‚Äôs still not fixed.

title: New release buggy on iPad
review: This is one of those times I regret having set my apps to auto-update. I can see there are some usability enhancements but I can‚Äôt enjoy them when the whole app decides to flip to a portrait view anytime I click on the navigation, even when my iPad is horizontal. There‚Äôs also a section of white space at the bottom of search results, blocking me from seeing the full page. Might be a good upgrade once fixed.

title: Update screws up viewing in landscape
review: I use this app primarily on my iPad, and ALWAYS in landscape. When I opened the app today it said I should install the latest version so I did. Now when I view reviews, especially the photos included with reviews, it flips everything to portrait and it will only go back to landscape if I physically turn my iPad to the portrait position and back. WHY DO YOU PEOPLE THINK WE USE OUR IPADS AS IF THEY WERE GIANT IPHONES??? I‚Äôll tell you, any App designer who thinks my iPad is a giant iPhone usually gets their app deleted in a flash. Pisses me off big time.

title: Maybe an update flaw.
review: I don‚Äôt know whatever the newest update is, but every time I click on a link to look at a product it just takes me straight back to the home screen. I‚Äôve restarted my phone, restarted the app. Nothing seems to work, it doesn‚Äôt matter what product I look up, every time you click the link it just takes you straight back to the home screen. Maybe they‚Äôll fix it maybe they will, I don‚Äôt know. Who cares, this is just an issue that has popped up today.

title: Results may vary
review: I don‚Äôt like how you can search for a specific item or a specific feature of a product and you get results that are irrelevant.  Even if you use the filter options, irrelevant items still populate leaving to scroll and open links trying to find what you are looking for.

title: Mark it Delivered even before the item is delivered
review:
I had ordered a table and a wireless mouse and keyboard. On the app it showed at delivered at my front door but it was not there. When called to the customer care I was told that I will have to wait for another 48 hours for those products because when the product is out for delivery usually it gets marked as delivered.
So in the end I was left with delivered notification on my app with no product in my hand.

title: Overall great! Registries could be improved ...
review: Please make it to where we can save registries as favorites so that they are easier to get to. Every time I leave the page, I have to go through the whole navigation process to get to one. Also, it would be nice to check a box for and receive notifications for selected registries.

title: Stuck inside app
review:
You‚Äôre generally great at what you do and you appear to still give the customer the benefit of the doubt. Bravo yo you got that ! Admittedly, this can‚Äôt be cheap or easy, especially when there are some people out there who have an insatiable desire to get over. 

But you‚Äôve dropped the ball when it comes to smart phone app function ability .  Finding the log out button is like searching for Carmen Sandiego or Waldo, for the very first time !

title: Almost too easy
review: Anyone who uses the app as much as I do knows that it works almost too well. It‚Äôs so easy to pick up my device and within seconds I‚Äôve placed an order. I never have issues or technical problems with the app so I have no problem registering 5 stars.

userName: you say my nickname is used
title: Great App.
review:
Almost everything about this App is great!
I have only one issue.
When rating an individual item, I cannot send a photo. The page comes up, but in a location on the page, where the Submit button is below the screen, and can‚Äôt be moved.

title: Frustrated
review:
My order has been sitting there for two weeks. I was told by your customer service team that it would be ready to ship the next day. That was a week ago. When I reached out to customer service again today, they told me something completely different. Just really frustrating to be confused about when the order will actually ship or even get here.

Edit*** 
They pushed my order out A MONTH from now. One of the items I really needed for online school.

title: What‚Äôs going on?!
review: For Christmas I bought a hisoka figure by JUNG KOOK and a few days ago I was going to look at when it was coming and I couldn‚Äôt find it, Then I looked at the jojo‚Äôs bizarre adventure pic read what was about the figure and it said it was a hisoka figure, and when I clicked on the item it said ‚ÄúJojo‚Äôs Bizarre Adventure figure‚Äù I‚Äôm very confused am I getting my hisoka figure or a jojo‚Äôs bizarre adventure figure? And I‚Äôve never even watched jojo‚Äôs bizarre adventure!

title: Horrible Update
review: The new update to the app is complete garbage. There is no sort of order or reason when showing all recent orders, you have to scroll halfway down the page to see the purchase you JUST made. Wishlists are now somehow HARDER to view than they were before with more unnecessary steps to get to what you want. When I click ‚ÄúMy Lists‚Äù I do not want to see all of my saved items, I want to view (you guessed it) my lists. For a billion dollar company, you‚Äôd think they‚Äôd be able to hire competent app designers.

title: Color scheme choices?
review: I‚Äôve never written an app review before but I‚Äôm hoping this one gets the developer‚Äôs attention. I don‚Äôt want to use the app with the current color scheme. I can‚Äôt explain why except it rubs me the wrong way. Many apps allow you to customize the user interface/experience and I look for this feature in every app. Maybe I‚Äôm missing something but I hope it‚Äôs added soon.

title: Bug
review: Have noticed there is a bug in the layout. It comes up as plain text, no graphics or whatever it‚Äôs called. The whole thing has been going down hill. Hard to search, all in all just not as user friendly as before.

title: New interface needs works
review: Not sure why you changed the GUI. I hate the floating buttons at bottom of screen. It was more intuitive with cart button at top right (where 99% of sites put it)....Please give a classic mode to allow users to select old interface. Plus it now takes up like 1/4 of screen and doesn‚Äôt move... color palette is not ideal either too much white space and bright teal color. Hurts eyes to look at it.

title: Log in
review: I don‚Äôt log out because I‚Äôm afraid I can‚Äôt log in again. Well it happened. I changed my phone number and my email. I updated them but can‚Äôt login. I‚Äôm a member. I paid for this service. Now you don‚Äôt recognize me. I order constantly. Guess not anymore! Thanks for the memories üò¨

title: Good but can use some tweaks
review:
The app does what it‚Äôs supposed to do, for the most part. Couple of wishes I have for it are:
- Adjustable font size. The default is too small for me.
- The ‚ÄúLook Inside‚Äù option for books, or at least the table of contents. The full web site has this functionality, so it‚Äôs a limitation of the app.
- Search oftentimes misses sought items, while the full web site finds them.

title: The payment and refund option
review: First off, how‚Äôs the refund option the return option like why even allow a product dissatisfaction or misleading etc. but also have product Is broken as a separate option and not let people get their refunds..??? At least leg us go through PayPal cause now I have to go through my (abusive) providers since customer service is already ghetto and fraudulent from my experiences (^~^) I also like how I payed for Prime and yet still not treated like a member but a guest...

title: Orders
review: I know it ridiculous to be upset right now in this time. I think that they need to let customers know that they are picking what items are being shipped prime. The only things that are being shipped prime is food and first aide supplies. I was told by a customer service agent even though my products I ordered said prime if they don‚Äôt fall under those two things then it won‚Äôt be sent prime. She said it should have told me when I put them in my cart I let her know it didn‚Äôt all she said was sorry and said is there anything else I can do for you and then hung up.

title: Good overall. Updates really change things.
review: Unfortunately, the videos for products don‚Äôt play. You can view product pictures. But if you select the video companion, it won‚Äôt play.  I‚Äôve tried several times and still nothing. This did not happen until recently.

title: Difficulty finding Touch ID or printing from cellphone
review: I used to be able to access the app with Touch ID. My phone indicates I‚Äôm using it for this website, but it doesn‚Äôt show up when I click on the app. I‚Äôve looked on the app to figure how I can make it appear again but can‚Äôt seem to find it. Also, I can‚Äôt print my orders from my cellphone. I have to go directly to the website from my desktop computer in order to do that.

title: Too Hard To Find Account Info
review: Trying to find many things, like trying to change credit card information, or a way to delete existing cards is too difficult. I called customer service a week ago who helped me find the way a week ago, and I deleted all but one card, but then an order was delayed today because the card reappeared. Now I guess I will need to call customer service again.

title: Good, missing a couple usability features
review:
- Please add the ability to zoom customer images. Even a landscape mode would help. 
- Please add a ‚Äúforward‚Äù widget... it is inconvenient after navigating backwards from a filtered search, for example, to have to re-enter the search criteria.
- Please add the ability to reorder wish list items from the list screen, as on the web version.

title: Dislike new department filtering
review: The new departments hierarchy loading drives me insane. I don‚Äôt want to filter anymore now that it blinks and closes every time I choose a new level down. The new functionality is really time consuming. I‚Äôve never even written an app review before and I took the time to request that this loading be improved because it takes me so much longer to find what I‚Äôm looking for than it ever has before. Thank you!

title: Constantly logging me out
review: I‚Äôve gone years without having to log into this app.  And, over the past two months it‚Äôs logged me out about once a week.  I then have to put in my email, password, and OTP again.  And, of course I have to go rummage in my password utility and my Google Authenticator to get back in.  Only most of the time when I get my OTP from authenticator the login process has timed out and brought me back to the beginning.  And, no matter how many times I tell it to not ask me for an OTP on this device it does so anyways.  Frankly it‚Äôs getting a little old.

title: Latest update is worst I‚Äôve seen
review: I‚Äôve never seen an app update take so many steps backwards. No more infinite scrolling. To filter search results you can no longer click many options at once and then view results, you have to filter once, then view, filter even more , then view, another filter, then view, and each new view takes forever to filter, on and on. Who thought that was a good experience in a mobile app? The app also keeps crashing. Who tested this and thought it was an improvement? Or even fit to release?

title: Don‚Äôt trust it, and don‚Äôt waste your money on prime.
review:
I‚Äôve been a prime subscriber for a while but I‚Äôm going to cancel.

So... I ordered a nail gun and compressor to surprise my wife by completing some floor trim installation while she was away for the weekend with our daughter. Next day delivery - guaranteed. 

Well I watched the van drive by my residence, park a few houses down, watched the driver wrestle with the largish package he was supposed to deliver, then watched him deliver other packages to nearby neighbors (I live in a dense part of Philadelphia). He then drove by two more times over the next thirty minutes (it kept saying ‚Äòyou‚Äôre next!‚Äô), stopped again, and as I was hustling over to ask if he was going to deliver the package he drove off. Customer service said that he would be back. 12 hours later and I get a message saying that the package was undeliverable. 

Right. Sure. I could ID guy in a police lineup.

title: Works fine
review:
Update:  there must have been a glitch because now the filter by average review is back.

Previous review 
You can no longer filter by average costumer review, only sort by it, which is way less convenient.  Puts a lot of irrelevant products on top, scrolled for a long time and did not find the products I searched for.  Will use the website most of the tine from now on.

title: Pointless
review: What‚Äôs the point of an app that offers nothing beyond what I can already do on your website? In the past, the only benefit I found to having the app is that I received notifications whenever there was a price change on any item in my watch list. I uninstalled the app due to phone memory limitations. Now that I have a new phone, I reinstalled the app only to discover that feature is no longer available. That cost me the opportunity to make a purchase I was looking forward to. Now, it seems the app is a waste of space on my phone.

title: BOTH BUY BUTTONS ARE MISSING

I have had many of the same issues others are having with the layout and also sometimes have the information including the add to cart button and the one click  purchase button are missing. They disappear when selections are made.   This means I can‚Äôt buy anything. I would think this is a big problem for you if your customers are unable to make purchases.

title: Everything you want in eye drops
review: As a aging woman who has been in the beauty industry over44 years I notice the little things. Most people don‚Äôt notice that as we age our eyes loose the bright white and the color fades from the iris. These eyes drops are in my makeup drawer and the first thing I use before applying anything.

title: Can't shop next to light sleepers!

Super annoying!

title: Very slow and non-responsive lots of times
review:

And no, it‚Äôs not my internet because the rest of the apps work just fine. 

The app is so slow it‚Äôs impossible to use it. Devs need to fix the issues asap

review: I am often unable to view items I click I have to exit all the way out of app and search again. This very inconvenient almost every time I try to look items up. This app needs an update I keep check and nothing. There is obviously a bug that needs to be fixed I am seeing other complaints of the same issue.

I figured  I would write a review as this has been going on for quite a while (weeks) without a fix. It‚Äôs very frustrating.

title: Delivery problems

I checked my porch, called my neighbor and she didn‚Äôt get anything either. I decided to canvas my other neighbors and low and behold, my package was on someone else‚Äôs porch (so NOT ‚Äúreceived by recipient‚Äù). This is the 3rd time our delivery went elsewhere and only the 2nd time we were able to find our purchase. Makes me wonder what Amazon‚Äôs problem is??

title: Confusing app
review: There are lists of things I ‚Äòfavorited‚Äô ‚Ä¶ another Save for later hidden ‚Äòlist‚Äô then buy again things pop up‚Ä¶ it shouldn‚Äôt be this hard to just buy something.  Then it starts with the arrival dates‚Ä¶ which are all over the place.  Things have gotten confusing inside the app.  Then the arrival dates change from anything that was presented in the app.  ü§∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü§∑üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüëÖ

title: Grubby company
review: They refuse to price match an item they themselves are selling. They rather you send the original item back and repurchase the item again. That is a huge waste in shipping and it makes no sense whatsoever.  Then after complaining and stating that it made no sense they restricted my access on reviewing the product. Other shoppers should know they refuse to price match especially around the holiday, otherwise I NEVER would have purchased from them.  Just a sleazy company over and over again.

title: Failed Delivery

I‚Äôm very frustrated with the fact that after an attempted delivery with the incorrect address ,(I didn‚Äôt put my apartment number on the shipping address, only billing) I am not able to edit my address to correct it. It says on the app that they will be trying again, but I don‚Äôt see how it will be any more successful the second time around without the correct address? Was really looking forward to receiving my order, and am ultimately very disappointed. :/ 
I wish I could rate this 0 stars.

title: Scrolling sticks and kindle prices not shown

In addition, you can no longer see kindle books prices without clicking through several steps. You already cannot buy books on iPhone, but now you cannot see prices without effort.

Since the app is too irritating to use, I'll shop elsewhere until it is fixed.

title: membership
review: it‚Äôs been over a year that I have put my EBT card information on here but yeah I still get charged 1299 a month I don‚Äôt understand as far as a service I love it but I‚Äôm very very disappointed for having to pay 1299 a month when it clearly says you can get it for 599

review: It would be nice to have a highlighted ‚Äúadd to list‚Äù button next to ‚Äúadd to cart‚Äù button so that one could organize orders easier. At the moment the ‚Äúadd to list‚Äù is small and further down the screen making it hard and inconvenient

title: Keeps Crashing

I‚Äôve done all but delete and reload the app because I don‚Äôt know for sure if I can get back in it. I‚Äôm very frustrated right now because of this. I normally love the app and have no problems

title: Needs dark mode option
review: Love this app nothing bad to say about it other than doesn‚Äôt give you dark mode option plz change this sometimes screen is to bright, pretty annoying when shopping at night in the dark......

title: Please fix this
review: Whenever I‚Äôm looking at the recommended for you tabs it will almost always refresh the main page witch makes it very annoying to scroll through the page to get to the several different recommended lists since it sends you back to the start every time, id rather it never refresh then this happening

That‚Äôs the only flaw of this app. Please provide us light sensitive folk with a dark mode. Please.

title: Hate the new update

All the words are now way bigger and nothing can fit on the screen, can‚Äôt navigate to Prime deals for some reason, the menu looks horrible just sitting on the screen like that. title: App won‚Äôt open after recent update
review: I love the app! It normally works great but after my last update and restarting my phone, the app won‚Äôt open. I also can‚Äôt find we‚Äôre to get help for such a problem. Even the option of talking to a customer service person didn‚Äôt take me anywhere helpful.

title: Problems ?
review:
If you‚Äôre having problems with ordering or canceling, why don‚Äôt you place a phone call with customer service? Seems like people don‚Äôt realize how easy it is to get help. If your call goes to India and they can‚Äôt help (a common occurrence), just ask to be transferred to the USA. 

Don‚Äôt come on here and complain and be stupid.

title: Disappointed
review: This is the second time that this has happened to me where it give me an estimated time and I‚Äôm waiting for that day which is literally why I pay for prime to get a next day but yet I have to wait two more days to get my package and it‚Äôs a simple order I received half of my order and then I got a wait two more days for my other half where in the hell they do that I can order from Walmart and we‚Äôll see what the next day my whole order yeah I got one more trying or I want my whole money back there‚Äôs no point of me paying for this

title: What happened to Ratings link?
review: When I select Ratings, I should jump to ratings but nothing happens.  At least not since the update to the app.  I checked the online version, and the link jumps to ratings there.  In the app it‚Äôs blue, and it looks like a link, but nothing happens when I click on it.  Hope this gets fixed in a future update.  Until then, I‚Äôll use the online version. title: New app changes are useless and taking up too much space
review: The newest app changes serve no benefit to the user. It added 2 new rows of static stuff on my screen reducing the effectiveness of the remaining space. Please give me an option to switch back or something. What is wrong with having things in an easy to use fly out menu? Now there needs to be more buttons on my screen taking up valuable screen real estate? C‚Äômon, use your head when making changes and make it more user friendly not more obtrusive.

title: Thank you!
review: Thanks for finally fixing the app. It was so bad for the last couple weeks. Every time I‚Äôd search an item , I‚Äôd be scrolling down and it would randomly open items up. I‚Äôd barley touch the picture and it would open random products. So glad to see the update and it be fixed !

title: Software has bugs
review: The ‚Äúsave for later‚Äù option hardly ever works properly and this has been going on for months. After I select my product I would like saved for later the screen changes and says ‚ÄúNo items saved for later‚Äù no matter how many times I try. It‚Äôs very inconvenient to try several times hoping it works and time consuming when you need to place an order.

title: Filtering through is so slow now
review: I used to be able to search an item, then select as many filters as I want at one time to narrow down the results. Now it‚Äôs so frustrating I can‚Äôt take shopping. I can only choose one filter at a time, then it updates the results before I can choose another filter. So, I have to do this multiple times before I find what I‚Äôm looking for. By this time, I‚Äôm frustrated and over it. What happened to this app? Shopping used to be so easy. Not anymore :(

title: It was better
review: Don‚Äôt like that the iPad app changed to mirror the iPhone app. I get, trying to stay consistent across platforms, but it seems silly to not take advantage of the extra real estate on the iPad and hide the shortcuts in a drop down adds confusion to the experience, that negates any gain the extra add space is supposed to offer.  Also ‚Äúget off my lawn‚Äù;

title: Titles/pics on Order Confirmation page maybe?
review: Is there a specific reason why you guys don‚Äôt showing the successfully purchased items‚Äô names/pics/price on the order confirmation page? I wanna show the confirmation screenshot to my friends but no useful information contained on the screenshot. I have to tap away to the order history page to get the info. Considering to add them into confirmation page plz. Thanks.

title: Won‚Äôt let me log in
review: I had a previous version of the app a month or two ago but deleted it in order to stop spending so much. Fast forward to today, when I had to redownload so I can quickly reorder some cheap skincare. I got as far as putting in my email and password, when it redirected me to the one tome password. I clicked to resend maybe 40 times, but I never got an email, and I wasn‚Äôt able to click out of the sign in despite the back button. Very annoying! Considering how much I paid for prime, I expect that the app would allow me in!!

title: Love app
review: I love this app, I just have one request. I would like if you brought back the drag option that you can drag the item either to your cart or to the bottom of the page to your list. It would be nice to be able to put multiple things in the cart in seconds rather than clicking on the item, the add to list and then the list.

title: Search feature auto-routes to deal of the day
review:
At least once per day I spend the energy to type in the search box an item I‚Äôm looking for and instead I am auto-routed to the promotional deal of the day. 

The search item is not saved and I have to retype the same exact search criteria over again that I was trying to search for to begin with. 

Such a waste of time and I find it to be a super irritating marketing tool that makes me want to spend my money somewhere else where they design more a productive app for their users/customers.

title: Marketing Scam Tactic
review: I find it interesting that whenever I open the app and do a search and select the keyword from the search dropdown, it takes me to their latest heavily promoted product page instead of the item I am trying to search for. Not only is this annoying, it is obvious to me that they are trying to push sales of the kids echo dot by taking advantage of app users by driving millions of ‚Äúaccidental‚Äù traffic page visits to that product. Desperate and sad to see this happening.

title: No Design or Vision
review: The engagement and overall User Experience it forgettable. It gets the task done...that‚Äôs it.  0 out of 10 for product suggestions. 0 out of 10 for browsing, filtering, presenting products.  0 out of 10 for product page layouts. Pay some developers and UX designers and maybe your make a profit one year. You have the Infrastructure now stop being cheap and develop the software.

title: Please fix the bugs
review: I have run into this issue a few times, sometimes when I try to finish up an order, it looped around with one page which stopped me from finishing the purchases.  I was told to delete the app and reloaded it to fix the problem. Could you please fix the bugs?  Thanks!

title: Revised- Hate new app
review:
Ok- not sure what I was looking at this morning. The app was all in blue and difficult to navigate. Now I just went on my app and it‚Äôs back to normal. I don‚Äôt get it but I hate the version that‚Äôs all in blue.

From this morning (blue app): Can‚Äôt navigate as easily in previous version. Took me 10 minuets to figure out how to sign out. Really hate how the app is set up. Liked previous version much better.

title: Bad connection!
review:
I don‚Äôt know why, but for the past few months or so (I didn‚Äôt use the app as much before) I experience an issue with connectivity!!! Like 50% of the time! Like i could be on WiFi or my LTE and it will tell me I have no internet connection. Which makes no sense because I‚Äôm using my phone just fine with any other app that requires internet. So then i have to use safari instead and that works fine. But then what‚Äôs the point of the app?
Anyway, please address this issue! Thank you

title: My wish lists
review: When I select my lists the screen always defaults to a specific list. I would rather the app take me to the wish lists showing all my lists and not into ‚Äúkids list‚Äù for example. Every time I select my lists the app takes me into ‚Äúkids list‚Äù which is annoying to say the least. I did not see a way to default to the app showing ‚Äúall‚Äù lists.

title: Horrible customer service
review: Ordered an item with two day delivery, on 8pm of day two I finally get an email saying the delivery is delayed. Well I chat w the customer service rep and they tell me it will absolutely be arriving tonight, because they added me to the priority list, etc. two and a half hours later nothing. I connect with the customer service team again and they say that the item won‚Äôt come for two days. They literally lied to me when they could have told the truth so I could buy this stupid item from the store before it CLOSED! Horrible lying company.

title: Great except‚Ä¶
review: The latest update makes it difficult to tell where in the process my orders are. Please give us an option to filter out those that have already been delivered. And maybe let us sort based on expected delivery date.

title: Really needs Help!!
review: This app is in desperate need of help. If you ONLY use the mobile app you might be okay, but i  sometimes use a tablet. Iinformation does not cross. I changed my email address but not only did it not change it on the app, the app would not let me change it. I wanted to return a recently rec'd item and the order doesn't show up AT ALL under my account on my mobile device. There's more!  Really disappointing. They said they'd let there IT dept and other relevant people know about it. One month later....no changes, corrections or improvements!!

title: Damage to purchases
review:
I continue to receive damaged products. This time the cookies were flattened the ones with marshmallow. 

A couple of cans of the soup were  were cracked ajar allowing for leaks. 

I continue to receive damaged or short life cycle electronics. 

I‚Äôm unable to return the items for
Numerous reasons the biggest issue is I‚Äôm disabled. 

The app is difficult to use because as it goes through checkout process many product details are changed including price. I don‚Äôt understand why you offer delivery times I attempt to get soonest order and after purchase the delivery is totally out of wack compared to what was requested. The order details after purchases usually to match actual delivery details. 

If you can‚Äôt deliver don‚Äôt offer..

title: Getting everything you need
review: Thank you for making it easy for our family to shop at the convenience of our home, during these time give us more family gathering to look forward.?

title: Buggy app
review: Rating in hopes of the app undergoes another update. The app has been so buggy, I‚Äôm finding it difficult to even use. Every time I click on an item to see, the page glitches. I first I was able to click ‚Äúback‚Äù and click on the item again and that would refresh the page. Now any item I click on comes with a glitch that doesn‚Äôt allow me to see the product I want to see. Plus it‚Äôs causing my phone to overheat easily. Please get this fixed.

title: Just another ‚ÄúBig Company‚Äù.
review: Just another company that‚Äôs out of touch with things like ‚ÄúCustomer service‚Äù...it‚Äôs unfortunate. At the end of the day a review like this won‚Äôt matter as long as there making money, witch won‚Äôt stop. Crazy how many problems people run into on What‚Äôs supposed to be a simple and easy app. Bugs, poor customer Service, things that flat out don‚Äôt work. I could go into detail but I would be wasting my time.

title: Blank screen while browsing
review: This issue has been happening for many months without being resolved. I‚Äôve even upgraded to iPhone 13 thinking it may be my phone. While browsing an item, randomly the screen goes blank and then when I go back to previous screen the search result goes back to the top of the list so essentially loses my spot and I don‚Äôt remember what item I was viewing. It‚Äôs not just me, there are plenty of other reviews that point out this issue.

title: Buggy
review: Mine has been very buggy lately. I reach for an item and click on the item and then go to look at item pictures and then the screen goes white and it takes me back to my original search. I‚Äôve been scrolling several pages looking for something and found it only for it to disappear. Please fix.

title: Good App that Could be Great
review:
Eventually I can find what I want. Eventually!

Two improvements would be much appreciated:
1. Better search function that does not vacuum up every possible item. Why or allow a search for specific items only?
2. Why not an option to limit searches to vendors with Prime shipping?

title: Gift card
review: I think the gift card area is a bit behind the time. I would love to see the ability to name a gift card. For instance, if I have a child that gets one for her birthday, I would like to be able to name it so that I don‚Äôt accidentally use hers instead of mine. Please fix this. Even Walmart app has the ability to name gift cards.

title: Prime Membership
review:
Love prime, most of the time my shipment dates are accurate
 I just don‚Äôt like when my products are through mail. I always have to go to my local post office which is several miles away because they won‚Äôt deliver my packages to my address.

title: No Forward Arrow; No Return Arrow on Cart
review:
Re product pages: I can back track using left arrow, but if I want to go forward after having gone back there is no right arrow to do so.

Re Cart page: I can neither back track to product page after having entered the Cart page. (Could be a DSU* error on my part.)

*  Dumb stupid user error. üòÜ

title: Big fan
review: Very busy working more than 50 hours most weeks love the ability to shop when I want. Miss being able to shop on the one night a week off. Also like that money goes to a charity of people helping other people

title: Awesome shopping!!
review: It has always been a great way to get long distance shopping done conveniently. However, during these unprecedented times and this new normal, I feel very grateful for having this option of a quick & efficient shopping experience.

title: Annoying Notifications
review:
This app started issuing annoying notifications of products it thinks will be of interest. There‚Äôs an option to turn it off, but if you use it you‚Äôll be informed that smile-dot-amazon won‚Äôt be used and your selected charity will not receive donations.

That‚Äôs some pretty self-serving altruism, there.

I‚Äôll probably keep the notifications turned on, but with each one I‚Äôll remind myself that Amazon‚Äôs logo is more of a cynical smirk than a smile.

title: Love the app!
review: Using the app is so much easier for me.  I was accessing it through safari for forever and was reluctant to download the app because I have a million things on my phone but this is actually one I use often and now it‚Äôs just so much easier to get what I need.

title: What happened to Receipt downloads on app?
review: Great app until they removed the ability to send receipts via email on app. Very inconvenient to have to save image, go to another app (word/adobe/etc), save image, and email to just do a work expense report. Apple won‚Äôt let use website on phone if you have app, or if you can, beyond my knowledge. What happened to receipts download/share, directly from app?

title: Customer support
review: Literally the worst customer support I have ever encountered, after being on the phone for a half an hour answering all these questions about my account to get the phone number changed they told me I need to call back with more information. First of all I answered all those stupid questions and now you‚Äôre telling me I need to call back. I asked what else am I supposed to get I just answered everything. ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know‚Äù is all I get. Now I can‚Äôt access my account because they refuse to help.

title: Site layout stinks
review: I wish companies would learn that changing their website layout without improving it is really annoying to customers.  I‚Äôm guessing the company web designers try to prove they are worth the salaries they are being paid by convincing superiors that nonsensical changes are needed.  They aren‚Äôt.  They are aggravating to customers.  I dislike the recent changes, a lot.

title: Super laggy
review: App became supper laggy with last update. It‚Äôs hard to scroll down with page keeps wanting to scroll up. When I tap on something as well, it takes a couple of tries to open it. I was hopeful the new update that was just done would fix the issue but it didn‚Äôt. App is still glitching.

title: SNAP EBT And the app
review: It would be nice if the option to pay for groceries with a SNAP card didn‚Äôt randomly disappear every few months. It‚Äôs nearly impossible to find a way to add the card back to my account, and it always takes an hour or more to find how.

userName: fhvucycu ff jf itcit ur g
title: Not going to use the app anymore until they fix the payment problem
review:
Tired of buying stuff on this website just for them to tell me that my card was  Decline  two days ago if that the case stop telling people the payment was successful no Notification no type of warning when you go back on the app it says please fix payment issues   I did it on Friday said payment successfulItem will be here on Wednesday checked it today payment all messed up no
Item even ship smh

title: Feature Suggestion
review: Please consider changing the text color on orders once they ship like the website does.   The website had black text but once it ships, it turns green.  Makes it easier to tell the difference between processing and shipped status at a glance.

title: New update
review: The new update is not letting me see any images from others. I click the see more button and no images show even though there are many images provided by reviewers. No it‚Äôs not my Internet because everything works fine when I search something. Ever since it updates the see more images are not showing on my screen.

title: Loooooove this app
review: Why can‚Äôt you download/buy kindle books through the app by now? That‚Äôs a little frustrating to have to pop over to your desktop or mobile version when you have the app. Hopefully this changes soon üòä

title: Satisfied
review: My family and I have been ordering from here for years and sold items on here as well. What ever problems we had they disputed them quickly and we were left satisfied each time(no more than 2 times we had issues).

title: Never lacks perfection
review: I have not once ever had the slightest problem with this app. It's very easy to use. It's fast, accurate and so on point that it's practically automatic. Does anything and everything better than any other app and I have been using it for 6 plus years.

title: Cheap, just like the quality control
review:
1) The app itself experiences many crashes. I‚Äôve encountered this on several different types of phones. Often, components won‚Äôt load, it will time out, or disappear altogether. 

2) Ordering items is incredibly inconsistent. I can order the same product from the same sku and get something completely different the second or third time. 

3) With that said, there are a lot of dupes and no quality control. I‚Äôve received completely broken items, items missing pieces or parts, and so on. 

4) On top of that, there‚Äôs so many fake reviews at this point, it‚Äôs too difficult to tell if something is valid or not. 

These issues just keep getting worse and worse as time goes on.

title: Good service and doing business.
review: Almost all my orders have been delivered with much satisfaction. The things that have not gone as well I believe would be taken care of if I understood the app better. I have one order that I have not received and the merchant has not responded to text.

title: New app update
review: Really, really hate the new app icon folks. It is HIDEOUS!! I am embarrassed to even have it on my phone. Have hidden it on the very back page so I do not have to see it. Considering just going back to using the website and getting rid of UGY UGLY app. I chose a beautiful phone. An even prettier phone case. I have a beautiful photo for my background. Why would anyone want a hideous app icon junking up their phone?

title: Wow
review: The app is not working well at all, I purchased 6 items, the app is only showing four.  I have a copy of a 45 min chat where reps repeatedly asked for n item ID number, no matter how many times I explained to them that your app removed all the item info and purchase info and that I was not able to provide it. And today I posted a video and cannot for the life of me find where it is or how to remove it... but I did find your rating link unfortunately..it should NEVER be this hard to navigate your app or receive assistance from your reps..

title: False Advertising
review: Charge me 75$ convenience fee because it states I will receive it by 10 pm pay for it and then you decide to tell me it will be here by 10 pm tomorrow then have the audacity to try to explain it to me like it‚Äôs okay to falsely advertise a timeframe in which you could not uphold NOPE call it what you want I call it false advertising. I don‚Äôt appreciate being bamboozled into thinking you can provide me timely service and then you fail time and time again to meet timeframes OUTSIDE of the pandemic ? I got better service than this when the country was shut down !

title: Delivery address
review: When using ‚Äòbuy now‚Äô option, delivery address does not appear to be changeable. Tried to edit under ‚Äòorders‚Äô to no avail though I could edit other order parameters. I ended up cancelling the order and re-purchasing with cart which allowed me to change delivery address. Otherwise app works reasonably well.

title: Left out
review: Long time costumer.  I have been frozen out for no fault of my own and unable to get around your user unfriendly site to correct situation.  Your promise to contact me have not been kept.  I have been unable to obtain the books I needed to take with on a Caribean cruise.  Too late now.  Merry Christmas.

title: Shipment Tracking feature is not well implemented
review: Your application‚Äôs shipment tracking is unreliable, not up to date and mostly inaccurate. Could you please bring back the ability to copy/paste tracking information so that we don‚Äôt have to revert to using your web app in a browser just for that? Either fix your issue or let us easily revert to third party  apps for tracking, please..

title: Worth it
review: Of course most apps have issues but from my experiences I haven‚Äôt ran into many. Most items are at a somewhat decent price compared to buying directly from the store. Me and my sister use this app a lot especially for home decor and household needs. Definitely recommend having the app if you‚Äôre a frequent shopper and for easier access to the site!

title: Should be better
review: Really could be much better. I had a Honeywell thermostat and then we got a Nest. We added the Nest and then deleted the Honeywell thermostat from the Alexa app and it stays deleted for a few hours and then comes back. So when I tell Alexa to change the heat it won‚Äôt do it automatically because it keep asking which one.

title: Way too many taps required now!
review:
What happened?  Why can‚Äôt I tap on the drop down menu and tap all the filters I need?  Now I tap the prime button...then it goes back to my search.  Tap on the filter and pick the department...then it goes back to my search. Tap on the filter to pick the category....then it goes back to the search.  And I can‚Äôt even save my filters for multiple searches.  

It wasn‚Äôt like this previously, and it‚Äôs so incredibly annoying that I‚Äôve bought Christmas gifts on eBay because it‚Äôs now much faster.  Fix this please!!!

title: I love this app
review: Although I don‚Äôt buy anything I still like looking at items I‚Äôll need in the future.  it‚Äôs a very good app because you don‚Äôt need to buy whatever you look up it‚Äôs a very good app and I really do support it because it has merch that i like (Such as BTS items and shane dawson and a bunch of other items) so thank you for the good appüòÅ

title: Don‚Äôt like the latest update
review: Whenever i updated last, I can no longer just scroll endlessly through the product pages. After so many products I have to hit ‚Äònext page‚Äô and then if I decide I want to go back to the first one I have to hit ‚Äòprevious‚Äô however many times. I liked being able to just keep scrolling and then jump back up to the top if I needed to. Please change it back!

title: WWL alerts
review:
I receive WWL TV alerts but when I go to the app it never has the most current alert. I received an alert this morning Titled booze news. When I went to your app there‚Äôs nothing about what happened with the alcohol ban.
Also it appears I cannot post a review without giving you 5 stars. I would have given you 3 stars.

title: Needs work
review:
I can find products but can‚Äôt find where to print.  It shouldn‚Äôt be so hard. I use my phone exclusively and I stop purchasing from merchants that make me have a computer to print.  Put the print link on the order page.  Otherwise I‚Äôll
Buy the product somewhere else.

title: Worse every update
review:
First they took away the drag to list feature with the list bar being on the bottom, with that being the best and most convenient thing about the app taken away. Now I have to do all these extra steps to add stuff to my shopping lists and then after adding it, it doesn‚Äôt even confirm which list is was added to. 

AND TODAY my app was updated and now There‚Äôs no endless scroll and you have to click through pages only viewing maybe 20ish items. 

They also did something else a few updates that made returning items a bigger pain than it originally was. 

I swear, every update that comes out I feel like it‚Äôs becoming more and more inconvenient and it looks less and less modern. I feel like it functions like an app from 2009. Horrible.

title: Wish List Functionality
review: The functionality of the wish list has really been limited with this particular update. I don‚Äôt like not being able to open the list I want and then drag my item into it. Also wish there was a way to customize the home screen so you don‚Äôt have to surf through all of the crap you don‚Äôt wish to see or don‚Äôt use to get to your subscribe and save, for instance.

title: Bad classic view
review:
Thanks for trying but wow that‚Äôs a bad update. 
Not sure why, but my app now looks like a late 2010 version or a bad web browser version. Not a fan. The filters never really worked well for me before, but now it worse. I can‚Äôt see the result count or the quality of the results until I get out of the filter since it takes up the whole screen. It also doesn‚Äôt allow multiple selection. Just kicks me to view after each section. I have to select go to next page ... why? Just show all the results.  Boo

title: Well done!
review: Sometimes one LEGO set looks the same as another. And when I save it to a list I have to go through the list to see if it is one I already have on that list so it would be cool if you tried to save the same item you already saved a message or something will say you already saved it.

title: Not always easy to use
review: The screen sometimes goes blank while trying to choose options/colors and it‚Äôs REALLY frustrating. Sometimes I can get step by step updates of where my package is, other times I get nothing. I set my package delivery setting for my front porch but there are times that the package is left outside and I worry about package theft. I wish good delivery was more consistent and I wish the app worked better.

title: Glitch in 13.0?
review: Both my mom and I have been unable to purchase through the app since updating. It says that our password is wrong. I‚Äôm able to log in via the website, and I haven‚Äôt changed my password (which is saved on my phone). Obviously there‚Äôs a workaround, which is to use the website...but kind of negates the point of having the app.

title: Not perfect, but decent
review: I do like the wish list features, including the bar. However, the layout of the pages could be streamlined quite a bit. Also, it seems like you removed the Package X-ray feature, which is really disappointing as I have a pile of boxes that I now need to figure out by tracking number. A minor inconvenience, but why remove the feature?

title: Parents Beware!
review: Parents Beware!  I opened the app and X rated pornographic men‚Äôs sex toys displayed in the related to items you‚Äôve viewed section.  I sent an email complaining.  Customer service wrote and I‚Äôm quoting ‚ÄúI am sorry to know that the gifts for kids are not pornographic stuff.‚Äù  Totally unacceptable.  There needs to be a G filter when the app is first opened.  They need to fix the software to actually display products related to your searches.  Kids and grandkids borrow devices.  Customer service has no clue about the app.  Chats and phone conversations are nothing but frustrating.  BTW I‚Äôm a grandmother.

title: Keeps hijacking my first search
review: When I type in an item in the search panel, it brings up a list of matches.  But when I pick the one I want, instead of taking me to that item, it takes me to whatever Fire stick or Dot they are pushing that day.  My search is lost.  If I go back to the search list, it‚Äôs not even in the search history.  I have to type it in again from scratch. Only seems to happen for my first search of the day, but it is incredibly frustrating.

title: Idk what happened to search filters but they‚Äôre no longer useful.
review: Used to use quite a bit for auto parts but the search filters have degraded to so stupid. I used to be able to discriminate and see only parts to for my truck now it‚Äôs completely able to narrow my search parameters. For example searching for headlights for my truck, and even though I press the ‚Äúshow products that fit my vehicle‚Äù button it will show me every headlight and headlight related product ever created. There is no way to report this issue to developers.

title: Delivery Update Screen
review: When this app updated I can no longer view the Delivery Update Menu. I can still access it, but when I do the screen bugs out and automatic scrolls the screen up and covers it with a white background and you can‚Äôt scroll down to fix it. Then if you try to exit out of that screen the app just freezes and turns the screen white. I deleted and reinstalled the app but to no avail. I have a IPhone X and it‚Äôs updated to the latest OS software so it isn‚Äôt on my end.

title: Top tool bar is not functioning
review: My app updated to the latest version which was supposed to fix the upper tool bar functionality. It didn‚Äôt; it‚Äôs just gotten worse. The app now crashes after the toolbar stops responding. I could not find an easy way to contact the developers to report this issue. I would have rather sent a message, not call or have to rate the app. I haven‚Äôt had trouble with the app before this issue.

title: Latest version disables top menu bar
review:
Latest version disables the entire top bar on the iPhone 7 after switching in and out of the app. Must restart app to get it to work again. This is a significant bug that reflects very poorly on the app‚Äôs QA process.

Update: while this bug is fixed in the current release, no information is available regarding the status of the associated QA processes.

title: Almost 5 stars
review: I would definitely give 5 stars if there was a ‚ÄúDark Mode‚Äù option. That‚Äôs basically my only issue with the app. The white background is entirely too bright, especially at night. It would be tremendously better to have the option to not strain or hurt your eyes to shop.

title: Each item is a huge picture when scrolling.. let me change view settings!!
review: I hate scrolling when I can only look at one item at a time!! So frustrating because i want to be able to see an overview of the available items instead of scrolling an entire screen length before seeing the next one. It literally made me stop shopping just now because it‚Äôs too annoying.

title: App ‚Äúcorrects‚Äù your searches
review: Whenever I search for something, despite none of the words in my search being at all misspelled, the app feels it necessary to ‚Äúcorrect‚Äù the words I searched for by changing them to nothing at all that I wanted to see. This is the worst ‚Äúhelpful‚Äù change you could possibly make, especially on the ‚Äúeverything store‚Äù app where not everyone is searching for the most main stream products. Will not be using this for any holiday shopping this year.

title: Prime is a joke
review: Recently, most items listed as Prime eligible with an estimated delivery of 2 days have all had their shipment estimates updated to 2 - 7 days later than the original estimate. I understand there is a global supply chain crisis, however if that‚Äôs the case don‚Äôt advertise products with 2-day shipping if you can‚Äôt fulfill it. Then after the bait and switch with the delivery date, you can‚Äôt cancel the order until up to 2 weeks later. The service of this company has plummeted in recent years.

title: Hard to click buttons
review: When I click to see the reviews it doesn‚Äôt work till 10 tries later and when I try to edit my profile with a background picture, there‚Äôs no button to click and when I click add to list nothing happens

title: Great app
review: This app is very trusted and great quality. If you have prime your order take only 2 days to get to your house. Whatever you get is great. I would not recommend buying clothes. Other than the fact of their clothes being to big they are good quality.

title: Needs Option to Turn of Livestream
review:
Hey folks! It‚Äôs 2022 and there‚Äôs no DARK MODE???

title: To mini
review: I already had a bad experience with this app, but life is about second chances so I went on it to buy a new rug. So I searched up rugs and I found a pretty good looking rug, and I was excited to discover this rug was only $5.99!! I was finally satisfied with the app. Until it came in the mail the next day. To my surprise I saw a little tiny cardboard box. I thought it must have been mistake, but I looked into the box and I saw a miniature little rug about the size of my hand. And that‚Äôs why I don‚Äôt take second chances.

title: Bug

title: Constant freezing

It‚Äôs not just every blue moon it‚Äôs all the time I have to go back to previous page and reload page to get it to work until it does it again. Useless! Can‚Äôt tell you how many times I just shopped elsewhere because of this annoyance.  Reinstalling does nothing.

title: Confusing

And, I wanted to buy something and it said that it could come tomorrow if I ordered it within 45 seconds, and I did, so then it said it was arriving in 3 days, then it reset the timer and said order within 4 hours for it to come tomorrow, and everywhere I look for when it‚Äôs coming it says a different thing. title: Incompetent and greedy
review: They don‚Äôt refund even if they are the ones who take three days to push out a order even though I pay for the very unuseful prime membership which their raising the price of without improving their services. If you ask for a email to rate them don‚Äôt count on it because they don‚Äôt want to be rated poorly even if that‚Äôs in their job description. Switching to Walmart.

title: Account page keeps hanging
review: The loading capacity of images is bad enough, after a few updates, the latest one practically stall most time when trying to access account page. This app is supposed to make shopping friendly and easy and smooth, so we all can spend more money, yet the app performance has degraded. Fix and improve please!

title: Audio errors
review: When browsing the app and listening to music my audio will cut out when I close out of the app, it doesn‚Äôt matter what‚Äôs playing it always cuts out. title: Why the Ads in my Notifications??!
review:

But along with my purchase notifications come at least once a week alert that I need a specific desk lamp. Something is wrong with current version of this app bc this has NEVER happened before and my only option is to turn off ALL notifications.
Find a solution!

title: Great tires
review: I‚Äôve replaced my tires twice with these bad boys. First time was in 2019. I live in a small desert town so I drove pretty rough on the first pair. Sliding around the dirt roads and taking 25 mph corners at 45 + almost daily. 2 years later is when I decided I‚Äôd worn them down enough (outer patterns worn down to almost bald). They fit my 225 r17 audi rims snug on a 2007 vw rabbit.

userName: Eisa - A user of Yodawi app
title: Horrible Delivery in Egypt
review: It happened many times, in Cairo the delivery men tend to leave ur valuable packages with whoever there under the building, they once left my package with at the laundry and asked them to hand it to me, another time they left a sofa in the garage of the building and left, they asked the garage keeper to take my sofa up, and yesterday they left my package with the cleaner of the building who they met downstairs. Irresponsible, u professional and lack of work ethics by both management and delivery staff.

title: Round and Round
review: Checking out took forever. It keeps changing my delivery address back to my default then it keeps resetting the gift card message and from box. It also keeps resetting recipient‚Äôs email to blank. I had to do over for four times. Even applying my earned credits, I had to keep checking the box. It used to be easy, but it took me four times today before I was finally able to place my order. Every time I press continue, my checkout information resets to default.

title: Never frustrated‚Ä¶ALWAYS find what I am looking for
review: Why would I want to run around to shop, especially with Covid when I can shop and place orders 24 hrs a day. The return policy is great and customer service always pleasant and helpful. I don‚Äôt shop anywhere else except for groceries.

title: Nearly unusable now
review:
When I open the app on my iPad, it often has a big white rectangle for the bottom of the screen. It also gets the iPad orientation wrong. Used to be a useful app, but very hard to use this way.

Tried a number of things, like quitting the app, rebooting the iPad, etc. Nothing worked. It always opens thinking I‚Äôm in portrait mode, and, no matter the orientation, with a white rectangle across the bottom portion of the screen.

title: App update
review: The app update on or around September 10, 2021 is confusing.  There is a large portion of the screen real estate taken up by a white space.  It appears as though it‚Äôs a programming issue or a bug.  Not to have full use of the screen is less than optimal.  Also the app flips to portrait mode no matter the direction of the screen,

title: Fix pls

title: Order tab
review: Love the app, my only complaint and why I don‚Äôt give a five star review is because when you look at your order reviews you have to tap on order details in order to get the total order amount, so it‚Äôs a several step process, and I use this often when I‚Äôm banking and budgeting.

title: Becoming buggy
review: Used to be pretty user friendly and work great. Now anytime I open the app it just tells me something went wrong and they‚Äôre working to fix it. I miss a lot of the bargain options they had. Could get some cool stuff for pretty cheap. It is hard to shop, especially by category. Just doesn‚Äôt feel right for some reason. Otherwise it‚Äôs usually user friendly and customer service is always helpful.

title: Great app but
review: I love this app but I have bad vision and I don't like that I can't stretch and expand the text on my iPhone. I often have to look items up on the website instead so I can stretch and expand the type in the browser. Please add that feature to the app and it will be fantastic!

title: No share button feature on iPad
review: No issues on my iPhone. However, there is no share feature on the iPad. Ive tried closing the app and opening it again, it‚Äôs not there. I tried in different orientation mode, still not there. The ‚Äúview in your room‚Äù feature for furniture does not work on ipad either. I have to add it to my cart and then open it from my iPhone.

title: Very disappointed
review: Many items are listed as Prime items which should have 2 day shipping. Unfortunately in reality you very rarely get anything that is ‚ÄúPrime‚Äù in 2 days. I just tried to order a broom that was prime and it was going to take up to a month to receive it. If it can‚Äôt be delivered in 2 days because of availability, don‚Äôt list it as a prime item!!!!!!! Only list items as prime that are available and can truly be delivered in 2 days.

title: Delivering
review:
I just love the delivery and how accurate it is and it‚Äôs fast we don‚Äôt have to wait two weeks a week sometimes it does take a week but normally not but it‚Äôs amazing I know I want to tell everyone to please keep up the work because we love it.
                              Lynda S 
                              Delaware

title: Whoops curtains not lined
review: Found these new lined curtains as I have to return ones that came today because not lined and I ordered too many  Only critique is that on description should also highlight that 2 panels included. I hope the ones I just ordered look as good as the picture!

review: At least give us options for reusable sustainable packaging. Heck I‚Äôd pay a deposit and return it... products out there do exist for exactly this. Very poor coustomer service with or without prime membership.

title: It's ok, but I still use the mobile site.
review: They have ironed out a lot of my previous annoyances, but still not perfect. The current version is very buggy with regard to what information is available under what section. My search results are now popping up on all the tabs, including the account tab, can‚Äôt access the cart ‚Äî have to kill the app and open it again, do as much as I can before it gets crossed up again.

title: App is going downhill...use the website
review: The App has gotten buggier and less functional over time. I am now forced to mostly use the website. On the App, the add to cart button rarely works, the search function has a mind of its own and returns many unrelated results, and you no longer seem to be able to scroll through the pictures of the product.

title: App doesn‚Äôt include country settings
review: The app doesn‚Äôt allow consumers to specify the ‚Äúshipping country‚Äù. I have placed many orders that show a delivery date within 2 weeks only to find out that the product is held in foreign customs for over a month. Better off using the web site which gives this option.

title: Newest update is terrible
review: I can‚Äôt find anything in this latest update. The search feature doesn‚Äôt work at all like it used to. I can search for a specific item or brand and never find what I‚Äôm looking for unless searching multiple pages. I used to get it right on the first page. There‚Äôs also too many sponsored items that show up on the search list, making it even tougher to find what a person is really looking for! Please bring back the old version. This is not at all user friendly!

title: New UI is not great
review:
The new UI is pretty terrible. I thought the app was broken or  half loaded at first but the current looks seems to be intentional.

The home/menu bar has moved from being a collasable/hideable interface on the left, to a hovering bar, that cannot be hidden, at the bottom middle of the app. It‚Äôs more in the way during searches now.

I def prefer using the mobile web browser over this new version and will most likely avoid using the app unless necessary.

title: Buggy passcode
review: Even after clearing caches on all browsers on my 2019 IPAD mini with the latest fusion chip, the password system continues to circle back around in a do-loop ad nauseum. Customer service was no help. I refuse to purchase another Kindle..I have had five..and they break really fast despite gentle handling. Please fix.

title: Nintendo switch and playstation 4 controller package order
review: I ordered a package of nintendo switch a week ago and I did not get the date it arrived, then I canceled it and bought it again and now it does not work that it was sent and has remained the same since then I bought a playstation purchase 4 and it is the same as the nintendo package because neither of those two have not moved if they do not move I want my kids to return when I cancel because the first time I cancel they did not return my kids I hope that if I cancel this time if they do.

Worse yet, every time I do, and I go to another app to get my One Time Passcode, I get kicked back to Enter Email. Even when I finally get signed in, the app requires my Touch ID to get into orders or lists. All this drama right before Black Friday, and as a Prime member? Utter garbage.

title: Accounts broken

title: Trash
review: Only works if you already know what you are looking for. If you want to browse around or look at deals (like the lightning deals), you have to look at a different version. No access with new 15.1.0 iPad update. Just delete it. It‚Äôs a waste. Billion dollar company can‚Äôt even keep an app running efficiently. Spend yo $$ elsewhere. Customer service is even worse. title: Registry view options
review: The registry feature use to allow you to toggle between purchases and still needed. There now is no way to see between the view unless you‚Äôre on a computer. Is this going to be fixed? I would like to see this on my mobile device!

title: Current update October 2019
review:
I don‚Äôt really write reviews unless something is really good...Or really bad. 
So I‚Äôm pretty sure I haven‚Äôt been living in a fantasy world for the last few years but this app is like the early 2000s now. Where did the continuous scroll go? Why do I have to go back to seeing 10-20 items per page and pressing an arrow to see more items. Who decided that was a good idea? I don‚Äôt know if that‚Äôs supposed to be a (really bad) advertising attempt or a bug, but I haven‚Äôt used the app since I saw that. At least my bank account appreciates it.

title: Whose idea was it to make it hard to use the wish list tray?
review: I see I‚Äôm not the only shopper who is very unhappy that I can no longer drag items to the wish list tray, or hold an item down to delete it. Not a brilliant move making us go to the main menu to make changes to the wish tray!

title: Not user friendly anymore
review:
This last few updates have really gone down hill. There no more quick add to a wishlist at the bottom of the screen, this made Christmas shopping and gift shopping super easy. There‚Äôs  no more free scrolling instead you have pages. No other shopping app has pages! It‚Äôs inconvenient and takes longer for consumers to find products they are looking for.
Just over all these updates are not user friendly and I want to know if there‚Äôs a way to revert back to the older version at all.

title: Something‚Äôs broken
review:
Over the past week I keep getting error messages with cute photos of dogs (oops, something went wrong, try again) or (we couldn‚Äôt connect to the network, try again later). 
There‚Äôs nothing wrong with the network connection on my end. Getting frustrated. It‚Äôs supposed to be convenient. Right now definitely NOT.

title: Wedding registry
review:
When I open up the wedding registry, it has a pop up with a new feature. I have clicked on it, used it, and clicked ‚Äògot it‚Äô but it still shows the message every time I open it up. It would be nice if I didn‚Äôt get this reminder every time I checked the registry. 
Also, I loved the save and compare bar at the bottom of the screen. Not really sure why they took it away. It was one of the best parts of this app.

title: All the information and one compact place.
review: I love this app. It has all my information, current orders and reviews.  I am only one click away from finding out exactly where my package is and when it will arrive.  So whether I‚Äôm looking for an item, waiting for an item or leaving a review 11 I can do it all right here.

title: Super convenient, but
review: When I shop, I often like to consult with a family member or friend. Is this color good on me? Do you like this kind of cookie?  Are these the right size?  Etc. But I cannot see a way to ‚Äòshare‚Äô an item with someone else when I‚Äôm inside app.  Simply this would make my shopping experience  better.

title: Buggy
review: Over the last few weeks the app has been giving error messages and also taking a considerable amount of time loading for the search option (where you scan barcode or take a photo it the item). Please fix!

title: Needs work!!
review: I love this app it is great for what it has been made for. But  I always get please check your network connection. I get that quite often. (CS1). Can you please get this problem fix. Or  tell me what causes this problem. I have full service on my cell phone when I am getting this problem.  Thanks.

title: Reading my FB messenger?
review: I‚Äôve enjoyed this app for a while but now it‚Äôs getting far more intrusive. I accepted that it‚Äôs entrenched into my FB, occasionally showing me sales based on my search history as I skim my FB feed. What I can‚Äôt accept is being on FB messenger, getting pictures of Halloween costume ideas from someone else, and then receiving advertisements about those exact costumes. Twice. Having never searched for them myself. Picture recognition used on my personal conversations? Yea I‚Äôm done with this app.

title: Shipping issues.
review: Bought an item as it said purchase with in an hour and choose the shipping and get it guaranteed delivery 1-2 days later. Well the website wouldn‚Äôt update went over night with out it being shipped. Asked a few service people and got different answers saying oh it‚Äôs shipped and in transit blah blah.  Finally got a tracking number and their shipping info is totally different then what i was told. And that it shipped the day it was suppose to be delivered. And now it won‚Äôt be here for another 2 days..

title: Locks you out
review: If you want an app that locks you out of your account every time you sign in, then this is the app for you! Verification codes through email? Psh, only if they don‚Äôt work! How about being told your password is wrong? This app has it! Don‚Äôt worry, even if you type in your correct password, this app will tell you it is incorrect and lock you out! It is so wonderful not being able to check my orders! No more stress, I can just drive to the post office everyday checking my box. Gives me a peaceful 30 minutes during my lunch break.

title: Where are photos in reviews?!
review: Photos do not appear in the reviews regardless of item. I‚Äôve tried many different items and none of them show photos! Very frustrating when you want to purchase something, but you want to know what it really looks like, not just stock photos!

title: Customer Support chat feature doesn't work well with Gboard
review: I use Gboard on my iPhone and while trying to go through a chat with customer service, my screen kept jumping around and the text active text box is hidden by the keyboard. title: Can‚Äôt believe how buggy this app is
review: For such a huge customer-centric company, surprised they don‚Äôt put more effort into making a quality app. Literally constant issues, and not just small bugs but major problems that require me to restart the app just to browse products. You used to be able to sort your wishlist by price and filter your wishlist to items with price drops. Now those seem to be not showing anymore. Renders the wishlist pretty useless. Come on, guys! I want to give you money, but if I can't find things that's not going to happen!

title: Maybe a bug

It takes forever to get what I need. I‚Äôve never had any complaints about this app before until now.

title: Bugs in the app
review: When looking at an item it frequently goes blank screen and you have to go back and into the item again. When you go back the list of items you‚Äôre searching it at the top again and you can‚Äôt find the item. Downloading it again doesn‚Äôt fix the problem. Really annoying.

title: The best shopping experience
review: The variety is amazing, on top of that customer service has always been great. Never had an issue where I am not compensated. You can barely go wrong here. A life saver during covid. I‚Äôve ordered kitchens utensils to wedding attires. I confidently like to tick off my to do list here.

title: Customer service
review: Hello just to inform you that I had one of the worst customer service calls from your company. I never thought that I would ever have a point where you guys couldn‚Äôt help me. I‚Äôve had some real issues in the past and you guys have always come through to help me in every way shape and form. However this time I had a very similar situation. And you guys just simply could not fix it. Very disappointed considering how much money I generate in a years time on this website/ app

title: Update the update!

title: A Must Have App
review:
This app is a must have for anyone that  enjoys shopping online, not having to go in person to stores, and who might not live close to a grocery store or other superstore.  If does a great
Job of closing the gap of access to coimportant, fun, and even savvy products. Definitely download it!

title: Would be better if there were user customizations
review: Overall, the app is easy to use, but there‚Äôs little to no way to fully customize the user‚Äôs experience. Like, the app vibrates whenever you add an item into your cart‚Äî I can see how this is a great feature for some, personally, it drives me INSANE and I would rather turn off that feature, but there‚Äôs no way to do that.

title: Traversing a search response is tedious.
review: If I tap on an item in the query response list to get more information then return to the list of responses it goes all the way back to the first page. Looking at about 60 lamps and tapping on one for more info you can imagine how frustrating it is to be returned to the first page of the query responses. This did not happen in the previous version. I need to return where I left off to continue.

Orientation keeps flipping to vertical randomly, even though I have the iPad locked on landscape. And when it flips it cuts off a large portion of the right margin. Unable to shop anymore because Add To Cart is not visible. Also, if you‚Äôre looking at Used options, the screen cuts off even in landscape mode, and you can‚Äôt filter, see condition description or Add to Cart. Very disappointing.

title: Love the app but‚Ä¶.
review: I have found that, at times, it‚Äôs easier to find some products by using the website instead of the app.  Not sure why, bc one would think the exact items that are available on the website would be available on the app, but not always!

title: Shopping
review: The only place I shop because I know I can find whatever I want and always the prices are great. The time that I receive my merchandise is absolutely wonderful and I don‚Äôt have to go to a store and wait in line it comes to me. Encourage all of you to join

title: Well optimized for mobile, but...
review: The app is far better and smoother than the web browser website, but be careful about cheap Chinese goods. There‚Äôs a lot of mass produced crap that‚Äôs sold here so do your research to make sure a product is worth buying, you get what you pay for (:

title: App glitchy
review: Also poor delivery or never arrives, or is missing bottles,  can‚Äôt contact the seller directly, and can never leave reviews, positive or negative.  Unhappy with Amazon‚Äôs service lately.  When you call in, which I‚Äôve had to do numerous times, the employees are very good at saying they will pass on the information, but nothing changes.  They need to cancel any sellers who still use USPS as well!

title: Could not return a headset due to no transportation
review: Could not return a faulty headset due to no transportation nor a printer.  Stuck with something that doesn‚Äôt work and sitting in its box.  Oh well.  Seems to be the way it works out nowadays.  Not Amazons fault just wish it would have came with a return label just in case customer didn‚Äôt want it..   so the cookie crumbles.

title: Just too bad I can‚Äôt view products‚Ä¶
