Sure I can time something into the search at and see results, but when I go to click on it and view the actual product I‚Äôm redirected to the home page. Doesn‚Äôt matter if it‚Äôs something from my list, from a search, or even a suggested item. I literally can‚Äôt view or purchase any products! So far the latest update has just been terrible. 

I‚Äôm going to go and see if Etsy can help me find what I‚Äôm looking for,  or even my local Walmart.

title: Limits functionality for accounts at random
review: I have been unable to review or submit feedback for purchases for six months. One department will say it was a mistake and will be fixed. Another says it isn‚Äôt a mistake and I was reviewing for free products without providing proof. I‚Äôve never reviewed a product for a promotion or discount. This is an ongoing issue with many users. You can find the class action lawsuit online about it. Hopefully now that legal action is being taken they will address this issue.

title: Needs a update
review:
When you click on YOUR ORDERS I liked it the way it was. First showed outstanding orders that haven‚Äôt been delivered yet then the ones that have. Now you have to scroll down and find outstanding orders we‚Äôre still waiting for. Not convenient at all. PLEASE CHANGE IT BACK. 
THANKS.

title: Fantastic application. Not so the company.
review:
No company should have the power to curtail free speech by pulling their servers from a fledgling new service based on free speech and the first amendment. The app is only as good as it‚Äôs ability to generate sales. 
I‚Äôm sure the repercussions of your poor judgment will be reflected in your p and l statements, loss of revenue from approximately 70 million people.

title: I‚Äôm canceling all my subscription
review: I‚Äôm disappointed in the acts of choosing who I can or can not vote for!! Your a horrible company and I hope you loose more and more costumers over your views only matter. Democratic views are a discrimination against all Americans. Even their own party. I‚Äôm sad you all  are bullies and it‚Äôs sad you can‚Äôt stop internet bullying and kids killing them selfs over bullying but you can take down our president!! Completely heartless and pathetic!! I hope people see into your one sided views and stoop using ur services!!!

title: What is up with this app
review: I have never had a problem before. But for the past few months. It‚Äôs been awful. I keep getting stuck. I‚Äôll click on a product and get stuck on that page, with no way to navigate out. title: Why did reviews get removed from the app?

No more departments or categories to look through, or deals or anything, it‚Äôs just irritating now unless you know exactly what you‚Äôre looking for and can type it in the search bar or ‚Äúask Alexa‚Äù‚Ä¶

title: Delivery Tracking
review: On checking a shipment delivery for today, I noticed an update to the app.  I could see where the delivery truck was relative to my delivery shipment.  Super Cool!  I don‚Äôt know when it starts track but when I first checked the app it was 4 stops away!  Like this new feature!!!

title: Terrible Customer Service
review: They logged me out of my account and when i tried to log back in my password wouldn‚Äôt work. So then i tried any other possible passwords i would use which i have WRITTEN DOWN and none of them worked. Then i tried to reset password and when i entered my FULL NAME which they had asked to, it said it didn‚Äôt match my account and locked me out of it. Its ridiculous how difficult they make to get your account back, now i cant track or see any of my orders.

title: Mostly Amazing
review: My experience has been good for the most part. Sometimes it gets annoying when items aren‚Äôt delivered correctly, and customer service is not always the best. I‚Äôve had a few interactions that were unacceptable, but I seem to get my issues resolved eventually.

title: Can‚Äôt see grocery orders.
review: You cannot see any information on grocery orders on the IPad app version, why would you make an IPad version that does less than the phone phone version. It says to see anything, anything at all you need to look at the phone app or to look at it in a web browser. It makes no sense. Not only can you not order groceries at all in the IPad app, but you can‚Äôt see what you ordered, when it is going to get to you, or track your placed orders. Zero support.

title: Garbage update
review: Horrible update. Add to cart button suddenly appears on the bottom right when scrolling through product descriptions and reviews. For right handed users, i end up adding items to cart multiple times just scrolling through the description. Poor UX developers. Probably though a button closer to the finger means hey maybe the customer will add to cart and just end up buying it! Horribly disruptive to me and will reducing my mobile app usage. I can live with other quirks i. The redesign.

title: Bad Update for IOS
review: What happened?  I updated now none of my orders show on this app, no order history, no auto deliveries, nothing... I got a delivery day no update ... please fix this issue so I can edit my auto deliveries and monitor what is being delivered to me.  This is so frustrating

title: Enhancements and Bugs Needed
review:
App was just saying ‚Äústill loading‚Ä¶‚Äù this morning. Don‚Äôt understand the lack of caching in this app. Also, the registry gives me notifications that items are unavailable, but when you click on them it takes you to your entire list. You can‚Äôt filter by unavailable items either. Navigation menu can be hard to navigate as well.

Unnecessary app crashes.

title: Payment methods
review:
The app doesn‚Äôt give you the opportunity to select two at once when using your gift card. So you‚Äôre forced to submit with gift card first then gave the remaining balance declined to be able to pay the difference on another card. Pls help change this 
Thank you

title: Best online shopping experience.
review: They‚Äôre always right on time, and a lot of times early. I‚Äôve never had a problem with my things not showing and I order car parts and mods on a regular basis. I highly recommend them over eBay.

title: Very nice customer service
review: Amazons app is very easy to use! They have fast shipping and super friendly customer service. They‚Äôll take care of everything for you and are very nice. The format of the app is well organized as well to you can easily keep track of orders.

title: Language was changed
review: My language was changed from English to Spanish after being a customer for several years.  I‚Äôm pretty sure this was some kind of political harassment, but I can‚Äôt prove anything.  Sure hope they can control their Employees.

title: Less Chinese products
review: Read title. Less cheap Chinese products need to be listed on the site. Otherwise, be straightforward and require sellers to notate in an easily visible spot where their product was manufactured. This is required in most states. Five stars if the change to the app is made to visibly list where a product is made.

title: Accessibility
review:
I am visually impaired and find your app one of the harder ones to use.  There is not a setting for larger print. And when scrolling through a search page, you can‚Äôt enlarge the page.  
However, you can enlarge when you click on an individual item, so that is a start. But, I do think the app could be improved for the visually impaired.

title: Constant issues & customer service not customer friendly
review: I‚Äôve been having issues placing an order, when I contacted customer service they said it‚Äôs not in their end but not friendly.  They made me feel stupid and I find that poor customer service. Still haven‚Äôt solved issue and I‚Äôve cleared cache & reset app and still having issues!

title: Usability issue here and there
review:
The order search text input field takes just long enough time to show up to make me not sure if it‚Äôs working or not. So I often double tap it which makes it then slowly disappear. The whole process takes long enough to annoy me.

Cart view often stays blank with no way of quickly refreshing it.

title: Annoyed
review: I know around the holidays shipping gets busy but if I pay the 100+ dollars a year to get two day shipping on prime items, I expect it to be two days. I understand the weekend will add a couple days but it shouldn‚Äôt add an entire week. Packages keep coming later and later, and I get my text messages saying my package arrived a day after they arrive.  They are no longer compete in prices either. I definitely won‚Äôt be renewing my prime next year unless things start to change. Screw you Bezos!

title: Not working on iPad
review:
The app simply does not work. It rejected a valid password twice. After I finally got logged in and attempted to place an order, the response was ‚Äústill loading‚Äù. Logging in from the online site is faster, easier, and much more user friendly than this app. 
When I need to order something, I will use the online location. The app has been deleted from my tablet. So much hype about  speed and convenience, doesn‚Äôt matter unless it actually happens.

title: IPad App has Functionality Issues
review: This recent release has problems operating on the iPad Pro for 2019: click on the Ratings link when you land on the Product page and you don‚Äôt get directed to the consumer comments; instead, nothing happens. The older version of the app displayed a product that when you clicked on it, would pop up in an expanded view with close up of all the loaded images. Now, you hover to magnify a single section of the displayed image.

title: Like Old Version Better
review: The new version just mimics the online website. Unfortunately, in how it lets you view item images as well. In the older versions, clicking the item images brought up big, beautiful photos of the item. Now it‚Äôs small images OR a magnifier over individual parts of the image, which isn‚Äôt helpful.

title: If it ain‚Äôt broke..
review: ...don‚Äôt fix it. Overnight and without updating on my part (I manually update apps) the header is a hideous pastel mint green that I might have liked as a 13 year old girl, and there is a floating menu bar at the bottom containing my cart, home, etc. This menu bar blocks a good portion of the screen, and jebus forbid you accidentally tap on it while scrolling through products because your place is lost. Change this crap back or give people the option to minimize that stupid lower menu bar while searching products

title: Hate the new update
review: This latest update ruined all my settings can‚Äôt get deliveries everything says no delivery to my area and all my orders have been erased I have to go to the main site because the app is useless now this needs to be fixed

title: Need subscriber preferences
review: Can you guys put a ‚Äúsubscriber preferences‚Äù   filter under the subscribers section so that our searches are tailored to our preferences? One thing I would love is a ‚Äúmaterials‚Äù filter. That would allow me to search for merchandise made of cotton as I cannot wear some of the other materials.

title: Very disappointed and mad
review: I loved using this app to look for stuff for my house and recently bought a mattress and dinning table but now every time I go back after having already done it I have to revise payment method when I have already done it before and it changes the day of delivery. I have been waiting and waiting for them to get delivered and I‚Äôm still waiting

title: Disappointed with how this app has gone down the drain
review: I use this app a lot and off late it has become really crappy. Asking users to sign in, selections in cart go missing, delayed response to touch, just too much lag everywhere. Very frustrating, so much that I had to leave a bad review

title: Guaranteed delivery? Not
review:
Ordered some things with guaranteed delivery. One of the items was part of a gift I was bringing to a dinner that night. Delivery was between 3 and 6 so I rushed back home, but no it never came. 
So I came home expecting it to be there. Nope. 
I drive an extra 30 minutes! I wasted my time, fuel, etc. 
I could have gone to a local store instead. 
I am very busy and plan my time. I have almost no free time. I plan my deliveries so I can get them. I‚Äôm often away for long periods and don‚Äôt want deliveries hanging out for days or weeks on a porch. I need dependability.

title: Never got my credit
review: I downloaded the App because the website said I would get a credit for doing so and another credit for making a purchase but I then never got the credit and when I contacted customer service about it they wanted me to find the emails/proof that I was promised a credit. So before anyone else does that make sure you screen shot whatever popped up that promises the credit or you will never get it. I don‚Äôt like having lots of apps on my phone, if they aren‚Äôt giving me the credit I am deleting it.

title: Stay logged in!!!!
review: Unless I‚Äôm blind the app does not have a stayed logged in feature. Every time I close it I get logged out. Seriously annoying to the point when I do the second login authentication from my email it refreshes AND I HAVE TO START OVER!!!! started with 2 stars, but as I continue it went to one. Stupid app

title: I don‚Äôt like it
review: I don‚Äôt like the new update and having to hit next at the bottom of the page and side by side pics.  It should give a list or grid option like other apps.  And if there has to a be next option make it adjustable for number of items per page.

title: The continuous browsing
review: I like the app. I would have given it 5 stars but because of the changes from continuous browsing up and down to currently you have to keep hitting next and back with many sponsored items, it is slowing shopping and irritating to the point you want to stop shopping and go to the store because it is faster. I don‚Äôt want to go shopping in a store. Please bring this feature back.

title: Frustrating
review: I am finding it easier to read on my phone but having a hard time getting or my specifically buying the book for kindle. I had promo credits and even gift card money but can‚Äôt seem to use them for kindle books.

title: Horrible update
review:
I used to LOVE the app. The latest update has been buggy and no longer has my fav feature! Lately when I search for items or I add something to my cart, there is an error and says to check back shortly. I couldn‚Äôt use the app for several days. 
The drag and drop feature was a very useful tool. Especially when using it to compare items... I‚Äôm disappointed and hope the feature comes back and these bugs are fixed!

title: ‚ÄúNetwork issues‚Äù often render this app pointless
review: This app regularly tells me my network or data connection isn't strong enough for the app to work. So then, I open Safari or another browser, and then, with the exact same data connection, I easily complete searches and purchases outside the app. When it works, however, it's great.

title: Used To be my favorite App!! :)
review: App is not functioning with voiceover on. As a visually impaired person, the app was amazing for searching, shopping and so on. Now, I only get 4 items in a search as long as voice over is on. I turned it off and had my sighted friend look at the search results page...he said they were there all I needed to do was scroll down. So, I turned it back on, alas, won‚Äôt scroll down past the first 4. This is crazy! I‚Äôll be dropping my Prime membership at the end of this month...no point in keeping if I can‚Äôt use it!

title: Hacked..no customer Service
review: My account got hacked, password I‚Äôve had for years coming up wrong,  I called advising of an unauthorized purchase and they could not would not help me even after requesting to close my account due to a HACK. Then I was hung up on. Sent an email with the same complaint and request. No response.

title: Interface issue
review: I cannot enter a new form of payment (credit card) the entry of expiration date does not work, it should bring up month / year lists but does not when I touch to update, the screen greys out and is scrollable but no choices of month / year are available

title: PO Box

Talked to customer service and they were absolutely pathetic. Got switched between different people and nobody could give me a clear answer why.

title: Sudden weird formatting
review: iPad version of the app has come down with the flu. Product descriptions & questions are all crammed into a long, skinny 1‚Äù column of text making it virtually unreadable. Ordering has become glitchy, too; often when there is a size or color option the pop-up window won‚Äôt scroll, or the order button is obscured. Super irritating. Bezos has all the money on the planet but won‚Äôt fix his stupid app.

title: Good as far as it goes but a lot missing
review: I‚Äôm constantly bumping into things I can‚Äôt do on the app. Today I was looking for Kindle books by a specific author. There‚Äôs no way to access the Author page, and I can‚Äôt purchase Kindle books from the app, even though I can purchase just about anything else. I could better understand these limitations on an old iPhone, but on a new iPad it seems really backwards.

title: Buggy
review: Please fix this bug. If I type in the search bar and select one of the pre-filled suggestions (instead of typing my whole search), the app takes me to a link from the home screen, instead of to my search results. It‚Äôs as if when I tap on the suggestion, the app doesn‚Äôt realize there is a drop down I am trying to tap, but thinks I‚Äôm still only looking at the home page.

title: Somethings wrong
review:
iPhone 7+ iOS 11.0.2 app version 9.18.0
Lately I have noticed when making purchases with the buy now option it not only makes the purchase but also places the item in my shopping cart. I can see people getting confused and buying items twice. Other then that have had no issues with app.

title: I love it
review: This app is literally where we get all of the things that we need off the top of our head you kneed socks they have it you need a golf club they have it you need leggings they have it you need a birthday gift they have it they literally have everything

title: Please check the excessive data drain
review: When I pull up a storefront for a seller, data pull-down shoots through the roof. 200mb/sec is unnecessary for a shopping app that should have image caching & does not provide video as its main medium. Might want to check on that leaky data for both wi-fi AND cellular. This also occurs with the web version so I think something dreadfully needs to be addressed for both. Low bandwidth to data saving versions, please... corporate, uber-giant bent on farming all of our data & impulses, Ama-bezos.

title: Feels like a con
review: It‚Äôs all good until you don‚Äôt receive a package, or you receive a damaged package. They give you the run around when trying to order another because of said situations. When you should be able to take a picture, send that picture in, and have another item shipped out to you. On top of the inconvenience of the shape your package is in (if you receive it at all), you‚Äôre inconvenienced with having to take that package somewhere to return it. Straight up con.

title: One highly annoying issue
review:
when using a mouse with the iPad, you cannot click on the cart, or any of the icons at the bottom of the screen because of an issue with the mouse snapping to the home button.

Also consider adding a widget for shipping updates, that we would be able to put on the Home Screen of the phone.

title: Always reliable

title: Annoying ads
review: As a paying prime member I am infuriated by the auto playing video ads with no evident way to turn this off. Considering looking elsewhere for a ‚Äúshopping‚Äù app because of this experience. I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôll buy things through the app but no longer care to browse deals or what‚Äôs available as a result of this annoyance.

title: Overly Complicated
review:
A simple task, such as verifying your current address, can not be done without jumping through hoops. It should only be 1, possibly 2, clicks to get here. 
There is no easy way to get to account information, instead this app takes you to your buying history.
And the customer service phone number needs to be accessed without forcing customers to deal with an online bot, that works very poorly.

title: Put orders in order

This isn‚Äôt stupid Facebook please put things back how they were and fire the idiots who thought it was a good idea.

title: Works but..
review: The app is great for finding things. Shopping..so forth. My current problem is that after I search an item..it sometimes gives me a white blank screen. It doesn‚Äôt load. I just have to re search what I was looking for and start over. It‚Äôs irritating. Can y‚Äôall fix this?

title: Disappointed

Multiple packages of mine had that issue. I know there is the A to Z Guarantee but its for a limited time and it takes time for a package to arrive and not only that but those sellers KNOW how long to wait before deleting their account and stopping all contact with the buyer, disgusting app, terrible customer support.

title: United States Vendors
review:
Please actively find companies that are located and made in the USA. If you read ANY customer questions on ANY item the question of ‚ÄúMade in the USA‚Äù is asked. I realize you have warehouses and sell in other countries but please! for the US citizens seek out USA companies to sell with you. 
To the Marketing Team Thank You!

title: Worst update ever
review: Updated (again): Another horrible update. It crashes every time I‚Äôm on it, and it‚Äôs totally obsolete. Allllll that money and this company still can‚Äôt make a functional app, it‚Äôs laughable. This app makes my entire phone crash EVERY TIME I use it. The screen randomly goes white when I‚Äôm on the app and it restarts me from the home page. With the amount of money you people make it‚Äôs insane to see how horrible the app interface has become. Fix it or I‚Äôm not going to use the app.

title: Good shopping app
review: This app is so freaking awesome and helpful too. You can never get enough of it according to this app there is no other better app than this latterly. My parents are freaking like they won‚Äôt stop they just never stop my hole family is still in love

title: Customer Service Needs Improvement
review: Extremely hard to get customer service when issues arise, have to work thru numerous automated responses before you can reach someone, Then the individual you‚Äôre in contact with is not qualified to assist, so you‚Äôre explaining yourself yet again hoping to get something resolved, only to have to explain yourself 2 more times to others. Very Disappointing given Amazons size.

title: Quality of product and customer service both have come down

Too often damaged product wasting time in waiting, opening and repackaging .. customer service interaction also deteriorating.
I see a option to give feedback for merchants with review but not sure where else to give feedback on Amazon‚Äôs quality itself. 
Prime video content also became worst with time and no match for other streaming services , everything worth watching is paid now üòïüòï

title: Prime Has it All!
review: There is no better shopping experience, customer service, conflict resolution nor  availability of product! Prime offers the best prices and most efficient and fastest delivery times. My go to for all my needs from clothing, self care, home improvements, gifts etc.

title: Woks great a bit klunky
review: I give this app before rather than five because while it works perfectly and I‚Äôve never had a problem using it ever it‚Äôs a big clunky and slightly old-fashioned in terms of iOS mobile apps it needs a refresh. However that being said I like the app, I use it all the time, I trusted,

The changes made to the browsing experience makes it harder to order stuff I need. it took all five fingers to add an item to cart the problem is the listing is zoomed in and rubber bands back every time I went to see the full page the page is so zoomed that the buy now and add to cart buttons are hidden away and made unusable 
I was happy before this change was implemented now I‚Äôm forced to go to my pc when I need something quick

title: Love app but‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶.
review: I have used this app for years on my phone and tablet. It works great and is simple to use. One thing I would LOVE to see is an option for increasing the font size. On the tablet we can‚Äôt even zoom in on the description. It really is a pain. Please let me know if there is something I can do or add the necessary options.

title: Mediocre considering the resources available.
review: This website and app aren‚Äôt great, especially considering the financial resources available to the company. The menu and filter functionalities are seriously lacking. You‚Äôd think they could try a little harder, but I guess when you‚Äôre making billions with a mediocre product, you don‚Äôt have to make it better.

Painstakingly  aggravating following instructions when sending gifts to 3rd parties, different addresses, different phone#, using credits for payment, selecting gift receipts, adding different payment methods, different phone #s, combining # of boxes to be delivered. If you‚Äôre lucky and do it right the first time, you won‚Äôt have to cancel order and do it all over again.
Great if you use this every day and all info is previously saved.üôÄüòüü•∏üò´

title: So easy to shop

title: Doesn‚Äôt order

But it‚Äôs in my ‚Äúbuy again‚Äù section? That makes absolutely no sense. And instead of putting those items in my ‚Äúbuy later‚Äù they just vanish. So I have to go back, find all the items again, and then make sure they are all my size. An absolute waste of time.

title: Why?
review: I just finished ordering and I went to check my order to see the information about the shipping,etc and it just logged me out of my account? i tried logging in and it won‚Äôt let me. And it says ‚Äúwait 24 hours for us to check, your order might be delayed or cancelled‚Äù like üòê

title: So great and helpful
review: I‚Äôve bought enough lots of stuff and all of them were great. All though I bought something and it never arrived and I went to customer service and they helped me and they did a great job helping. I‚Äôm getting help and they are just the greatest.

title: Doesn‚Äôt work

title: Big trouble/ Scared
review: So I had stuff in my cart but haven‚Äôt bought it I then come to my account and see it hacked someone put my information and a fake visa card and it said something about billing details and they sent information and it said to wait 24 hours to identify and stuff like that but now i can‚Äôt enter my account and i‚Äôm afraid it will get worse and something bad is going to happened. title: Don‚Äôt like this
review: I got something and it was not purchased and it just came and then It took money off my card so I returned it cause I did not buy it just came under my account and it said that it gave me a refund on my card it took more money off my card then I reported it and it took more money off my card so it buys a phone and then I never come and it still take 500 dollars off my card so then I returned it it‚Äôs like 300 dollars returned nothing returned so then I go grocery shopping my card is declined so I recommend don‚Äôt this stupid dumb app

title: Always awesome selection

title: pin the task bar on the top of the window

title: Prime
review: I am disappointed that I have paid for prime and now shipping doesn‚Äôt happen in two day‚Äôs. title: Gross buying from the retailers themselves or Walmart...

title: Great app, new bar is odd experience

Kind of an digital bandaid. Feels like they wanted to change the app, but didn‚Äôt really just threw a couple buttons on top. Amazon‚Äôs made a great service though and the app is a great way to check orders, place orders you name it.

title: I need my copy and paste back!
review: The app overall isn‚Äôt horrible, but I prefer copying and searching my tracking information on my own since tracking updates on the app is always a day late... bring that back and I‚Äôll give 5 stars

title: Copy and Past is removed?

title: App is not working on I phone 11

title: Latest update just crashes app

title: The best App
review:
It‚Äôs very convenient and easy to use.

title: Hidden selections

On the contrary, I have been unable to find this option in order to change it.

title: New update is super confusing

Honestly it makes me want to cancel my subscription it‚Äôs so bad. And that‚Äôs saying something.

title: I slightly hate it
review: I‚Äôve had my own account for several years now to just order some things I want every now and then but a few days ago my mom wanted me to use the teen thing so she could use her account to allow me to get free shipping, I thought it was a good idea so we did that but now my Alexa speaker won‚Äôt connect to my account or even do anything but besides that, the app is fine for ordering and stuff

title: Security sign in has glitch
review: The recent two step process in This app has a glitch where it is in an endless loop and won‚Äôt let me sign in. On a device that I‚Äôve used to shop with them for a long time.   Not a good problem to have right before seasonal shopping begins as it prevents me from accessing the app.

title: Change settings
review: I would have given more stars, but I‚Äôd like to be able to sort by the same way I can on a computer. I only want to see products with 5 stars or that are a certain price, etc. If it had those features I might give it at least 4 stars.

title: The new update has sent me back to Walmart

It‚Äôs too much hassle to remember what page number I found something on so rather than keep flicking to the next page, I‚Äôve just gone and found what I needed at Walmart instead. 

I guess if you‚Äôre trying to lower the number of customers using your app and send them back to shopping in real stores, then you‚Äôve achieved your objective.

title: Search bar/ Back button?
review: App worked fine in till recently. After a while if I want to go back to where I was or  try searching it does not register my tapping. My other apps and phone work fine. I have to exit out of the app and reload it every time I want to search now :(.

title: Keep getting billed even after I turn off auto renew setting.
review: I keep getting billed for the month after even when I turn off the auto renew setting to STOP charging the 14$ to my card! THIS COMPANY HAS BEEN GREAT UNTIL IT STARTED RENEWING MY SUBSCRIPTION WHENEVER THEY FEEL LIKE IT ! this is wrong ! You can‚Äôt keep playing with my money like that ! If I could give this service a negative star I‚Äôd keep on clicking it until my fingers break. I‚Äôm very upset with how you run business, your supposed to be honest to your customers like taking money from them when they don‚Äôt want it taken.

title: Hard to read...
review: I‚Äôm not sure when it happened but trying to read anything about a product, reviews, questions, etc. I get all of this information jammed in right third of the screen on 2 different iPads and an iPhone. Extremely hard to shop for anything right now on the app. The search screen and results are fine, just the part you‚Äôd use to actually make a decision is messed up. Guess I‚Äôll wait for an update and see what happens.

title: % 100 honest
review:
(Note: I only do review if something really impressed me or if something really pisses me off. ) 

I ordered my product yesterday it said it was out of stock but that they will be back in stock and that I‚Äôll get my package by July 11 so i was okay with that. Sometimes after you type and send your question the bar stays frozen when the representative responds to you so in order to reply back you have to exit chat and enter again. Please fix

title: Business account
review: I would like to search thru my past purchases further on the app. My friends personal account you can choose years but on my business app it only goes back a few months

title: Monthly payments gone???

All of a sudden, that option disappeared and that was the biggest reason I kept prime all these years. Contacted customer service and those idiots were of no help at all. And yes they‚Äôre idiots. They have no idea what they‚Äôre even talking about half the time and it‚Äôs beyond frustrating

title: Very disappointing app
review: The app is so buggy that makes me want to never open it again. One, it takes many seconds to load results sometimes. Two, the back option to go back to results just goes away and i have to search again and put filters all over again. Three, while looking at the product the whole product page goes blank and all that‚Äôs left is search bar ughh, which forces me to start over. Infuriating!!

review: Good overall except when you click on the images of a product. It often goes blank and the only way to get out of it is to click the back arrow till you get out of that product. Very frustrating. I have tried a remove and install and run into the same problem.

While scrolling the deals section it's automatically routing me to some summer deals page I am not clicking on. I have to press the back arrow and start over.

title: Maybe a bit expensive
review: They always have something interesting to search for but most of the time the product is a. It over priced. But they make up with it with great deals sometimes.

And im also scared that it will change again and again, and then ill never get my package. I had my hopes up for nothing

title: Locking out of accounts
review: Every time I go over price I get locked out cause of suspicious activity I only spent $100/$200 why am I getting kicked out you expect people to just by one $5 item and something you can do if you suspect suspicious activity is delete the credit card information and send a message to our gmail a lot less time consuming and it won‚Äôt be kicking me off my kindle fire you‚Äôre making everything complicated when it shouldn‚Äôt be

title: Must Have
review: This app is my right hand. I keep lists and do my beauty/hygiene and apparel orders here as well as gifts, etc. I don‚Äôt know what I would do with this app. It‚Äôs very user Intuitive and super easy to use with little to no hiccups. If you don‚Äôt have it, you are truly missing out.

title: Do this app

title: New button request

title: Stupid Shipping
review:
I would never have purchased ANYTHING from you if I knew you would require a signature on delivery. My UPS service is very erratic. He may come in the morning or maybe in the evening. Most folks here use the address of the only. Business in town as a delivery address. Driver just drops packages off in the same place.

But YOU specify a signature needed. I‚Äôm supposed to park at the address and wait all day hoping he will show up.

No matter how this turns out, I‚Äôll not buy ANYTHING from you again.

title: Mostly Christmas, hide orders
review: My wife and I use this account. It‚Äôs hard to hind gifts that we buy each other. It would be nice to find a way in the app to archive. Fix the glitch!

title: Great but
review: It‚Äôs a good app, but the browsing history should always in front.  Also,  a better filter system per type of product can narrow down to specific items‚Ä¶.making search faster.

title: Good app, but has a bug when viewing other peoples wish lists
review: Every time I view my friends wish list it gets stuck in the same spot after I try to scroll down, then when I try to scroll down more I can‚Äôt then I end up going back to where I last left off

title: Look Inside
review: All the app needs is the look inside feature for books. You can download a sample and read it in your kindle. Doing too much. With look inside online is only one click. Also, on online, they give both features. Look inside and download a sample.

title: You call this an upgrade ?
review:
Obviously the new app is still work in progress.  Are you developing further support for iPad in landscape mode? The app was more convenient than the WEB site, before you ‚Äúenhanced‚Äù.

title: Recent update & redesign is not worth using
review:
The September 2021 update and redesigned app is worthless. It can't orient itself to the device screen and the default is skinny/tall instead of wide/short. Also, there's a notable band along the bottom where nothing shows, suggesting the app is incapable of using the full screen. That problem remains regardless of how I orient my device. Nice quality control, there, folks.

title: Not worth having the app

title: Bug needs fixed right away.

I'll change my rating once this has been fixed. I love the app normally and use it all the time.

title: Best shopping experience
review: Shopping has never been so easy and hassle free! Simply search for what I want, add it to cart and 1-click to pay and it‚Äôs delivered to my doorstep. Doesn‚Äôt get any better than that. Oh and I dare not forget to mention the easiest return process! I love this app!

title: They go over the top
review: I bought an apple watch but the charger it came with broke the day I got it. They sent me a new one and refunded the amount of the charger on my original payment method and it came the next day!! I didn‚Äôt even have to send back the old one.

title: Great App, Very easy to operate
review: This app is absolutely perfect. It‚Äôs easy find exactly what I want, or maybe even better. Great deals too. It‚Äôs super easy to operate too. You don‚Äôt have to be an adult for this app. I mean, I‚Äôm just a teenager and a complete idiot, and it‚Äôs super easy to use. Totally recommend getting this app!!!

Not very good on Amazon‚Äôs part. Hopefully they fix this.

title: Frustratingly slow and consuming
review: All of my iPhones in the past have struggled while using this app. Why is it so painfully slow? Why does it consume so much processing power? Why can‚Äôt I even listen to music on the background properly while using this app? Why can‚Äôt a multi-billion dollar company design an app that works properly? title: Do not write reviews!!
review: My wife likes to write reviews because she reads them a lot. Then, my account is banned from reviewing because I write reviews?! It keeps claiming that there was an unusual activity. Do not write reviews as you wish because you will lose your chance to write them again when you really need to (like getting hurt by a product).

review: Unfortunately the latest update completely crippled the app. I can‚Äôt even find the app on my iPhone to delete it & reinstall it. I now just have to use a web browser. Hope they fix this bug. The app used to be great.

title: Great customer support

review: An interesting thing has happened. It seems that as soon as I canceled my prime membership I was no longer allowed to read product reviews. Coincidence?? Am I being ‚Äúpunished‚Äù for canceling prime?? Hmm..

review:
If you enjoy not getting your in app coupons to work and having to stand there after purchase of groceries to get the refunds owed to you, then this app is for you. 
I personally think a grocery store should just honor coupons if you punch in your phone number. Going through an app to get the coupons and then they‚Äôll not even working or showing up half the time is extremely annoying. Step up your game Albertsons.

title: The app it‚Äôs fine but SERVICE I have to think twice.
review: As a adult you have a schedule for job etc. I already loss several items cause the delivery time that they says at first its actually irrelevant. Always change but for hours early or late. I‚Äôm never home when the item comes and i have to pray to have it there before someone else takes it. If you live in a duplex, condo or so i don‚Äôt recommended. You need to be home all times and its something hard when you have several thing running in schedule.

review:
There are so many lose ends now. The entire process has become hellish, if not glitching the app will show a few search results but flood the screen with sponsored ads. Should you decide to check various departments to search... it refreshes after each one. So annoying. 
I would much rather have 3 day shipping than something that keeps me from shopping. I brought this up to customer service but I can tell I‚Äôm being dealt by external firms overseas. I‚Äôve heard a full on party and people screaming in the background.... no joke.

title: Love the App- But Idea
review: I would like to be able to group things that are in my ‚Äúsaved for later‚Äù cart. Kinda like Pinterest where we have boards. It would be more organized that way and not as overwhelming by all the items saved that I would like to eventually purchase.

review:

What a pain.
The stuff I have ordered has always been as stated and on time or earlier so they have that right but the app - not yet.

I‚Äôm in an iPhone 10s max plus that I‚Äôve had for a year and this just started happening. I‚Äôve looked for a setting that might have changed to not allow me to stay signed in but I can‚Äôt find anything. If this is a new security concern, please make it compatible with Face ID. Help!

title: Suggestion
review:
I would love if you guys added the option to switch accounts like on the desktop site. I have a work account and personal account that I constantly switch between. It would save a lot of time to be able to quickly switch on the app. 
 It would also be neat to be able to have the option to view the top products in each department.

title: What happened to the app?

Not sure what the developers were hoping to accomplish but I‚Äôm sure frustrated customers/users wasn‚Äôt it. Please make the app more user friendly again.

Then I noticed it said ‚Äúrevise payment method.‚Äù I went to revise it and pressed continue before changing anything and now it says it purchased fine. I‚Äôm angry because it had no reason to deny my card the first time and now I need to way even longer to receive my product.

title: Needs better tracking

I was excited, but when I checked back on the app two more times, the delivery person had clearly made two other stops... I‚Äôm guessing this part of the app simply doesn‚Äôt work?

title: Terribly buggy update almost impossible to use
review: Awful, it spazzes out when I try choosing different colors or sizes of things and goes crazy, I can‚Äôt even explain it just flashes the same screen over and over. Please fix soon... otherwise y‚Äôall are just losing money with this app üòÇ

review:

I rather cancel all those S&S products than deal with their endless loops of error messages and frustrating bugs! ü¶üüï∑üêú

title: App will say Still Loading
review: Update your app please!! I can‚Äôt load any of the tabs (Orders, Add to Cart, etc.). I can‚Äôt even make a search. I tried rebooting my iphone, logging in and out. Still nothing. I have the latest IOS 16 version and latest version of the app

title: This update won‚Äôt let me use app!!
review:
App opens to a screen telling me to update the app to continue. It goes on to say I need to allow push notifications, scan barcodes, etc. 

If I click the update button it gives me, it takes me to App Store that says app is already up to date. Check settings and full permissions are granted. Very frustrating!!

title: Problem with ‚ÄòBack‚Äô button
review:
Seems to be a new issue when going into a product description, or a list, and wanting to use back button for last page, arrow is not responding. Reboot did not solve. 
I can close app from background and go back in, but it only helps temporarily and I have to continue doing this in order to use the app. It‚Äôs making it borderline unusable.

review:
Seriously, there is no reason. The app worked fine before, and now on my iPad Pro I can no longer use the app in landscape. This is a major annoyance over a simple problem and there is no reason why the app should be behaving in this way.

title: Great app! Error needs fixing
review:

I‚Äôm using iPhone 6 running latest IOS 11
App is at its most recent update

title: Don‚Äôt plan on ordering again
review: I read reviews of the party I was ordering from, there were numerous positives. I ordered a costume for my child and received an empty package from the postal service stating they received an empty package as well. Now in order to get a refund they want me to return the product to the initial seller, when I never even received one to begin with. Glad that I‚Äôm out money and my child probably won‚Äôt have the costume he wanted. Thanks Bezos for your terrible company and website.

title: Blank product screen on iPad
review: When clicking on a product in the search results, it will load the product details for 3-4 seconds, then the screen turns white. You can to go back and try again, sometimes a couple times, before you can view the information. Super annoying.

title: First Review Ever

It‚Äôs so exciting to find unexpected things that you realize you really can‚Äôt live without! And at a good price. The fast delivery is wonderful, and if you must return, I‚Äôve never found returning so quick and easy. I‚Äôm delighted at the whole process. 5 Stars from me!
Susan Perez Cooper.

title: Pages you‚Äôre viewing go blank
review:
The front end is broken because pages often go blank while you‚Äôre viewing them. Also they no charge $5.99 to print a return label and you have to argue with customer service to print a return label for free. Super frustrating.

Also ‚Äúsubscribe and save‚Äù is a lie. It should require approval to purchase if the price goes up more than 5%, I‚Äôve often ‚Äúsaved‚Äù on the first purchase then unknowning paid 90% higher prices later.

title: Feature Request
review:
Feature Request: Add toggles for each shipping notification! 

Right now there is one (1) toggle for shipping notifications. I don‚Äôt want to receive ten (10) notifications. Examples: item shipped, it‚Äôs out for delivery, it‚Äôs 5 stops away. 

I ONLY want (1) single notification when it is delivered. Not when it ships. Not arriving tomorrow. Not 10 stops away. When it is delivered. That‚Äôs it. Please give users this control. Thanks.

title: Promotional discount lies
review: This is the 2nd time now that I was offered a 30% discount on specific items if I used my discover cashback bonus & card. Activate the offer. Added 3 items with the promo on the page to my cart. Apply my discover cashback & card. Takes no discount off. Call customer service & the guy says there‚Äôs nothing he can do, it must be a glitch. So they are just lying about promotional offers! I wonder how many people don‚Äôt even check to see if the discount came off.

title: Annoying!!
review: It‚Äôs gotten very annoying lately, when I click on a product and the product page turns into a plain white screen sometimes. To get rid of the white screen the only option is the back button then it takes you right back to the search results. It‚Äôs been doing this for awhile now so with all the upgrades, u‚Äôd think they‚Äôd have fixed this problem already. Ridiculous and annoying.

title: major issue with checkout
review: this app is great overall but there is a big problem i have been having with the checkout. I‚Äôll click ‚Äúproceed to checkout‚Äù and it‚Äôll take me to a screen where there is a continue button at the top and the bottom but they are unclickable. title: Highly Recommend, by meüòä
review: For most everything you need at better than local store prices and free delivery most times within a week with step by step notification. That‚Äôs service, I now think what do I need next week. Bravo!

title: Annoying
review: Every time I try to click on the reviews section for a product the app doesn‚Äôt  let me. What happened  and why now?

title: Poor navigation
review: The back arrow doesn‚Äôt always take you back to where you were; no ability to go back and forth. Currently, I‚Äôm viewing my cart, only to find the only option is to checkout, so I‚Äôve lost the list I was searching, and will need to start all over.

review: The most recent IPhone update ios 15.3 has made this app worse. It crashes sometimes and when trying to look at reviews it will freeze then it will reload. Plus it would be nice to have an option like online that allows one to check and uncheck the items in the chart to purchase.

review:

I guess my subscriptions every month still ship so that‚Äôs the best part, but don‚Äôt try to change it because you can‚Äôt. For the amount you pay a year for prime there shouldn‚Äôt be these many issues with the app.

title: A+
review: It‚Äôs simply a amazing app and extremely easy to navigate! Most importantly is the customer service is phenomenal. It really doesn‚Äôt get better than that! I definitely would recommend this this app without thinking about it!

title: Rating
review: I‚Äôd like to give a higher rating, however over the summer I had component of an almost $900 pool I bought that was damaged that Never got replaced after several phone calls, and an item I paid for that I never received nor had a refund. I‚Äôm hoping Christmas shopping will be better!

title: Hate it
review:
I find it difficult to find products. So few are listened per page and they are in one column. The other site is set up differently and very easy to use. 
  The only reason I sometimes use it is because of prime and when I go to pay, not sure which site I get to place order from.
  With this app, there are orders in my cart that I can not get rid of. Sometimes they are automatically put into my cart with not way to delete them. This is wrong.

title: Very easy and friendly

title: App Update

title: App Is Non Functional For Blind Users
review: I am a regular user of this app but the current version on IOS 15 freezes when I visit a product page and the screen goes blank. I‚Äôve tried multiple products and it always locks up on a blank page. I use Voice Over accessibility and use invert colors for high contrast to help me see the screen. All I can do is shut down the app and reboot. I am unable to go about any of my shopping now.  Very disappointing right before the holidays.

title: Fast and Convenient.
review:
I‚Äôm in the real estate and auto detailing business.  If I need ink cartridges, I have them the NEXT DAY.  As for auto detailing, I usually receive them within 1-3 days. 

I don‚Äôt have to leave the office.  I don‚Äôt have to leave the garage. I merely reach for my iPhone and order.

title: Bad update in September 2021
review: This last update I had a bunch of things which was nice the unfortunate thing is that now you adding things to cart does not work anymore and you can‚Äôt slide on the pictures to see what other views of an item is available these are simple fixes please technical department fix it and send a update as soon as possible

title: Stop switching the order of purchases
review:
This is probably the 5th time the Orders section was switched back to the descending date of purchase, rather than ascending delivery date.

I can‚Äôt think of a single reason why anyone would find this useful. Having a long list of preorders, it‚Äôs a pain keeping track of what‚Äôs arriving in the next few days because they aren‚Äôt grouped together.

At least provide the option to sort the Orders page by delivery date.

title: Buying
review: Seems to run smoothly when I want to buy things I sometimes have issues with not getting packages and when that happens all I do is call customer service and they handle it for me a resolve the issue

title: There is a simple reason Amazon‚Äôs sales are high
review:
Thank y‚Äôall for being my favorite online destination. I always find what I am looking for. Y‚Äôall make shopping quick and easy and carry everything I‚Äôve looked for.

review: I've been using the app to shop for several years, but I realized recently that I cannot buy Kindle versions of books from it. I'm on the latest version. I have to go to a browser to buy so it's a hassle. I will change my review when it starts working again.

I would have order my two items on Walmart but they were out so I had to order from here.  What ever happened to 2 day shipping?  Not happy at all. üò©

And it takes multiple clicks and screens to even find the ‚Äúmembership management‚Äù page, only to be told I can‚Äôt cancel on the app. Screw this. This is one of the reasons I don‚Äôt have prime. You people are a multi billion dollar corporation and decide to make membership management this strenuous? over $10? Goodbye

title: Happy with updates on delivery issues
review: I ordered some wine glasses for my twin daughters birthday. I will be leaving to bring them to them and celebrate their birthday April 6. The order got lost and I requested a refund and was able to reorder and get them in a couple of days. I‚Äôm pleased with that opportunity

The most recent change to the app made everything harder to get to, with a little screwy, scrolling thing at the bottom. yes, really.

title: Very satisfied customer

review:

title: I like it, but doesn‚Äôt load frequently

It‚Äôs frustrating because I have to close out the app and then go back on it, and sometimes the product I was looking at isn‚Äôt even visible anymore.

review: When I use this app on an iPad and search for a book, the price shows in the search results. But when I select the item the only options are to download a sample or select it in Kindle unlimited. There is no Add to Cart option or a price.

review:

If I click the ‚ÄúMenu‚Äù link at the top left corner, then tap ‚ÄúYour Lists‚Äù it takes me to my default list. But then, if I try to tap the ‚ÄúView Lists‚Äù link at the top right corner, NOTHING!!! I cannot access them no matter what. Same for the ‚Äúthree dot‚Äù link beside it. Nothing. 

PLEASE FIX THIS!!! It makes it nearly impossible to manage my shopping lists and purchase items later.

title: Update was horrible
review: I love shopping on my iPad. But this app is unusable now. When I try to select a different color, size, flavor, etc. of a product, all the buying options disappear. title: Great service
review: I have been I Prime customer for almost three years now. I have been exceedingly happy with their service. Even when I had a delivery issue they responded to my email with in an hour with a 400 word personalized response‚Äîpromising to deliver my package by the end of that day. title: Mostly Good

From time to time, I ship to family or friends and use another payment method. The app will not keep them and I have to select default home address and payment all over again. It‚Äôs not really hard, but what‚Äôs the point to have a default if this is the case. It‚Äôs just irritating.

review:
Sometimes it takes a few days to create a shopping list. Especially if I have an idea for meals that I want to make in the future but don‚Äôt need the items yet. I would like to be able to add groceries to a wish/shopping list for later.

Thanks!

Freeze Hang Though i do like when it says arriving by 10 Then later says running late, not yet shipped Or look at the tracking for a delivered item and is says it is delayed and has not shipped That sounds like a programming issue Thought things were supposed to get better with each release They get worse
