Changing the Deals of the Day to this one, took the fun out shopping in this portion of the site. 
Please bring back having the Deals to a timed format, fun having that to look forward to each day and scanning the possible products and their discounted sales price.

title: Do you have a blackout plan for the latest release?
review: I‚Äôm a loyal user of the app, but this release failed user acceptance testing.  Bottom third of screen is blank, can‚Äôt swipe left, and keeps flipping to vertical (I have horizontal locked). Going to use the website for a while I guess. App is not usable for me right now.

title: Scrolling in Cart is jumping
review:
I just updated this app and when I scroll through my cart, the screen keeps jumping up and down. It‚Äôs actually making me sick to my stomach. I‚Äôm on a brand new iPhone 12 Pro.
Update: I figured out it was happening only if my cart was empty but I had stuff saved. After I put something into my cart, the screen jiggling stopped. Removed the item from my cart and it‚Äôs doing it again.

title: Buggy!
review: The old app works wonderfully. After updating g I realized that there are a number of serious issues. The biggest of which is that you can‚Äôt seem to select options when ordering. You‚Äôre locked to the item you clicked in to. Ex: you click into a 40x40 blanket - but choose another size or color‚Ä¶ except the new update doesn‚Äôt acknowledge this and you‚Äôll end up unintentionally purchasing the item, without the options you clicked on.

title: Phone overheating and the app is lagging
review: I have an iPhone 12 and the app has recently started to overheat my phone. The App is also lagging. My phone is on the latest OS. I will see if I need to update the app. I will force close the app and reinstall if needed. For now it‚Äôs annoying.

title: Has been great, but now unusable
review:
Such a great experience for so long! Unbearable recently. Scrolling is stuttering, seconds or longer to load a screen.
I've been better off using a browser and the mobile website lately.

title: Horrible app
review: After the latest update from the app and iOS it has become very unstable on my iPhone 12 Mini. It‚Äôs constantly crashes and has a major delay that makes using it very much pointless. Back to the PC I go in the meantime

title: Loving it
review: I like sending my packages to a friends house. Super fast and I like to choose fewer boxes so I ship in on a later date but worth the wait indeed. I do wish I could get more coupons or something. But getting gift cards is soooo easy to put on and use.

title: Download problems
review: My app was acting up on my iPhone. Every time I clicked on a product it would go back to the home page. I shut down my phone and the problem didn‚Äôt go away. So I deleted the app, when I tried to reload the app it won‚Äôt let me. Is there a problem with the app right now. I can log on to the web site no problem.

title: I want to purchase a Ps5
review: Why can‚Äôt we spend our money to buy a Ps5 ? It‚Äôs not fair that people buy them up and sell them 10 X‚Äôs price.  If you care about your customers please just send of a private invitation to buy the Ps5. Please hear from your customers.

title: Most Convenient Place to Shop
review: Can‚Äôt really beat the simplicity of shopping for a vast index of products. The only problem I‚Äôve had was when I was in college, I got Prime at no cost but I didn‚Äôt get a notification that I‚Äôd be billed after a 4th year as I went to school for 5 years and paid the 100$ annual.

title: Not as dependable as they use to be
review:
Shipping on items have gotten further behind. It takes days now, where as use to be you could have overnight shipping. That is why I got prime years ago. Just another big business decision that doesn‚Äôt want to provide customer service. 
You should be able to choose overnight but now they tell you when, then half the time it is a day later. Sad....

title: This site is so much fun!!!
review:
I have no money now!! I have purchased amazing items that only Amazon‚Äôs vast selection could offer. This site can empty your wallet fast.  If you‚Äôre unsure about what you exactly want, just browse Amazon‚Äôs selection and you‚Äôll be surprised how easy and fun it can be to get more than EXACTLY what you‚Äôre thinking. 
‚ÄîMarion

title: Prime is a lie
review: I pay prime membership but it is false advertising. I get prime movies but all the movies and shows are already free to watch somewhere else. If there is a new or a popular movie on there you have to pay extra to watch it. What is the point of prime over 3/4ths of the products on here aren‚Äôt even prime products. But again even if you do find a prime product and order prime it will take 2 weeks not 2 days

title: Not worth all the hype
review: First off everything is super overpriced unless you have prime and even if you do have prime some items don‚Äôt even give you fast shipping with prime. And secondly my orders have been slowly taking more and more time with each order you would think with all these workers you would make it to where items are shipped with little to now delays but now i don‚Äôt even know if imma get my package.

title: No Dark Mode
review: App is good but does not support dark mode which I find as a major loss. It absolutely needs it and would greatly benefit from it. Please add dark mode support or at least an option to enable it in the app. The app would be way better with it. Thank you.

title: Still waiting for help
review: I sent them a email a couple days ago asking questions about last order delivered never got it  and still waiting, terrible costumer services (the worst) last time I bought here.

title: Dark mode needed
review: Whenever I open the app at night it hurts my eyes when I‚Äôm forced to look at the white screen. I‚Äôd probably do more late night shopping but I can‚Äôt keep it open. The app itself works pretty well and I enjoy using it to shop for the things I wanted to quickly get before I forget.

title: What happened to Buy Now?
review: What happened to the buy no button. It has disappeared and now I had to spend an hour putting everything into save for later just to purchase 1 item instead of buying thousands of dollars of items in my cart.

title: Refund
review: I used to love this app until I canceled an order and tried to get my money back and when I called them they said that it never happened and the person was no help at all and up till now I haven‚Äôt received my money

title: Quality of items sold.
review: I would like to say that lately some of the things(clothes items mostly)you offer are of lower quality.  I you should make sure that what you offer is of a higher quality and  correctly described as to what is being sold. Thank you.

title: Notification alterations
review: I want the option to receive notifications ONLY when items arrive. Currently the option is combined with when items are Shipped which I don‚Äôt care to know. Other than that I really don‚Äôt have anything to complain about. The app is fairly user friendly and easy to navigate.

title: Love the app BUT.....
review: Why did you change the way we can share items on the iPad? When I click the ‚Äúshare‚Äù I no longer have the option to text the link. My only options to share are either via email, Facebook, Twitter, or Pinterest.  Please bring back the text to share option on the next update.

title: Hyperlinks and photos not working for reviews
review: When I go to click on the hyperlink to be taken to the reviews it clicks like it‚Äôs about to do something, but doesn‚Äôt take me anywhere. Same issue is happening for the photos that are in the reviews. The app knows I clicked them, but instead of blowing it up to be full screen it just highlights the image. These issues are happening on my iPad.

title: What happened to customer reviews
review: It was so easy when I am out and about and think of something I need I would quickly pull it up, read a few reviews and make a purchase. Now I can‚Äôt get to the reviews.

title: Customer Service
review: I had a package I thought was stolen from my front porch.  Raul quickly started a replacement.  Found out my neighbor picked it up after seeing sketchy people walking down the street.  Alex was my next contact and he quickly canceled my replacement.  Super quick and easy.  Thank You

title: Why did you change?
review: Since this sudden change I can‚Äôt find anything as I could before. I‚Äôm still trying to find my order. Before it was so easy now I‚Äôm lost. I‚Äôm 75 years and change does not come easy.  Please stop.

title: Need better result options
review: When a customer searches for a particular item with specifics it‚Äôs always better to display that item first and then the other similar items with less price.

title: Complicated
review: The app wont show all you bought in a certain date.. they split the charges that makes so complicated.. why not put the same bills on the same date you purchase the items.

title: Why is it so hard to get a simple PDF Invoice?
review: I mean seriously, many of us need to give copies of receipts and invoices to others via email. It would be just so nice to be able to click orders and to tap on an order and click DOWNLOAD PDF (inside share menu)!!!!! Or maybe even an invoice center for the mobile app. IM NOT ON MY DESKTOP ALL DAY AND I NEED INVOICES!!!

title: Slow to add to cart adds multiples.
review: Items are take forever to add to cart or there is a glitch and when you press the add to cart button thinking its unresponsive or frozen. it would add multiple items of the same thing to your cart for each time u push the button while it is frozen or unresponsive....smh they had this problem idk how long apple needs to do something bc it brings the user experience down for people who use there devices and in term apple suffers bc my mom galaxy s20 sure do have this problem.

title: 2 suggestions to make this more user friendly
review:
1) Needs to be easier to enlarge product descriptions besides product images. These are the ONLY things that can be enlarged. I wear glasses when reading & sometimes don‚Äôt have them on or even nearby. In order to choose items, I need to zoom in to read details. But the ONLY items I can enlarge are specific product images. Not all information can be found in product images. 

AND

2) Needs to be able to switch from portrait orientation to landscape orientation. Landscape orientation enlarges sone things but also allows a wider screen.

When viewing items online, as opposed to being in the app, both of these are NOT issues.

title: Horrible chat
review:
I love the app the only problem is that when I have billing problem these agents don‚Äôt help and pass you down the line to other agents and no one call you. I had it already done 3 times and I don‚Äôt know how to get through to a agent with this app sending me to agents that do t care for you and leave you..
I wish the app had what it use to have the option where they can call you..

title: Trying to be sneaky...
review: So I do a lot of online shopping in the middle of the night when my husband is asleep, so I have my phone on silent - this includes no vibration. It‚Äôs SO frustrating that there is no way to turn off the vibrate when I add an item to my cart, therefore I end up deciding to wait until daytime to place my order and end up forgetting to place it completely. If you want me to buy more stuff, remove this mistake of a feature thank you goodnight

title: Fix the bugs
review: Every time I place an order, it‚Äôll go through, and then cancel. I‚Äôve had to call them twice about this and have failed to get my products when I needed them due to this. Absolutely ridiculous when I can clearly see that I have enough money in my account AND that it‚Äôs taking the money out and then refunding it for absolutely no reason. Will be cancelling my subscription. No point paying for two day shipping if it takes that long just to get my order to go through.

title: Getting worse
review: Please stop taking me to one of your product pages first when i search something then i have to go back and search again. I‚Äôm searching for a reason not looking to be advertised to, I‚Äôm already there to spend money with you.

title: Print invoices!
review: Why isn‚Äôt there an option anymore to print invoices from the mobile app.  I run a business that requires me to be on the road without access to a computer.  I must be able to view and print invoices while on the road.  Yet all I can see is order details.  I need an actual invoice for business records and taxes.  With everything going paperless these days, we at least need to given an option to print invoices ourselves.

title: Restore the drag-to-tray list functionality!
review:
Restore the drag-to-tray list functionality! Make it an option to turn on or off (for those who don‚Äôt like the function). My iPhone browsing is much more difficult without this feature, which let me compare items more easily. 

Without this function, I have no reason to use the app. At least my browser will let me open multiple tabs to help compare items.

title: Very well except for one thing
review: One thing I wish could change is the wish list at the bottom of the screen. I love this list but on my iPhone XR it is very hard to scroll through this list while trying not to switch apps. Maybe an option to have it along the side vertically or along the top would work.

title: What the heck?
review: Some of the most common features are gone now. I like to forward to txt to show people things I‚Äôm thinking of purchasing but now that‚Äôs gone. There was some new menu in the bottom right that I tapped on and accidentally chose to hide it... I did‚Äôt really notice what all of the options were but now it‚Äôs gone forever... I can‚Äôt even figure out what I did. It just seems harder to navigate and it keeps skipping back to home causing me to lose where I was in my search. I like the old version better.

title: Easy to order, hard to review order info
review:
This app is great except when it comes time to look at orders for budgeting or confirming charges to a bank account or credit card. I want to see how much each order cost at a glance so I can easily know which charge on my card belongs to which item. 
I‚Äôd also like to be able to search orders that were part of a subscribe and save deal only.

title: Couple of bugs for you
review:
When I try to select the ‚Äúprovide feedback on the app‚Äù option under customer service, it tells me I need an email address to do so. I am signed into the app, so the app should recognize that.

When I go into ‚ÄúYour Orders‚Äù, select an item, select ‚Äúbuy again‚Äù, and then tap one-click order, it just navigates me back a screen and doesn‚Äôt complete the transaction. I have to the navigate to the actual product page first and then the button works properly.

title: iPad App is not working anymore
review: Ever since two updates ago the app does not work properly. When I am looking at a product all the details, reviews, recommended item, etc. are squished to the right side of the screen. If a product has options to select from, the add to cart on an selected option does not work.  Please fix. The app was working perfectly two updates ago.

title: Useful but surprisingly limited
review: The app just isn‚Äôt able to do many of the things the site offers. For example, you can‚Äôt preview books like you can on the online site, and for some strange reason I, like many other reviewers, am unable to purchase kindle books or videos for prime through the app (it says my device doesn‚Äôt support the content). These annoying limitations make heading to the online site easier for me.

title: New update>complete FAIL!!
review: After the latest update this app is horrible!    One of the biggest issues is not being able to clear off your purchase history.   This is a big deal to not only me but so many others! Please fix soon or I‚Äôll look elsewhere

title: Locked
review: I have a gift card I've been trying to use it since Christmas and I can‚Äôt even use because of some address verification their customer service team is no help at all now my account is locked they won‚Äôt help me at all to fix it no email no call nothing

title: This is the future
review: I love how easily this app connects to email/sms/Facebook. When I find something I like but want another opinion on it, I can connect to my other apps and share the products I‚Äôm interested in. It‚Äôs makes it that much simpler to shop while on the train, waiting at a doctors office, etc.

title: Exchanges
review: I purchased something on prime day and got it and needed a half size bigger. I was disappointed that customer service wouldn‚Äôt let me return and rebuy honoring the price I paid. Seems weird for such a big company not to accommodate their customers

title: Seems buggy
review:
With the latest version, I‚Äôm having two major problems. First, I can‚Äôt see any list other than my default list. When I click on see all lists nothing happens.

Second is start up. When I open the app and start a search, as soon as I hit a search result suggestion, it takes me to whatever ad was on the home page (most of the time it‚Äôs the echo page).

title: Icons in top bar stopped working
review:
After the latest update, the icons in the top bar randomly stop responding to touch. So I can't search, view the menu, view my cart, etc. The app has been rendered virtually useless. 

Would also be great to have a feature where I can get a web link in the app to share with a friend. Now I find things in the app but have to use the web app if I want to share a link.

title: Shopping list bug
review: I have a bunch of items in my shopping list. I‚Äôve noticed recently whenever I try to click on an item to bring up its page it doesn‚Äôt work. It keeps loading, but I just give up and search for the item using the search bar. This app seems to have slowed down lately. Everything on the app works fine on my iPhone, though.

title: Need outstanding orders at the top of list
review: Recent update removed a previous app improvement that made this app truly helpful. When I go to orders now I see all orders and have to scroll through them to see what has been delivered or not. If I pre-ordered a game months ago I have to scroll back through orders to find that. The update that disappeared took all of those orders that were not not yet delivered and always put them at the top of the list. So much better.

title: Random Blank Pages
review: This app has become infuriating to use. I just end up not buying things because as I am browsing items, the part of the screen that scrolls with the item information will just turn white. I can only swipe back and lose my place and filters. It‚Äôs literally not worth using as it takes me far more time to shop than if I just went on my computer.

title: Buggy
review: Screen constantly goes white after clicking on a product. Sometimes I can get it to load again by using the app switcher, but not always. If you‚Äôre on page 5 of a search, be prepared to repeat those same 5 pages until the end of time. It always kicks me back to the first page.

title: Bugs and lack of settings
review: The app used to be better however after recent updates there are numerous amounts of new bugs. One in particular makes your screen go white while looking at an item, making you have to go back and find that item again. Also, the lack of a night/dark mode setting is just ridiculous at this point. It‚Äôs 2022 and you‚Äôre one of the largest companies in the world. Make a dark mode already.

title: Mr. Eugene Mcdonald, Mac electric Philadelphiapennsylvania. and Mount Laurel New Jersey
review: Finest mail order organization that I had ever dealt with, courteous, follow through with all the orders, Instant refund, just the best organization that I was out with while in business, very organized also. Highly recommend them with professionalism and courteous dealerships mr. Eugene Mcdonald

title: Convenient
review: We live between two mountain passes and still have snow in the middle of April. Having items delivered to our home is not only convenient but it‚Äôs so much safer considering anything except groceries are over 50 miles away! Thanks Amazon!Happy Shopper

title: Shipment
review: The app is great an all an u can find so many things that other store don‚Äôt have but my issue is that if I request for fast shipping to be here a day early then I should get my package the day I choose. I ordered a item an choose the fast shipping which was June 10th I ordered it June 4 now it‚Äôs saying my shipment is delayed to June 13th an this is the second time this has happened

title: Lately so glitchy - blank screens reloading etc
review: It‚Äôs been so glitchy lately. I will tap on an item and the item page will load and then the screen will go blank and in the app seems like it has crash because nothing happens. When I close the app and reopen it of course it has lost even my search for the item. Very annoying. However I‚Äôm buying less stuff because of it lol.

title: Bug in last update
review: The app is usually great, but in the last update there‚Äôs a bug where I can‚Äôt click on the reviews on some listings, as well as listings not showing any info beyond the price when I scroll down. It would be 5 stars if this were fixed.

title: Truck parts
review:
I‚Äôm a mechanic and I work in a highly popular shop and in my opinion I like ordering Detroit axle parts for my truck for 1 of 3 reasons
1. The parts are always very high quality 
2. The parts are more reasonable on price 
3. They parts are always 100% correct

title: Laaaaggggg
review: For a number of months now the app has been lagging a lot. Ot continues to do so even after software updates. I recall a number of months ago hearing on the news that the app was gonna start getting slow, but idk why it‚Äôs still like this. It‚Äôs definitely a 1st world problem, but mildly annoying. There‚Äôs no lag when I use my laptop though.

title: Seems to have connection issues...
review: Seems to be a connection error on their end because I get an message about connectivy issue and try again later. I don't have these issues with any other app. Sometimes the item I'm trying to look at won't load, other times it won't let me add to cart or save on a list

title: A perf bug: ‚ÄúStill Loading‚Äù is really annoying
review: Recently the app has become worse in user experience. Many of the times I tried to click a picture in customer‚Äôs review, it will load forever and keep stuck with a white screen saying ‚ÄúStill Loading‚Äù. I cannot do anything, not even able to go back to the previous page or do anything! What a shame.

title: They should change their name to Amazin
review: Had a package theft and they replaced the items for free. Had an issue with a damaged collectors item and they did right by me with that too. If they keep this up AND raise the rates they offer employees they would still make record profits.

title: Horribly Frustrating
review: This app used to be perfect, but seemingly with each new update for the past half year or so, the app has progressively been getting buggier, slower, and increasingly unusable. Simple features like scrolling through your cart becomes unbearable due to graphical glitches and reloads. Loading times have increased exponentially as well, only further contributing to frustration. I strongly recommend using their website on a computer over the app.

title: Possible feature
review: I think it would make the shopping experience even more convenient if a button for add to cart was on the screen where items are listed instead of having to press on the item.

title: Not received item
review: It says in the website that it was delivered but I didn‚Äôt received it. I received items  I  ordered together with it. Website is not user friendly for me to contact them and place my complain to resolve it. Until now, I haven't contacted them because of that. I put a review to the item but still nobody contacted me. Frustrated! I wasted money!

title: Thank you so much
review: Ok thank you for the first two weeks I will see if I can help out with my daughter in my life I‚Äôm not going on a trip with my family anymore I have had a little bit of a time and I‚Äôm going on here to see my family

title: Great place to shop
review: Everything is wonderful no issue except they ban me for no obvious reason to do future product reviews, I hope they read this because I got tired calling their customer service without any result.

title: Offensive Thumbnail Design
review:
Please consider changing the design of your app thumbnail; it looks like a cartoonization of Hitler. The blue ribbon/tab at the top looks like Hitler‚Äôs mustache on top of the arrow/smile and the tan coloring looks like those colorized pictures of his uniform. 
Does no one in your Design Department see this??? It‚Äôs offensive and a turn off.

title: You need to put a ‚ÄúAre you sure you want to report‚Äù pop up.
review: I was reading reviews for a punching bag and this one review was in German. I reported the translation on accident and I feel bad. I didn‚Äôt mean to do that, I meant to click translate and my finger slipped. Please put a pop up for the ‚Äúreport translation‚Äù option.

title: Please, more info in search results
review: The app is good but when searching for items it would be nice if in the search results, it would display Additional information like shipping dates or available sizes or colors. It would greatly cut down on the back-and-forth clicking.

title: Recent updates are horrible
review: The last two updates to the iPad app have made this app much more difficult to use.  Searches are confusing - switches between fresh and other order types randomly among other issues.  For a company that seems to have made a science out of getting people to order more things more often, these latest releases are a massive and surprising fail

title: It use to be a great app, until this last upgrade
review:
This use to be a 5 star app and worked flawlessly. With the latest upgrade version, the app will not display correctly and sometimes flips between landscape and portrait even though you have your iPad in landscape. This app version is being run on an iPad Pro latest version running iOS 14.7.1

Maybe it will work better on iOS 15.

title: Latest update is horrible for ipad
review: There was nothing wrong with the app and I used it A LOT. Now it keeps forcing my ipad to portrait mode even though I want it to be in landscape mode. That never used to be a problem, so you must have caused it. I think there are other issues with the display too, but for now the forced portrait mode is enough for me to curb my use. I just had to place an order using the web page instead of the app. Please correct this situation.

title: Ifetta head phones
review: I love the app there is nothing wrong with it except for some of the brands. I got a pair of ifetta headphones and I used the so much they were amazing. One day the charging port broke. And I got another pair of them but this time the pair I had was muffled and so quiet the pair before was so loud and have a good base please ifetta fix your headphones cause I really like my headphones

title: The Sightseers. A book by Robert Westfield
review:
Great read. A pleasurable mixture of the excitement of New York City and the complexities of melding tourist on a class trip. 
Anyone who has ever taken a guided tour will recognize the diverse personalities in his book.   Mr. Westfield has given us readers the pleasure of a NYC tour and captured the political and geographic differences that both separate and unite us.

title: Dark mode
review: Great app and great place to online shop with absolutely no problem but this app needs a dark mode. The bright white light in the dark is a bit annoying. I personally believe a dark mode for the app should be an option

title: Outstanding
review: There‚Äôs a lot of variety of things and good prices. Its becoming  addicting there is a lot to see.A lot of good competitors out there. Love that I don‚Äôt have to leave the house. Especially, the pandemic going on right now and I get to shop my comfort of my own home.

title: They have had anything and everything I have ever looked for
review:
Everything I have ever ordered has been in good shape gets here promptly usually the next day.
I have had little to no problem usually if there is unusually a problem with something I have ordered they have promptly replaced it or repaired it

title: Needs an update
review: Everything I click on something it takes me to the home page‚Ä¶I‚Äôve already deleted app and reinstalled and in browser it does the same thing

title: Recommendations
review: I used to like the ‚Äúsee more‚Äù option on the recommend tabs, but now that it‚Äôs gone and only shows 4 items (usually ones I‚Äôve passed up on before or removed from recommendations) it limits the view of other products that would interest me. That and you can‚Äôt search deals for specific key words.

title: App crashes after opening notification
review: I don‚Äôt know if this is a known bug or not. But after I opened one of the order shipped notification, the app started crashing. I closed the app and tried to reopen the app, and it keeps crashing and closing the app two seconds after opening it. Restarted the phone, didn‚Äôt work. Had to reinstall the app and relogin for the app to function normally. Please fix it

title: What did we do without it
review: As much as I don‚Äôt like Jeff Bezos‚Äôs stand on taxing the ultra rich, he did come up with an idea that has revolutionized shopping. I don‚Äôt know what I would do without it and particularly don‚Äôt know what I would‚Äôve done without it when the Covid pandemic was raging.

title: What‚Äôs the deal?
review:
Why when I click on an item does it say at the top: Have a question, with a box for me to write something, then the screen shows blurry!
I don‚Äôt have a question I just want to order that item!!

title: Just one gripe
review: Obviously its a great app, it wouldn‚Äôt be the internets biggest shopping center if it wasn‚Äôt. I just wish they would implement some sort of night or dark mode. Browsing random items at night is kind of a pain with a floodlight in your face.

title: Confused to continue business
review: I‚Äôm not happy with the politics that company express towards police, etc. yes, BLM but all matter. Being anti Trump alienates 74 million people. I have loved  you for years...but you rhetoric s offensive to me. I really don‚Äôt want to buy from you! Why can‚Äôt you live everyone????!

title: Bad delivery
review: I had a ton of stuff that was supposed to come on a Tuesday. Then that Tuesday morning I wake up and I‚Äôm so happy my stuff is finally going to come, and guess what. That whole entire day I waited for my stuff to come and I was so happy thinking it was going to come. But at around 8:00 pm I looked and it moved it. I was so mad and so sad. Mad because my stuff wouldn‚Äôt come and I was so happy and sad because I was so happy for it to come and it didn‚Äôt.

title: Reviews for purchases aren‚Äôt being posted.
review: When reviewing an item purchased, it doesn‚Äôt go through if it‚Äôs a bad review which I think is ridiculous cause people deserve to know the truth about the item not just whatever they want to post. If this issue gets resolved, I will change my rating because other than I haven‚Äôt had any other issues. It‚Äôs just the reviewing process.

title: I love it.
review: I‚Äôve had prime for a bit now and since I am overseas for work it makes things easier. Yes it takes a while to come because of that fact but when I get back to the states I‚Äôll see how this two day shipping looks like.

title: Sea life collection
review: I was very happy with the quality and size of the mug. It comes from China and there is a set of four. I ordered all four but the Octopus arrived broken I have been waiting for a replacement for 6  months. They keep telling me arrival from China is the problem.

title: Worst
review: Okay so the first 2 orders passed with no problems, AirPods and stationary sets, but after that it went bizarre, literally, I got logged out of my account 2 times and was struggling and scared  since I had placed an order that day, and I have short term memory loss + paranoia issues, one of the customer service people suggested I reorder not only was that a waste of money but it didn‚Äôt even work because it logged me out again saying they had issues. title: Gift cards & registry tab not working

title: What‚Äôs happened to the iPad app?

Edit...Another update. Just as bad as the last one. The phone app is fine, and is how the iPad app should be. You‚Äôre just as well off using the site on the web browser, because that‚Äôs what this app is like now.

title: Terrible New Interface
review: This has always been my favorite app to stroll through, read reviews and make purchases from. However the new interface makes it so hard to enjoy from my phone. There is now always  ‚ÄúBack to Top‚Äù, Share, and Favorite icons taking up precious screen real estate that never go away, and there‚Äôs no option to change it. Also, you can‚Äôt see how much kindle books cost or purchase them from a phone. I will change my review if these issues are attended to.

title: Sluggish and slow
review: When I try to use the app to look up products or even to get to my wish lists to share it sluggish and slow and always ends up with not showing anything been this way for a long while most of the time I end up using the browser or just wait until I get home to get online to search it on my Mac browser instead of the app

title: Probably the worst designed app
review: As convenient as it is to buy something fast, you have to hunt‚Äîand I mean HUNT‚Äîto find anything. You search for something, and you get everything EXCEPT what you actually want. Want cat food? Here‚Äôs a bunch of dog stuff instead. Sponsored items get top priority and show up first, but again, it‚Äôs for something I don‚Äôt want. Guess what, I don‚Äôt have a dog!!! So stop listing crap I don‚Äôt have any interest in. Filters are absolutely useless. I hate this app with a passion.

title: Not enjoying the latest UI refresh
review: The color scheme is awful and the change in navigation is particularly useful.  Also, please stop A/B testing on users! I need the Add to wishlist button in the same place every time.  Thank you.

title: Good but not perfect!
review: The app works well, pretty much flawlessly. My only issue is the most recent update - for some reason, the developers thought it would be a good idea to put an icon bar at the bottom of the app display. It just looks funky, and, what was there before (3 bars in upper left corner) worked fine, and looked much better in my opinion.

title: Search Frustration!
review: Every time I search for an item I get everything under the sun. I will get a few of what I looking for but I have to search through it all to find it.  Why can‚Äôt you just include what I am looking for?

title: I just wish there was a dark mode, great app in everything else
review: It might be that i like the dark theme more on other apps andthe iphone interface or it might be that my eyes don‚Äôt like the harshness of white screens... but i feel like a dark mode would work wonders for many people, hopefully someone reads this and we can get this feature soon

title: Amazing app
review: This app makes everything so much more simple to get items that you may not have in stores near you. Also the petty reviews are bringing the apps rating down and I want it to stay on the App Store as it helps many many people.

title: Bring it back!
review: I no longer have the buy it now option on product page. It has cut back on my purchases tremendously.  This is about my IPad.  If I want one item in my shopping cart , I must put everything else I. The for later cart. Horribly inconvenient.  And my home page shows the same things day after day. Frequently books I‚Äôve already purchased.

title: Many issues
review: The app is full of bugs. Switching from the app to any other app then switching back will cause the app to start again. The question of choosing the region is being asked every time I launch the app. Sometimes, the cart get empty as the app logs you out for no logical reason.

Very frustrating.

title: Annoyed

title: Suggestion
review: The app is pretty cool. One suggestion is to provide an option to share phone contacts. That way, users won‚Äôt have to type in a new address when they want to send a gift purchase to another person. They would be able to access other addresses from their phone contact list.

title: Horrible since the update
review: Ever since the most recent update it will sign me out even in the middle of shopping. I have it set to stay signed in. Ive deleted the app and reinstalled. Ive changed my password. Ive given it a few days to work itself out. I‚Äôll probably just cut my losses until they figure their stuff out, and do some old fashion in store shopping.

title: Next next next sign in

title: RETURN THE DRAG AND DROP FEATURE!!

title: iPad app not working correctly
review: Color and size options are not registering preventing me from both viewing multiple styles and adding to cart for items with multiple options. Additionally having to dive into a menu every time I want to switch styles is much less convenient than other configurations like the one that shows square swatches of each style at a glance.

title: Best ever
review: I never have any problems. Its easy to use, and if you cannot find a feature the chat gets you a person fast. Its convenient and makes everything easier. I love that it saves my cart so i can add through the week and order when needed.

title: Menu bar move & filters are a bad move
review: I don‚Äôt like the way the menu bar moved to the bottom of the page.   It gets in the way and when you search an item now the filters are way more complicated.  Just give me a drop box at the top of the page and be done with it.

title: Scrolling
review: Sometimes when I‚Äôm scrolling through the app it sticks like its the end of the page but there‚Äôs still more left items on the page..... so I go back a page then return to the original page I was on and sometimes that works and I can continue my scrolling, sometimes not. It‚Äôs just very annoying because it happens too frequently.

title: Search issue
review:
This is my main shopping for nearly all my household needs. I have used the app for years and but sometimes twice a day .

Lately when searching I select an item then  click the back button to review the list again   I am taken all the way to the first page of my search.. angry about this it takes so long to find things now when it used to be so simple. 

Fix this please‚Äî-

title: Filters??
review: Where did all the options go? I can‚Äôt look up by color or size or anything anymore. The apps‚Äô compatibility and user friendly interface has changed drastically and it‚Äôs making shopping more difficult and therefore more stressful. I wish things would work well again. I already discontinued my prime membership because it was no longer worth it to pay to use a flawed service.

title: Still no AmazonSmile on iPad OS
review:
I do most of my shopping from the iPad app.  I‚Äôve followed your in-app instructions to go to main menu, find Settings, then ‚Äújust click on AmazonSmile‚Äù and follow instructions.
Well, if AmazonSmile were an option on that menu, I‚Äôd be happy to click it and follow the instructions.

a shame I can‚Äôt share the picture to prove it‚Äôs not there.

title: Ups and downs just like everything
review: Great app! Sometimes you dont get exactly what you thought you were buying but its not always bad. I wish there was a way to organize my shopping cart a little more too. Overall tho, has everything you could ever need/want AND decent pricing on most things. Key is to shop right.

title: Horrible change to interface
review:
Latest version search results are in tiles that should be limited as an accessibility option for geriatrics. 
To add insult to injury there doesn‚Äôt appear to be an option in app settings to change it back. (I‚Äôm not going to sift through a bunch of awkwardly labeled submenu options in order to find something that should be the primary option when [application settings] is expanded.

title: Guess My Package Just Never Arrived
review: FedEx did not even attempt to deliver my package and shows a delivery exception like I wasn‚Äôt available to get the package, AWFUL customer service wait times left me frustrated as I order essential items from Walmart's online service.

title: Gets worse all the time
review: Users cannot copy any text on any screen in this crippled app. That‚Äôs a very basic iOS function that has been trashed for some unknown reason. Have seen this recently on a few of these proprietary shopping apps, I‚Äôm guessing it‚Äôs to prevent users from copy/pasting specs and model numbers for use in non-app searches and comparisons. Regardless of the reason, it makes it less likely I will use the app for anything serious when I can open a browser and access whatever I need. Lame.

title: Tiny Font
review: I would like it if the font size was large enough to actually see the words in order to read the items information without straining to see the print.

title: Double charges
review: My only complaint would be the way my card gets charged... the manufacture charges my card to see if it goes through then gives me a credit back and then often instead of one legitimate charge I have two additional charges. So I end up with three charges and one deposit. Basically getting double charged for one item. This has cost me a lot of my personal time getting my money back.

title: Coders Gone Wild
review:
Some just cannot leave well enough alone. Coders sure can't. I guess it keeps them in work, but I know it frustrates users.

Imagine a diesel mechanic with a tool chest full of tools he needs, uses and knows. Now imagine that, every so often, he funds someone overnight has rearranged his tools, removed some, added some, changed some.

Is he a happy camper? You get three guesses, and the second two don't count.

title: Ordered delay
review: Ordered a laptop on April 8th to prepare to work remote on the 14th - then I got a notice about all this coronavirus it would be delivered on the 19th ~ here we are on the 19th at midnight and no laptop. Continue being off work with NO-PAY because I don‚Äôt have this laptop as of yetü§¨ü§¨

title: Poor service
review: I ordered 6 items on April 3 before placing the order it stated the items will arrive between 7 to 10 days after placing the ordered said a few days later was giving an arrival date monday April 20 (wait 17 days) now is the 22 and all I have is a message stating my item are delayed and that I will receive an email which I still have not received. Can‚Äôt even get in touch with a physical person, poor poor customer service.

userName: S a d. S h o p p e r
title: What were you thinking
review: All of the functionality is gone!  The landing page now looks like a newspaper stand an any related item from past purchases or like items are gone.  It is time to invest in the marketing department.

title: Customer Service is aJoke
review:
I‚Äôve search about several different ways to contact customer support and can not get a number at a person to message with and now it‚Äôs stuck on a reply to me from their robot answering service 
If I could give a negative review I would

title: Coupon issue
review: When adding a coupon (before signing in), you must sign-in, ok, I can live with that ... but why oh why do I have to repeatedly (usually twice) do I have to enter and re-enter and maybe re-enter again my password. Please fix, it was a problem recently, then you fixed it, now it‚Äôs doing it again.

title: Can‚Äôt order First Reads
review:
Thanks for the offer of two books out of First Reads for the month of January, However, the books can‚Äôt actually be purchased because the button to ‚Äú Buy Now‚Äù doesn‚Äôt work, at least on the IPad app. 

Please fix this!

title: Shopping Cart/Save for Later BROKEN
review:
Unable to view items in my cart for purchase. It will show the badge number of items on the cart but when you tap on cart... it‚Äôs empty. 

Also, unable to view the ‚ÄúSaved for Later‚Äù part of my cart.

The WHOLE cart is BROKEN.

title: Boo
review: So what happened?  First, now I have to log in EVERY SINGLE TIME I close out the app. The search is jacked anymore and pulls a ton of irrelevant items. To top it off, I spent a substantial amount of time doing Christmas shopping. Carefully selecting items, putting them in my cart, but in usual fashion I don‚Äôt hit ‚Äúpurchase‚Äù that moment because I wanted to continue shopping but it was late. Well, I go back this morning, have to flip‚Äôn log in *again* and when I go to my cart, it‚Äôs empty. üò´üò°ü§¨üòû

title: Order cancellation
review: I‚Äôve been trying to cancel an order for the last 30 minutes and it keeps on saying that an error has occurred and I need to have this order cancelled because I just realized that I ordered the wrong item. Please fix this error ASAP

title: Updates made app trash
review: Why would you take away the scrolling feature? Now, instead of continuous scrolling, it shows about 10 items and then you‚Äôre forced to now repeatedly press a ‚ÄúNext‚Äù button!! That is ridiculous! Updates are supposed to IMPROVE the efficiency and usability of apps, not make users revert back to using the website to use the features that made the app desirable in the first place! Very disappointed that the app has become inefficient with the latest updates.

title: Keeps signing me out
review: This app is usually great, but the last update is not working out for me. I‚Äôm constantly getting an error message stating that I do not have internet. Once I finally get that message to go away, I‚Äôm forced to sign back into my account. It takes anywhere from 5-10 minutes to add an item to my shopping cart. I hope this gets resolved on the next update.

title: Bad Update
review: I would like the choice for the dark theme because I have that awful teal green color! I would also like the choice for my searches to be in list or grid form, I hate grid form and having to to to another page instead of scrolling down!

title: App is unusable after recent update
review: For the last several days every time I open the app I am met with a ‚ÄúUH-OH Something went wrong on our end‚Äù message with various pictures of dogs. Regardless of what I attempt to do on the app, this is the only thing I see. Normally seeing a picture of a cute dog would be a pleasant thing, but now I am filled with annoyance every time my screen has this smug trying-to-be-cutesy error screen upon trying to use this app at all. Uninstalling until it is a functional once more.

title: Newer version constantly having to scroll to next page
review: In the most recent updates you are constantly having to hit next page after about 10 items load in order to look for more items... extremely irritating. The older version was much easier and streamlined, where you could continue to scroll down the page and more items would load.

title: Show where item located
review: I have been very disappointed when purchasing items and discovering, AFTER PAYING, my item is being shipping from China or India or other very distant locations and it will be weeks in the process. Please find a way to let us know this up front so we can decide whether we can wait that long.

title: App never works
review: I had a new iPhone and great WiFi. This app never works and always shows the dog whoops something‚Äôs wrong here screen. You‚Äôd think that the app which would allow me to spend more money would be capable of, in fact, letting me access the items to buy.

title: Browsing history
review: After the new update you cannot see your browsing history on the app anymore, which is frustrating because now my recommendations are for one thing I looked at by mistake sometimes and I can‚Äôt remove it. Please fix.

title: Impossible to contact...
review: I find it VERY frustrating that there is no way on your app to get in actual contact to the Customer Service Department of your company. I have a product that I purchased and you sent out to me that apparently has been lost and I really have no way of finding out if I will ever receive it. A company as big as yours should have a way to contact you either by chat or by phone but I find neither. If there is a way it is to well hidden for old men like me to figure out how to use it!!!

title: Great
review: Stop hating on this app so it has a few flaws, but so do you, and everyone else. This app is amazing and very helpful for the holidays. If you give this a bad rating I bet you use the app to buy gifts for your love ones. Anyways stop being rude just don‚Äôt do anything instead of writing a bad review. Please and thanks.

title: Best Customer Service
review: Amazon‚Äôs customer service is absolutely fantastic! The person working in the customer service was very patient with me and very nice. Not only is the customer service nice but the deals are too. For example the category of $10 or less in case you‚Äôre on a budget. It‚Äôs really nice.

title: Crashes on iPhone XS Max on iOS 12
review: The app used to work great but now it crashes whenever I try to open it on my phone unfortunately. I tried deleting it and reinstalling it a couple of times but it has no effect on the problem. This problem does not occur on my iPad which also has the latest iOS 12.

title: Needs to be fixed
review: I can‚Äôt log into my account. I‚Äôve called customer support several times and all they do is reset my password when I tell them that it‚Äôs been done before and I don‚Äôt want it. Please fix this issue. Not sure if it‚Äôs an app issue or website.

title: viewing issue

It seems as though the space for the picture of the product continues as a white space below the product on the left side of the window.

title: Recent upgrade makes iPad version unusable for many products.
review:
Couple of bugs that need to be fixed on the last iPad app version. 

1) Can no longer click the multiple options drop downs in the product page. For example, I can no longer select different colors or other options of products most of the time. When I can, the menu often won‚Äôt let me scroll easily and instead of scrolling the menu, it scrolls the page behind (since I‚Äôm switching back and forth between the app and safari, I can‚Äôt remember if that‚Äôs on the app or the safari version).

2) Cannot add products directly to a registry from the iPad app. There‚Äôs just no link to do so. If there is, it‚Äôs too hidden.

For a company valued at $500B+, which supposedly specializes in online retailing, this is pretty shoddy work!

title: Lost functionality
review:
It‚Äôs important for me to share a link to a product. Although there‚Äôs supposed to be a grey button somewhere on the page to do so, (1) I couldn‚Äôt find one and (2) why mess with the standard way of doing things?

Why not just let me use the web set instead of auto-directing me to the app from a Google search in Safari?

I‚Äôm frustrated by the desire to drive me to your app that has less functionality than it should.

title: Last update ruined the popup list tray
review: The popup list tray at the bottom was perfect before you messed with it, always there and displayed the last list used. Now, it never appears until you try to add something but then always opens the wish list. So then I have to remove the item I just added, change the list to ‚Äúsave & compare‚Äù and add the item again.

title: [iPad] Images are Broken.
review: When I click to view an expanded image, every item I tap to view after the first one only shows the initial item. For example, if I open the app and look at a soccer ball, then search for soccer shoes, when I tap to view the soccer shoes, only the soccer ball image will show.... and every item after the soccer ball that I click on will only show the soccer ball ... It will stay this way until I hard reset that app and search a new item, wherein the same perpetual loop starts over again. Please fix.

title: Idk why the other ratings are so bad??

Tech guys are brilliant so I‚Äôm thinking they made it difficult to log off so you‚Äôll purchase more items.  Or ????

title: Technofob
review:

Ronald Crouch

title: Clothes I bought

title: Reviews

title: Major security fly and online customer service didn‚Äôt seem to care
review:
Was forced to update password using a web browser for some unknown reason. I updated it and didn‚Äôt think anything about it.

When I opened up the app on my mobile device I noticed it didn‚Äôt ask for me to re-authenticate or login with my new password.

I closed out open it up over and over and over and it never asked for the new password. I was able to browse orders credit card stored on file you name it and yet it did not notice I was no longer properly using the new password.

I confirmed the new password was required when using a web browser. Multiple devices all exhibited the same behavior and when I contacted customer service they didn‚Äôt seem to care about this major security flaw.

title: Every new update makes it worse
review:
I‚Äôve been a loyal prime member for almost a decade. We used to be able to hold down an item and drag it to the bottom to add to a list. They take that feature away and add a stupid heart. I don‚Äôt want to heart it and add every single item to one list. That doesn‚Äôt even make sense.

I barely use the app now and started shopping elsewhere after the 2-day shipping turned into 7-8 day.

title: Unhappy
review: It used to be easy to manage my kindle device. No longer.  I used to go to my settings and devices. Now that is gone. there is a book you offer but I can‚Äôt load it on this device. This is BS

title: Never trust their words on anything/ especially address change
