title: Vendors should be rated as well
review: That‚Äôs all. They ship items super slow so that by the time it gets to you it‚Äôs already outside of the return window. Like SkyDogB. Buyers beware.  And other times the product you chose, isn‚Äôt the product you receive.  so it would be super helpful to be able to rate vendors as well. The product suffers regardless of its quality just because of vendor quality. :/

title: Stop the Changes!!!
review:
Every change made over the past few months has been horrible. 
- every time I want to use filters, I have to do one at a time. 
- having to hit the Next button is ridiculous. Scrolling was fine. 
- the version released today is FULL of bugs. 
   - nothing shows up on my orders 
   - my previous searches are gone
   - the listed items are not in the US 
Using the updated app is more trouble than it is worth. If it doesn't change, I'll have to purchase elsewhere.

title: Need Dark Mode!
review: The app is great and I love the redesign but I think its time for a dark mode! When i‚Äôm looking for stuff at night, I get blinded by the bright white backgrounds and colors. Would definitely make the experience much better for night browsing. :)

title: The search bar
review: Can you figure out a way to narrow it down. I‚Äôm tired of searching for something in my size and typing it in exactly and then you pull up kids stuff. I don‚Äôt have kids. I need roller skates in my size, I‚Äôm wasting too much time looking at things specifically meant for children when I need something in my size. It‚Äôs as bad as googling something. They bring up every option under the sun except the one you‚Äôre looking for.

title: Paying for product
review: Idk y it takes 5 days to take a payment out when in that time frame anything can happen they were really good until this bs happened

title: Obsessed
review: I‚Äôve spent more money than I should admit on this app. I, of course, used it on the computer prior to using the app. But the app is so much easier to use & is addicting!! I have a prime membership (worth it) & almost all my packages come on time & fast! I only shop prime & I rarely have any issues.

title: New Layout = Awful
review:
I really hate the new layout for this app! I don‚Äôt think I have ordered anything from my phone in a month or two now due primarily to the layout update being awful!

The home screen looks like a bunch of trash ads now, the save for later is hidden when I use this the most..., and the filter to find items is a huge pain to select options through.

Overall I can‚Äôt see why anyone would want this changed layout over the previous one.

title: new filter change - not good
review:
Typically I have no issues with this app.  They get me to spend/waste money...

Recently though they changed up the filter options.  You filter one item and the menu closes automatically to make the changes.  But if you want to setup multiple filters (ie new, specific brands, colors and delivery dates) you have to keep reopening the filter option.

 Please take this function back to the old version please!

title: Dislike where you brought it
review:
I absolutely  "  dislike "  ( not a genuine descriptive word  that i really want to use )  what you have done to this app .....  
i dont like  the whole " turn the page " thing that you changed  to ...... 
it takes time  to load the next  8 or so products  and for someone that shops for a family and a business that they work for ....... that time to load adds up  .....  i can understand having some of  the ads ......   but  at the top of the page  ..... in the middle of the page ...... at the bottom of the page ......  just a bit ridiculous and frustrating  to me ...... 

I liked the infinite scrolling   Of 6 or so months ago .....

Please ad a switch to turn off page turning 

Thanks

title: Outdated
review:
something changed in the last update and now you have to go to the next page as opposed to keep scrolling. I‚Äôm not a fan of this change.
Overall it‚Äôs an easy to use app but it could be brought to the 21st century from a interactive perspective.

title: Order
review: I ordered jackets for my kids last week because of this rain here in Cali. I checked my app yesterday because the coats were supposed to arrive, but they never did. All it kept saying was that it was shipped. You guys have no phone number or anything to help with this problem. Just a bunch of useless services on the app. My kids have to wait because you guys are playing games.

title: Won‚Äôt keep me signed in
review: I used to use this app a lot. With a kid, it‚Äôs super handy to throw things in my cart when I think of them. But for the last week or two, I‚Äôve had to sign in nearly every time I open the app. If it doesn‚Äôt improve, I suppose I‚Äôll just delete it. It‚Äôs probably good for my bank account not to make impulse purchases, but it‚Äôs not good for my sanity to sign in every time. How about using facial recognition, if they want more security?

title: Not user friendly
review: Sorry to say I have had more issues with this newer app and find the website MUCH easier to use, I constantly need more information and need to go the website to find anything Electic. Okay, but every time I want to search for a‚Äòdifferent‚Äô digital movie or purchase a new one while checking for discounts I MUST use the full webpage- so can be frustrating

title: STOP DELETING WISH LIST FROM BOTTOM
review: I would love for you guys to stop getting rid of the easy access wish list at the bottom of the screen. It‚Äôs so convenient. Would love for you  to keep it there or at least put an option in the app for people who want it there and for people who don‚Äôt. :)

title: Best Place to Shop
review: You can find all you need. Prices are ok and you can always find information for all the things you need. I have bought many things and the products are great and if I don‚Äôt like it I return it. Hope you try it you won‚Äôt regret it.

title: Fix basic things instead of adding new features
review: Why can‚Äôt I download a receipt in the app?  Why is it when I search for something, I get results that are completely off base, or worse, results that seem like the same thing I searched but are a version that won‚Äôt actually fit my car? Why do you allow the sale of seeds for blue strawberries? Come on. Be a better purveyor.

title: Really
review: I have been using this app for years just to look at things and buy some things. For some reason though they changed the age limits which makes me upset don‚Äôt change your age limits just put restrictions on certain things I love this app don‚Äôt get me wrong but after years of having it I shouldn‚Äôt have to be at lost because they decided to change it.

title: Used to love it
review: I used to love this app but then the customer support got in the way. I ordered a suit and got one day shipping and didn‚Äôt receive it in one day. I contacted the support and asked what‚Äôs up I payed for the single day shipping and they informed I would get it in 24 hours. I recently contacted the support team again and was told it would arrive in 4 more days and am greatly confused on why they told me it would arrive so soon to not even notify me it would be arriving late.

title: Needs Security Option
review:
I like the app for a quick review of purchases and deliveries. 

It saves the logon information. If you do not log out then the information is there forever.  I would like to see an option to save user name and use password every time.

title: Alert Needed
review: My one and only complaint with this app is that if you need to revise your payment it does not alert you on an iPhone. I have had several items I‚Äôve ordered and needed ASAP and I will go in to check my status when they haven‚Äôt arrived and find out then that I needed a revise my payment. Just fix that and it‚Äôll be great!

title: Update has messed up wish list
review: Wanted to update my wish list and got the message that I needed to update my app. I‚Äôm running the newest app on my IPad.  Have never had a problem before. Wouldn‚Äôt let me update the amount of an item I had on a wish list. Fix this please.

title: Helpful But
review: This app is helpful but it doesn‚Äôt search for items well. Even when you type it in exactly it may or may not show up. It also forces you to pay very close attention during every step of ordering because it has a nasty habit of switching back to defaults mid transactions. As I said it works and it‚Äôs helpful but I expect more from a multi-billion dollar corporation.

title: iPad (Pro) App Lacks Viewable Customer Images
review: This app is great and I‚Äôve been using it for years across various devices, but I just recently bought an iPad Pro and have been using the app to do some shopping and have realized that the app doesn‚Äôt show customer images for products, which are very helpful during the shopping process.

title: Several issues
review: The ‚ÄúX‚Äù in the right side of the search box that clears the contents is not functional and in an item description it is missing the ‚Äúread more‚Äù link at the bottom to expand the description. These are very annoying quirks

title: Use to work great
review: Fix the app. I use to use it everyday but ever since the "back button" stopped working I no longer bother with the app.   If I open an item to read reviews it won't allow me to go back to my search.  I have to close the app and reopen, which as you can imagine is time consuming.   I spend more time closing and opening the app than I do searching for what I need.

title: 5 star
review: Love your site, but it makes me mad when you spend 20 to 30 minutes scrolling through your saved for later and it kicks you back to the top.

title: Landscape mode restored in the new update.
review:
Thanks for fixing landscape mode for the iPads.
Only four stars because of the annoying pop up shopping cart. I really wish that I could click on it once for a pop up and a second time to switch to a cart page like the desktop version has.

title: It isn‚Äôt just me with issues on the ipad right?
review: So then app running on the iphone works fine.. now issues. but on the ipad is nothing but headaches.  If you are searching and checking out the reviews and photo reviews before you buy on the ipad, I get a black screen.  the app just crashes and needs to be resetarted. This is after an uninstall, reinstall, and on different ipads.

title: Buggy App
review: The app is extremely buggy. About 20% of the time, the product page loads and then goes blank. With no way to refresh, you have to go back and do the same action again and hope the screen does not blank out. Then, there are the numerous ‚Äúnot found‚Äù pages and sometimes adding a product the the cart does not even work. Not sure how the largest retailer in the world can get away with such a poor app.

title: It‚Äôs just so convenient.
review: To me, it‚Äôs just so convenient and gets even better.  I would just like to see the details of the product a little earlier in scrolling down for more information.

title: Ridiculous customer support
review: I‚Äôve been banned from leaving reviews, but I haven‚Äôt left one in months. Also I‚Äôve never made false reviews or attacked a business or made any reviews in a malicious manner. I‚Äôve spoken with suooort who has quite literally said ‚Äúwe can‚Äôt un ban you. We don‚Äôt know why your banned. Also no one else can help explain or fix this ban on my account. I wouldn‚Äôt care so much if I didn‚Äôt use this app almost every week to order EVERYTHING!

title: No customer support
review: Amazing I ordered some things that were supposed to be delivered yesterday. They have not even been shipped yet and when I try to cancel it says they are in the process of getting the order processed after it was supposed to be here yesterday. Of course you cannot speak to a person. This is the most awful support. I wish someone had a better alternative and they will because people are just sick of this.

title: Take all my money!
review: This app is beyond convenient, easy to use and the most useful app you can ever wish for on any device you own! This can be a good and/or a bad thing especially if you have a penchant for spending‚Ä¶ Beware!

title: Feedback food for thought
review: Easy all around‚Ä¶.but, would be super helpful to have night mode option. I have my dark mode brightness turning all the way down. however, the bright white background is blinding while doing my night shopping. It‚Äôs so bright that I have to wear night glasses just to shop on the app to past 7pm.

title: App issues when viewing
review: Lately, when searching for an item in the app, at first the item loads fine but when I tap to view more info about the item, the item loads and then the screen on app goes blank. And the only way to fix this is to close app and reopen it. This happens once in a while not every time but it is becoming an annoyance.

title: Repeatedly have orders not filled.
review:
I have had numerous orders not filled recently. Status states either undeliverable, not accepted or returned. None of these reasons are true. I have only returned two items in months due to size issues. 

If venders can‚Äôt fulfill orders then prohibit them from listing merchandise for sale.

I constantly find that the PRIME filter keeps getting turned off and I want it left on as my first filter. Thanks

title: Shopaholic?
review: Am I a shopaholic, because it‚Äôs been crashing for months on the apple app. I go to anything and it goes blank white. Several times a day, but like I said, am I looking at stuff and shopping to much?  Ive updated my iPhone 13 and apps and it still goes to a white screen and varies but still does it. Maybe its a sign‚Ä¶stop so much unnecessary shopping.

title: Great app and service
review: Love the app it‚Äôs convenient and fast. But as of late it has been very glitchy. I click on something then it loads then it has a blank screen just showing the top blue header. I have to try to or 3 times before I can successfully look at any product.

title: Too easy
review: This is far more convenient than it need be. I should be maxing my steps instead of shopping from my couch with quick delivery and easy exchanges if I could ever find a reason. No name please, I don‚Äôt want anyone to know how lazy I am.

title: Shopping
review: All types of products.. When searching for a product you got a lot to choose from the reviews help out as well‚Ä¶.and give you the amount of time for returning‚Ä¶ Thanks

title: Can‚Äôt purchase from my phone
review: I would buy a lot more if it would let me purchase from my phone. Just recently it has changed where I can‚Äôt purchase from my phone but have to log onto a computer and to buy product. It‚Äôs a hassle.

title: Membership Cancellation
review: Although they refunded the money to my account for the prime video cancellation, I was told because of the inconvenience I would have a gift card in my account for either $5 or $10 and I‚Äôve never seen it!

title: Great, but mistakes lately‚Ä¶
review:
Recently I ordered several items and all but 1 came. It said it was to come packaged together, but my order that I was charged for never has come. The other was an item that I purchased was some pillow covers. The package wrapping was marked correctly but the items in the wrapping 
had a different set, that I did not order. Returned.

title: I‚Äôm Officially A Plank Owner Now!!
review:
Thanks Jeff for over 20 years of amazing shopping, movies and music!! I appreciate your extraordinary global vision accommodating both stellar improvements in the workplace and facilitating space travel encompassing the ideal of boldly voyaging where no man has gone before!
Altruistically yours,
Lynda Carpenter Whelan 
Oceanside, California

title: Customer service
review:
Amazons customer service is atrocious they copy and paste from the playbook they have on another screen they will repeat themselves if they don‚Äôt feel you‚Äôve answered the way they want you to they will do nothing to find a real resolution they are snarky when they actually decide to use the keyboard 
When does obvious that they‚Äôve made a mistake they will do their best to make it your fault and make you do the legwork to fix their problem

title: Frustrating New Version
review: Two things: this new version makes it extremely difficult to locate my subscribe and save items. Continuous loop without actually getting me to where I need to be. Also, I have an item that hasn‚Äôt shown up and where I need to request a refund if only gives the option to return. How can I return an item that has never shown up?

title: Amazon(azing)
review: So quick and easy. Not much time, hop on and order what you need in seconds, receive  it to your front door in a day or two. It‚Äôs the easiest thing to use for the items you can‚Äôt necessarily get at a grocery store.

title: Love it but
review: I love this it is great for shopping and finding things that you would like as a gift. So that  people can get you things that they won‚Äôt waste there money. But one thing I would like to see is how much your wish list adds up to. But other than that it‚Äôs great.

title: Orders
review: PLEASE STOP CHANGING THE ORDERS PAGE! Usually the orders page is filtered by date in which the orders should arrive but every so often you guys change it to where it shows up filtered by the order in which each order was placed, which in turn makes it extremely difficult to find anything. All I ask is that you put the orders page back to normal and this rating will go back up.

title: Rotation Issues !!! Please fix this app üò°
review:
Keeps going to portrait mode on iPad, there‚Äôs a white line on landscape mode, when you press home button it defaults to portrait mode‚Ä¶Very Annoying üëéü§¨

Edit: looks like the iOS 14.8 update fixed this issue

title: Lacks iPad support and advantages
review: Seems like they jammed a phone experience within the iPad. Wish they took advantage of the real estate better. With things like drag and drop to organize list and full advantage of landscape mode.

title: iPad Issues!
review: Do not update to this version of the app!  It has destroyed my ability to buy things using my iPad. At first it rotated to portrait mode constantly, which was annoying, but it was still usable. Now the bottom of the screen is blocked out by a large white space and the BUY button isn‚Äôt visible on the screen either in landscape or portrait mode!  A shocking mistake by the brand that made online shopping easy. Terrible.

title: Latest release has major issues
review: The latest release of the app has some major issues.  When shopping for an item, the buttons to add the item to your cart are off the side of the screen so you cannot access them - whether in portrait or landscape mode.  Part of the page is just a blank white block when you scroll.  It is essentially unusable.  I have had to revert the web browser to shop.

title: Crashes
review: App repeatedly crashes, forces logging in and says ‚Äúsorry something went wrong please try again‚Äù I‚Äôve quit using the app to avoid this-mobile browser works great, but I‚Äôd prefer to use the app, please fix!

title: HATE the new format
review: The new format makes the app almost unusable for me. It forces you to use the app only in vertical mode, and since I amount exclusively use this app on an iPad, I NEVER use it in vertical mode. It makes everything much smaller and harder to see. And there are blank spots at the bottom cutting off what you can see on the screen, making it even harder to use the app to find things. If it‚Äôs not changed soon, I won‚Äôt use the app anymore.

title: App issues
review:
Since the most recent update there is an issue with the UI on the iPad. It won‚Äôt function consistently in landscape mode and there is a blank area at the bottom of the screen. Very frustrating.

Update: Saw on help forum to uninstall and reinstall the app.  Worked like a charm.

title: Second time ordering the same item.
review: Placed order Thursday the 5th, it said delivery by the 8th. Went to track item and there was no record of first item being ordered even though I screenshot the page where it said my order has been placed. I tried again today with delivery Tomorrow. We will see how this goes. Thanks

title: Pretty good app
review:
Shopping is easy and many many things. 
Issue we have is with the kids settings. We have two kids and when they submit an order we can‚Äôt switch between their bank cards.  Doesn‚Äôt allow them to choose their own so we have to move money around. 
Really a pain.

title: Great way to shop
review: Great way to shop I am legally blind and the app is truly accommodating to my situation. I don‚Äôt know what I would do without this app. And customer service has always been wonderful, courteous and definitely a speed demon to resolve problems.

title: availability
review: You have a great variety of products. If I think of something I want I always look on your app first and usually find it there plus price is usually a better price. Thank you so very much for your availability.

title: Amazon‚Äôs the best!
review: We live 50 miles from any shopping except Walmart. It took 2 hours round trip just to get anything! Now, anything we want can be at out door within 2 days. Don‚Äôt know how we lived without! So much frustration saved!

title: I Thought it was just me
review:
What a wreck!  Been trying to check out, but Payment keeps defaulting to Rewards Points.  Where did they come from?  I don't want to receive a bill if I do not actually have rewards.  I don‚Äôt understand it.  I won‚Äôt call bc I cannot hear well, and I cannot understand Bob from Jaipur, nor anyone whose first language isn‚Äôt English.  Not throwing shade; just stating a fact.

Super confusing new app.

title: New add to cart button tricks you into buying unwanted items
review: If you‚Äôre right handed and use your right thumb to scroll on your phone, they have now added a bit so handy add to cart button that is placed right where you would scroll. The button stays at that spot and is more times than not accidentally hit and purchases items that you are trying to view only to decide. I feel this was done purposely to gain unintentional sales by the consumer.

title: Purchase
review: there was this one purchase that i made a few days ago. I just checked the shipment and the price cause why not, and then i checked to see if i had any money left on the gift card. Then i see that there was no money left. The item is was three dollars and i had seven dollars left. They took all my gift card money. The seller scammed  me.

title: I love this app. You can buy things online with try click of a button.
review: This app is amazing and I highly recommend it, however, I do think it should have a dark mode. I also just bought a sword and it is very swag and cool

title: Kinda Weird...but good.
review: Don‚Äôt know why I am not allowed to sign in to my own account no more, after ordering a pair of shoes.?! Tougher than trying to gain access into Fort Knox!!!!! I am currently trying to contact Customer Service... that‚Äôs tough too. I hope to Fix this issue, I really wanna order a bunch of more stuff...Thanks.

title: Poor buisness
review: It‚Äôs great when it comes to buying products easily, getting help in another matter. I keep getting stuck in loops in the system while only being offered options that don‚Äôt apply. They are great at taking your money but horrible when it comes to getting ahold of when issues arise. I miss the days when companies treated loyal customers as assets instead a nuisance they would rather not be bothered with and avoid at all cost.

title: Updated App Hiding Review Dates
review: Why did you remove the dates when looking at reviews? Only the "Top Reviews" section has dates now. This just makes it harder to make an informed decision when shopping. Normally I sort reviews by "Most Recent" and can get a good idea of if a manufacturer has presently changed their product for the worst or see how commonly duds occur, now I can't anymore. I waited to leave a review in case it was a glitch but it's been at least several days now.

title: Shopping
review: Shopping experience great , customer service great as a believer in Christ I may not agree with all the technology and stuff but I do enjoy shopping here I believe great experience to try this , my orders that I purchase in the past have arrive good no damage at all

title: Excellent selection of different items
review: The very best source for shopping. Extremely good variety from electronics, decent quality clothing, fantastic selection of cosmetics and a great books source. Even out of print books.

title: Getting cheap
review: Been getting some substandard products lately that look way nicer in the picture than what you receive. Hope things change or I‚Äôll be back to Walmart or Target!

title: Printing
review:
Sure would be nice to be able to print my invoice from the app with out being redirected back to safari. Plus even being able to find the invoice is really complicated. It‚Äôs easier just to use your browser than this app.

Lao the app is full of clutter. Super complicated just to get the product info and description I‚Äôm looking at, with out seeing all kinds of other junk.

title: Could be perfect, where is dark mode!??
review: App works like it should, I use it a ton and it does what it does well. But why do we still not have dark mode? Every other big app that is worth less than you guys spent the time and effort to do it. I haven‚Äôt seen any new features put into the app in years, so just do us a solid and give us dark mode

title: Amazing
review: It‚Äôs an amazing app. This has save me from forgetting people‚Äôs giftsüíÄ. The only thing is that sometimes things are too expensive plus shipping but I get it. You can also cancel order which is a relive to me because I never think before putting in a order. I recommend it.

title: Put back the previous interface
review:
Keep changing it for the worst. The extra large blocks displaying the item after searching takes too long to scroll through to see lesser number of items. 

Also notice the convoluted cycle of trying to find the customer service number. Takes you in a constant loop ending back in the place. What‚Äôs you angle?

title: Great Job Guys
review: This holiday season you guys went above and beyond with everything I ordered things got here earlier than expected along with great prices . A breath of fresh air from other company‚Äôs delays and problems. Keep up the great work guys. You have a loyal customer.

title: Needs same filters as web version
review: It‚Äôs very difficult to apply specific filters in the app. I understand not wanting to have too many choices at the top bar, but that space should be used for common filters and the full set should be available in a menu that opens on the right side.

title: iPad app missing key features
review:
The iPad app for some time has been missing a proper share button. In addition, when clicking on pictures of an item, the photos no longer open as a pop-up window you can scroll through. You have to press and hold which is very awkward.

The app wasn‚Äôt always like this, so I hope these issues get corrected soon.

title: Old One
review: I can't get to page of home.  I get shopping groceries and stuff. What happened to good one.  Can't find a way to go back. Tried downloading again and get same.  Have to go to home button for accounts etc.

title: App is broken
review: After update I‚Äôm missing want lists and can‚Äôt add items to wants. I just get an error that says function not available at this time. Fix the app please. Also the new updated interface is ugly.

title: App update is completely buggy
review: New update is terrible on my iPhone X. Searches have incomplete results. Example: I was just searching for a Schwarzkopf conditioner and it kept showing no results. I went to my laptop and got hundreds of results. Also, When I make purchases I‚Äôll reopen my app later and they‚Äôre back in my cart, so I have to go back and verify that the purchase went through. If I can‚Äôt search properly what good is the app?

title: Can‚Äôt share
review: The button to share links to products with my friends and family has always been hard to find (it was never consistently placed on the product screen ) and in the last month it seems to have disappeared entirely. This is frustrating for me because I often send links to my wife for her to look at

title: Hate the new format
review: Hi I‚Äôve been using this app for nearly 1 years. The latest update changed the format.  Why do companies do this?  Randomly change the location of important buttons around, when my brain has been trained for years how t find things?  Now it takes me forever to find past orders etc because they are not all under the same heading button.  Why, why, why?  The floating buttons are the worst.

title: Awkward back button
review: The app is ok for searching, a bit faster than Safari, but the back button is in a very awkward and annoying spot. The upper left instead of bottom left where you could reach with your thumb. There‚Äôs no way for one handed browsing in this app as you can in just about everything else. Move the back button to the bottom, near the keyboard!

title: Older layout was better
review: I think the new navigation is a little difficult to understand, the old layout worked way better it was more intuitive, change the skin and keep the old layout please

title: It‚Äôs Perfect
review: This app is amazing I ordered something that was expected in mid June or may and it came like a month or two early other things came significantly early as well I recommend this greatly easy to use and even get notified the moment your package is on the way and delivered, great app :))

title: No To New Update Layout
review: Don‚Äôt care for the updated layout. The other layout worked perfectly fine, it had a desktop feel inside the mobile app. Please consider changing back. Consumer surveys might be a viable option to determine exactly what is working and isn‚Äôt working for customers; therefore cutting down on time wasted with unnecsarry redesigns. I see I‚Äôm not the only one who has expressed dissatisfaction with the new app layout. BTW, I haven‚Äôt been able to access my cart since this app update...

title: Excellent service and timely delivery
review:
This season I really gave prime a workout. I placed 19 orders on Dec 18-20 and all arrived using 2 day shipping on the expected dates. I‚Äôm very pleased with prime videos, they even have ‚Äúlts a Wonderful Life‚Äù, better than Netflix, and the other benefits are great.
It‚Äôs one of the best subscriptions a person could ever purchase.

title: Better option to switch between personal/business
review:
Please enhance the option to switch between personal and business accounts on the both the iPad and iPhone apps. 
 I noticed there is an option to switch accounts, but it requires you to login. Make it so it is as easy as tapping your name>switch accounts>tap on account you‚Äôd like to manage

title: Need more filters
review: There are thousands of items in the app.  When you search for an item, more than 10,000 come up. You only get a handful of filters which if you‚Äôre lucky reduce the number by 2,000.  Unless you know the specific name of the item you‚Äôre looking for get ready for lots of scrolling. At least the app picks up where you last dropped off.

title: Almost perfect
review:
I miss the old filtering. It‚Äôs very irritating when I‚Äôm trying to look for something quickly and have to keep going back to keep filtering more and more, instead of getting through ALL of my filters at once and going through the catalogue according to my preferences. 

I don‚Äôt enjoy having to keep returning to the filter again and again. Bummer.

title: Horrible update
review:
Why did you have to do this to us?! 
I have to Log in every time I want to use this app. Frustrating as hell especially now when I try to shop for Christmas. I browse and find something then try to add it to my shopping cart,and I have to
Log in. I log in,have to go through my email to get 4digit password to verify my identity and then surprise surprise I can‚Äôt find the item I just added to the cart. HATE IT. 
I don‚Äôt appreciate the pages too! I just want to scroll down,no
Pages please.

title: Can‚Äôt login
review: App keeps reseting to the screen asking for user email. After entering email and it shows the password screen there‚Äôs not enough time to even paste in the password, it skips back to the email screen. If I‚Äôm lucky enogh to get past the password screen it asks for the OTP and then skips back to the email screen. Infuriating.

title: First, drag and drop gone now the list is gone from the screen.
review: I wish the developers would stop changing things just for the sake of changing. I‚Äôm a software developer and we always go through a review process to make sure our customer wants the changes. It seems like your developers make changes just because they want to. Was a great app, now it‚Äôs a horrible app. You might as well just go to the website.

title: Search & Filter Dysfunctional
review: The website has this issue, too, but it's worse on the app. Filtering search results doesn't work as intended. It's all a huge headache. As just one example, let's say you think you have all your filters set correctly. You see 165 results. But then you change how the results are sorted (example: Sort by Avg Customer Review) and now there are 15 results. Why would the other results disappear based on the sorting method? I could go on & on, but this app is pretty useless.

title: Every update makes it less functional
review: Most recent update makes it impossible to now select an item for return on the app. Also, one thing I absolutely hate is not being able to define exact price range you‚Äôre looking in vs the pre-defined amounts. Having to go to a desktop each time especially in this day and age makes this app only partially helpful.

title: Broken
review: Every time I filter my searches and unfilter them later on, it removes the majority of the products forever. If I were to search for a console for example, only limited accessories would appear, but not the console itself. This is a big problem for people. Not being able to find the products just because they used the "Filter" option once. So, in short words, the "Filter" option is broken.

title: Delete old orders
review: Why is it I can‚Äôt delete orders from 2014 and up until now to other people? I don‚Äôt send to those addresses any more and would rather delete them! I only want to see what I‚Äôve ordered for the past 6 months, nothing else! Very disappointed, pay this much money and I can‚Äôt delete certain things, does this mean you are tracking our every move while on here? Has to be otherwise we could delete!

title: Last update screwed something up !
review: So now if you open up a picture of a product then move on to a different product it will open up the pic from first product. And keeps going back to the first product.

title: Some app buttons aren‚Äôt working at all
review: Since the new update, I‚Äôve had trouble getting the app to respond when I try to use certain functions like pressing ‚Äúdone‚Äù after viewing colors for items, ‚Äúsee all lists‚Äù, and selecting items in the text completion drop down menu! Fix this! The app would also be much better if you could purchase kindle books through it, but that‚Äôs a whole other issue.

title: Refund
review: I have been at ease with how easy it has been to get refunded on items that have been lost in transit to my home. Expecting to get a hard time. But the operators  have been very helpful, thank you for the good experience.

title: Back button not working
review: On the mobile app, when I go to look at an item and I want to go back, the back button doesn‚Äôt do anything. I have to close out of the app and go back to what I was doing. Just started doing this today. I tried restarting my phone but that‚Äôs not the problem cuz it‚Äôs still doing it

title: The most recent update broke the app
review: The most recent update broke the app. It freezes and crashes frequently. The screen becomes unresponsive when I attempt to click the search button and I can only close the app and open it again to get it to work again. App was working just fine before they released the update. Now it‚Äôs virtually unusable. Please fix. Also, why is there no easily accessible app developer contact info for this app so that people can report a problem?

title: Just don't use it twice in a row
review: If you order something with the app, and you then remember you need to order something else, for some set period of time, the ordering portion of the app will not work. You go to place order and the information disappears.  The next day it will work, but the app is useless for a good while.   Makes it a real pain for someone who uses the app all the time.

title: Not good for an app
review: This app never is accurate. If you want to check your orders, and you bought something through your computer, it will never track the order in the app. Yeah, is good to go and buy something fast, but lacks everything else. I had a lot of email login problems, password problems, verification, etc. Things that an app shouldn‚Äôt do. Please fix üëçüèΩ

title: New update causing issues
review: Since the new update I am no longer able to view photo or video reviews. As soon as I open the app or try clicking on reviews, searching products or really at any random time it gives me a ‚ÄúSorry, something went wrong. Please try again.‚Äù message. I am still able to shop but it is extremely annoying how this message pops up and I cannot look at video/photo reviews.

title: Prime has gone to Crap
review: This app used to be good but nothing seems to be prime anymore. Seemed like almost everything was prime 3 years ago and now I have to scroll through 3 pages just to find an item that is prime. Everything else takes 2 weeks to come in unless we pay a $30-$40 fee for fast delivery. (But I already pay a lot for a prime membership that is basically useless now.) I will be canceling my membership immediately.

title: Fix the white screen bug
review: It‚Äôs been going on for years now.. you‚Äôre browsing and out of nowhere, the screen goes white. The only thing that can fix it is going back to home. So if you‚Äôre down many pages searching for an item and this happens you have to go back to the first page

title: Worst Customer Service
review: This is the first time I am writing a review for any of the business. Just utterly disappointed with the handling of order issue. Customer service gave their word for issuing the refund 2-3 times and then plainly said they won‚Äôt give it and didn‚Äôt want to respond further for the issue. Never happened before. Talked to almost 10 associates and all had different answers. Just thinking is it really worth being a Prime customer?

title: Chaos!!!!
review: I‚Äôve never had an issue with my app before. All of the sudden it‚Äôs slow, unresponsive, buggy, crashes, my purchases are not showing up in my orders. They come and go, like disappear then reappear to only disappear again. I constantly have to close out of the app and restart. Doesn‚Äôt refresh. Or I‚Äôll be in the middle of doing something and it either takes me back to the home page or shuts down on me completely.

title: Good overall. Painful for reviews
review: This app is fine for shopping, but has a major flaw for reviewing products. If you create a review and then add a photo or video, you will lose your entire review, except for the overall star rating. You must add the photo/video and then create the review. Or, just skip the app and use the website.

review: When an item was sent to the wrong city, there is no where to notify the vendor of the fact that the item was not received by the 94 year old mother-in-law. On the return list, there needs to be did not receive or an ‚Äúother‚Äù.

title: By enlarge
review:
By enlarge these- you guy do great work. Although the service-products have changed since I started to use  them 17 yrs. Past, I still look forward to using your service as a comparison shopping tool.
Be well moses w LaFountaine

title: Bad customer service
review: Worst app ever to shop . They will send you the wrong products and when you try to return it they will try to put your money back on their gift card. Not to mention their customer service representative that lady name unika she‚Äôs rude and believes because she‚Äôs a supervisor she can talk to you anyhow . I used to love shopping with y‚Äôall now it‚Äôs trash . And worst customer service ever if I could give y‚Äôall a 0 star I would have been better

title: New bug started around mid April 2022
review: When I select an item from a list after a search, I can view the item for a few seconds and she. I try to scroll everything blanks out. Even now I am getting g a blank screen while typing this review. They must have screwed up the font properties on the iPhone app‚Ä¶

title: Best place to shop for everything

This is a completed failure. How do I navigate to change language, when everything is in a language I do not speak?  What else did I change or order while trying?

title: Each update wipes out progress
review:
I need invoices printed for tax purposes. And I need to be able to order on the go, so I‚Äôve been using the mobile app. 

Unfortunately, Amazon‚Äôs developer cannot seem to maintain progress on one front without rolling out ‚Äúupdates‚Äù that erase progress on other fronts.

I used to have ability to print invoices from the mobile app, then I couldn‚Äôt when an update was installed. I complained, and the capability to print invoices from my phone was restored only for a subsequent ‚Äúupdate‚Äù to wipe out that ability again. 

I don‚Äôt have time to rush to my desktop or laptop to access the invoice printing capability. Why can‚Äôt it be standard in the mobile app?

title: Christmas Blessings
review: It is such a blessing to have Christmas presents sent at the last moment when family emergencies has interrupted availability to shop. So Thank you and your entire staff including drivers. I pray that you all have a blessed Christmas.

title: Why are the item pages going blank?

It‚Äôs kept me from buying several items because I‚Äôm just not able too see the item. Please fix ASAP.

review: I ordered three items. Only two items were more than $25, not telling with the third item. title: So fast and easy to shop

                         Thanks, Fred T Schuh

Great app overall

Weakness areas:
purchase of certain products is limited on mobile app (apple rules & laws) - can‚Äôt buy audiobook, can‚Äôt buy kindle book, can‚Äôt pay for a song. 

back button on ios - still shows up after you complete purchase - clicking on it only adds to confusion- can you modify any aspect of what you purchased? no. Not sure what it is there for. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è

search is ok - once you start filtering / sorting on price- really random items show up - most of the time having almost nothing to do with your original search.

title: Bad design

Screen again went blank but order did process.  Developers FIX this Freakin app!  Also update customer service so they know it‚Äôs an issue and stop telling them to tell customers to delete the app and reboot the phone IT DOES NOT WORK!

Not the app. I was on an older version for quite awhile and any links I clicked from emails would take me to the app. What‚Äôs the point of having an app if I‚Äôm not taken to it?

Constantly flips from landscape to portrait even though my iPad is docked on my keyboard, which started about two updates ago. Now the most recent update still didn‚Äôt fix that issue but now only about half the screen is usable and the other half is just blank. Can‚Äôt even accurately navigate within the app anymore.

title: Do it for Jeff
review: The least we could do for this money hoarder is to make a few million purchases so he could go to space in a.. um‚Ä¶ rocket.? This poor guy has a yacht for his yacht, how embarrassing that he doesn‚Äôt have a rocket for his rocket. Oh wait I see what he did there.

title: New design a mess on ipad

Biggest problem is that app opens in portrait orientation when device is locked in landscape orientation. 

App used to default to Wish List, but now defaults to Shopping List, which I do not use. Multiple taps to get to the list I use. 

Orders used to be conveniently located in the ‚Äúhamburger‚Äù menu, but now more difficult to find.

title: Needs accessibility support
review: The app is fine in terms of ease-of-use, but the main problem is that you cannot change the font size in the app. For a visually impaired person this is very annoying because you also can‚Äôt use pinch to zoom‚Ä¶ so using the phones built-in magnifier is required, which is a hassle.

title: Garbage customer service
review:

Garbage customer service on the app can‚Äôt even get ahold of a person

title: Don‚Äôt you ever let‚Äôs downüôè

pictures more clearer on the mobile app.

title: Awesome

title: Terrible company

I could care less about the current White House resident, this is about telling the American people what they are and aren‚Äôt allowed to view, think, and say. Nor can I use the Share button, though the List(s) button works fine. Pretty aggravating. I‚Äôve already tried deleting and reinstalling it.

title: I love it!

Don‚Äôt try to solve a non existent problem

Revert to the old app which allowed me to use a radio button to select drop off location (UPS store, Kohl‚Äôs, etc) and let me select what store front I drop by. No good :(

I could‚Äôve gotten the same items myself without having to pay 14 bucks for prime for the same amount price. Don‚Äôt even mind getting help from customer service the whole system is a mess. title: App changed

title: So nice.

title: Cant search by category

title: Never got my iPhone case.

title: Remove pages

title: I hate the new viewing style
review: I hate the new viewing style where it shows items in two separate columns and you have to keep clicking next after only viewing a few. Is there an option to put it back to a standard single column display? This way hurts my eyes and is too busy. I also really miss the option to drag and drop items to my list in the bar on the bottom of the screen. The app keeps getting worse with every major update.

title: Being 12
review: I love this app, and this store. The only problem is that I am 12 years old and this is restricted to 17 and up. I think this should be changed. Why can‚Äôt children shop? This needs to be fixed and I think it should be fixed fast.

title: They keep making the app worse.
review: First they got rid of being able to drag items to a list from the search results. Now they doubled up on dumb. The results refresh after each filter you apply. So, if you you want filter by brand, price, and seller you have to wait forever for each refresh. Also they switched to paged results instead of loading more when you hit the bottom of the page. Whoever signed off on this needs to meet an end-user.

title: Don‚Äôt update! Next and bad filter changes
review: Hate the update. Search results now make you hit next after about 10 results on a page. But even worse. When you try to filter results, it only lets you click on filter at a time then it takes you back to load results. Then you have to click filter AGAIN. No way to click multiple filters at once and THEN load results. Yuck!

title: Bring back ‚ÄúList‚Äù Tray feature and fix the return label printing from the app
review:
The ability to drag and drop items, and compare different items... all gone. now kt‚Äôs like a 5 step process to loom at items saved to one list to the next.

also printing shipping labels from the app needs to be fixed. Because I actually cannot print from the app. I‚Äôll get a link from my email, link, and instead of opening in browser, it‚Äôs open in app, where I cannot print from.  please fix that.

title: Wishlists changes make the app useless for me
review: I use the phone app for quick reference and checking prices in wishlists. It has always been quick and easy but now they screwed up the list options and I no longer have a tray option at the bottom of the app, I can‚Äôt change which is my default wishlist nor can I drag and drop items into a list. If I want to go through all the trouble it now is to browse I might as well do it on a computer. Epic failure in an ‚Äúupdate‚Äù

title: App
review: The app itself is going steadily down hill. You use to be able to have a one item list view but now it has multiple per view which makes the pictures pretty small. Also you used to be able to click and drag, then drop items into your wish list at the bottom of the screen. I noticed yesterday, you can't even do that anymore. If they fixed these bugs I'd say the app was great.

title: Filter options on Daily Deals
review: In the latest release the option to filter daily deals by department was removed or hidden so well I wasn‚Äôt able to find it. I understand you can scroll left or right to see some options like lightening deals, computers, home. It was just easier to shop when i could narrow the choices to what i was shopping for.

title: Fire stick with Alexa
review: When I made my purchase I was offered 30 days free prime which I have decided is not a good fit for me. I called and spoke with one of your reps to make sure prime would not be added to my bill. I was not at all satisfied with the outcome of that conversation.  On the other hand I am extremely satisfied with my new fire stick. Please make sure I am no longer charged for prime.  Thank you

title: Sign out
review:
For some reason when I am signed in on my app it will not allow me to sign out without going to settings and click on where it says not you? Sign out
Was not like this before - if I closed app I would have to use my fingerprint to open

title: Do not like the new format
review: In the previous version of this app when you search for something it would give you results side by side and you could view maybe 6 to 8 items at a time before scrolling down now you can only give you one or two items at a time.

title: Pictures!!
review: Can you please change the way pictures behave? People post pictures of reviews that only show part of the entire picture missing out on previous details left out. We need to fix this! Happy

title: Book purchases
review: Nice app and easier to use than a website on my ipad, however it would be much better if I could order my Kindle books as well!  I can order and pay for any thing except books. WHY?

title: Completely Ripped Off
review: This company is a complete joke now. I ordered an item which i needed in 24 hrs. I selected one day shipping but when i check on my order later i realize they actually gave me standard shipping despite charging me for one day. What do they do to correct the issue? Give me some half assed apology and a try to assure me a refund will be given in 5 days. So not only do i not have the item I desperately need but i‚Äôm out on the money I spent and no item. I would give negative stars if I could. This company is trash.

title: Redesign? Definitely.
review: This app is functional, but it needs a redesign. The way that the items are displayed is messy. Names of products need to me less details. People can get the details when they click on the item and read more. You don‚Äôt need 20 words in the title or name of the product. In addition, the products need to be displayed in a different way, so people can see more than two or three products on the screen at once.

title: Withholds product information
review: This app shows less information about a product than the corresponding website does. Entire sections of the product info, like Technical Details, are omitted, without any indication of the omission, and without any option to reveal the omitted info. Given that the objective of shopping online is to gather information about products, this flaw makes the use of the app frustrating to the extent that users would be better off by not using it.

title: Can‚Äôt buy anything since the last couple updates
review: About two updates ago a and continuing with this current version I cannot get into my cart to make purchases. Every time my Face ID try‚Äôs to log me in I get a message saying ‚Äúsomething went wrong. Please try again.‚Äù I‚Äôve also tried logging out but I get the same message when I do that. Essentially I‚Äôm stuck in a constant loop of logged in enough to add things to my cart but not enough to actually buy anything through the app

title: Only OK
review: The iPad app is not nearly as inclusive as the website or even the iPhone app.  Account settings are quite hidden.  To update my credit card information I had to go to about 4 different places within the app. It should all be in one common place.  Additionally, photos of reviews are not easily accessible at the top of reviews as they are on the website.  Very disappointed that such a huge corporation has such a lacking app.

Today I was looked at a totally different product and the same thing happens; when I click the video the screen goes all white and it takes me back to the home page. It‚Äôs frustrating

title: Mr
review: You customer service people are second to none. The phone is always answered quickly, no waiting on hold and problem is handled satisfactorily and expeditiously. Your returns are handled easier than any company I have ever dealt with. Thank you.

title: Amazon‚Ä¶.why I buy
review: The selection is inclusive of almost every product in the category. The delivery is quicker than anybody else including the manufacturer, and the return policy gives me confidence that I will not be hassled if I have to return it.

title: Glitching
review: This app keeps buying me the same product that‚Äôs already been delivered, I canceled it multiple times but still didn‚Äôt work it‚Äôs making me very upset how this app is not functioning properly. Seriously I would not recommend getting this app if it‚Äôs gonna buy you the same product and take your money away. If the package comes to my house after I canceled it I will never buy anything from this app ever again.

title: Please fix the issues
review: When I look at a suggested product from the app, I can see the product and price, and then the screen goes white in the app. I hit the back button and the suggested item is gone. This started In 2022, I believe. I am on an iOS and have removed and reinstalled the app multiple times üòï

It‚Äôs been very consistent, and it‚Äôs been very annoying.

title: Most amazing thing in my life after my kids
review: I have been a costumer with you guys for over 10 years and I literally order everything from amazing whether it‚Äôs clothes or houseware even food ingredients!!! I live on here ;);)

title: Search engines
review:
I am so tired of putting things in the search and getting things that have nothing to do with my search.

title: Thank you
review: I always have a awesome online shopping experience and can find what is not available in stores. Customer service is attentive and able to provide the assistance needed at the time

title: Text gift card! Yes, please!

title: I put a five because

title: DON‚ÄôT WASTE YOUR TIME.

title: So great!
review: I bought a lot of things off of here it is so awesome I bought the new iPhone 12 promax for only $1000 it‚Äôs just so awesome I wait there‚Äôs a five out of five the only thing is that some lady was talking on there when I was shopping and I had to delete the app and re-download it and then she stopped

title: It used to be good‚Ä¶
review: this app used to be good some updates ago but it just turned really bad. Mostly because now a lot of the time your package is revised, and I don‚Äôt know but whenever I get fragile packages like glasses they always come broken‚Ä¶

review:
There needs to be a way to customize your home page. I‚Äôve never used dash buttons, never will, and would like to remove them from the app. Or at the very least, push them to the bottom of the screen so they‚Äôre not pushing the more useful functions out of view. 

Additionally, the app team should be using metrics to dictate the design. I don‚Äôt know anyone who uses these digital dash buttons, yet they‚Äôre taking up the most valuable part of the screen. Makes no sense.

title: It needs work.
review: The app works fine. Not great. It‚Äôs still easier to go to the mobile site than trying to do anything with my account in the app. Entering my password never works the first time, and I usually have to refresh to get to my orders. It has some wrinkles that need to be smoothed, and until then, I‚Äôll just go to the mobile site for anything account-sensitive.

title: No Wish List on iPad mini!!
review: Guessing this is from the most recent update but if I go to open my wish list it tells me it's not available in this version and wants me to update and gives me a link to do so but only option in the App Store is to open the app. I uninstalled the app and reloaded it and still have the same issue. Please fix as I use my lists very often!!!

title: More options to pay
review: I have no money on my card but I have enough gift card balance to pay for everything and there is no option to pay for with gift card balance I can‚Äôt pay for anything. :/

title: Prime has become a lie

Now it‚Äôs become so convoluted and ridiculous that it simply isn‚Äôt worth it anymore. You waste time shopping for items only to find out that ‚ÄúPrime‚Äù shipping gets you your stuff in a week or even longer. Uh, what am I paying for then? If it‚Äôs not able to be to me in 2 days then why is it allowed to have the Prime icon? Quit trying to backtrack on your promises.

title: Textbook rentals???
review: I‚Äôve looked far and wide in the app for the textbook rentals I have rented so I can manage my rentals, but have yet to find it. I‚Äôm currently stuck because my computer and printer won‚Äôt communicate and I need to return a book by the 19th. After a few days of trying to sort out the issue, I tried again to find my rentals on the app to no avail. Why can‚Äôt we find that in the app!!??

title: Very bad and unreliable
review: service is horrible the delivery time are not as said ever MULTIPLE occasions I have had packages that were supposed to be next day and I ordered it at the very beginning of the day 7-8 am came 3 days later at 8:30 pm in a white unmarked van with the steep blasting and packages all over the vehicle I understand with Covid that‚Äôs time may vary and with the national truck driver shortage but not excuse for no communication or anything just said ‚Äúproblem in transit the whole 2 days

title: Zero stars!!!!
review: It‚Äôs not what it used to be. All items are delayed no matter what and it‚Äôs difficult to get any answers from anyone since they blame you for your delayed items. Also, when my items were canceled they required a photo of the damaged items or have me return them‚Ä¶ well that‚Äôs difficult when I never received the items! In all honesty, just go get your items from your local stores.

title: App pages crash frequently

title: Quality Control
review: Overall happy with orders. However, I have had to send the same product back over and over because of size.  No one checks the size of pet harness.

title: Best app ever
review: I absolutely love this app!!! Best delivery, best customer service, there is nothing I haven‚Äôt been able to find on here!! Best prices ever!!!! Always comes through in a clutch also!!!! Have never experienced any better app or shopping experience

title: How nice, convenient & often the only access to stuff
review: Fun to browse - Often reminded of forgotten enjoyments of lots of kinds - Things of the past that I couldn‚Äôt find ‚Äòtill now (sort of like a ‚Äúperiod piece‚Äù) - seem to be a GOOD habit, like sleep & friends !  üòâ

title: Don‚Äôt love it
review: It‚Äôs trying it‚Äôs best, so I‚Äôm giving it 5 stars, even thought I hate that On my phone I can‚Äôt use the back arrow and end up forgetting amazing products while shopping at 2 am. I prefer the website but, A for effort app!!

title: Screen turns white
review: Every time I click on a product to find more info about it, my screen turns white and I have to arrow back to pull it back up. It‚Äôs been doing this for the past few weeks now and I have no idea why.

title: Screen turns white
review: One little bug. When I search for an item and select one, the screen goes white and becomes unnavigable. The only way to remedy it is to click on another tab and back, or return to the search.

title: Reviews aren‚Äôt for the correct product!
review: I value the reviews that customers submit for a product. However. I‚Äôm  noticing more and more reviews that are for products that are not the one at which they are posted. Today I found a review of mine for an item that is similar, but it is not the one I reviewed. I tried to leave feedback, but I could not find a place to do so.

title: Inaccurate transit time estimations
review: This app consistently has incorrect transit times. Today in the order screen it states my order will arrive today. After placing the order it updates and says my order will arrive Saturday or two days later. It‚Äôs very misleading to state one transit time and after a product is purchased the transit time changes. That‚Äôs what I would call a bait and switch. Very displeased with this dishonest business practice.

title: Great customer service
review: Anytime I have an issue with a product pitched the chat team straightens it out right away. They are always pleasant and quick to take care of any issue. Great service is always appreciated!

title: Empty Shelves
review: So many of the more popular/ higher quality items are more often than not, out of stock. This alone makes it nearly impossible to plan meals. How can you when so many times you need are outta stock. Sometimes for weeks on end. I‚Äôm seriously considering using a local supermarket instead

title: Needs to be fixed

I‚Äôve tried updating the app and everything and it‚Äôs  still happening. I have to completely close out all the apps in my phone to get out of it and lose whatever I was looking at. Please fix this.

title: Worst update to the app

In the new update, we Have to keep clicking the load more button and it‚Äôs refreshing the whole page. Hence I‚Äôve to go through so many items to reach the new items‚Ä¶ frustrating and confusing since i can‚Äôt Keep track of what items I‚Äôve already seen. 

Please roll back to previous version.

title: Searching
review:
When searching for a certain item. I would to see only that item and not others. I search for a certain toy bear by its name I don‚Äôt want to see rabbits ducks or other stuff. 
Thank you

title: Update

I‚Äôve tried so many ways to relieve the pain in my neck, back and between my shoulders. Nothing compared to the way this massager has helped and it felt good while it was doing its job, not a ‚Äúno pain no gain‚Äù situation at all.

Ed Day

Your filtering option also doesn‚Äôt help because when I filter only ‚Äúopen orders‚Äù it then takes out all the orders that are already shipped. This should be fixed.

review:
Why is there still no way to quickly go to the main screen after an order is placed? You have to repeatedly press the back button? This makes no sense and is a pain to use.

review:

Other than that very happy with the app.

title: Great app

It‚Äôs so easy to use my kids can use it.

title: Dedicated!!!
review: I don‚Äôt usually write reviews, but after I got a certain delivery, I was shocked. If ordered a package, which happened on a rainy day. Usually companies would place them under the roof, but the bottom would get soaked. However, I got my delivery wrapped in a bag, so it wouldn‚Äôt get wet. Really happy!

For some reason, recently the app signs me out frequently and every time I want to make a purchase I need to enter my password.

I get the still loading sign for almost everything. My WiFi at home is above 100mbps. It‚Äôs infuriating.

Deleting the app, because half the things can only be purchased threw the website anyways.

title: Liked the old app better
review: I don‚Äôt like how the new app makes you change to new pages (after only a dozen or so items) instead of searching by scrolling down. It takes too much time and makes we want to use another site/app. It likely does this to show the top sponsored items which makes it even less convenient.

What a step backwards... it makes comparing prices when shopping and toggling between products incredibly frustrating. Please change it back.

12.9 iPad Pro - Latest iOS.

title: This app is garbage üò°üëéüèº

And if you‚Äôre very unlucky, they will charge your card three separate times for the same amount in a 15 minute window. title: they used my new gift card even though i said differently
review: i said i wanted to use the remaining of my old gift card and then my debit card but i later realized they used the gift card and then used the NEW gift card i put in AFTER i made the order. Unfortunately the new gift card balance was to be split between me and my friend and i now have less than what i should‚Äôve had because they didn‚Äôt use my debit card like i requested

title: Switching between personal & business account
review:
Please make it easy to switch between a personal & business acct for the same person who uses the same prime membership. Be able to switch between accts. 
Other than that it is a great app.

title: Not great
review:
The app works well with two exceptions.  
1.  Customer uploaded images don‚Äôt appear in the reviews like on the website or even on the phone app.  
2.  When selecting a size or other option from the pop up window, scrolling up and down doesn‚Äôt work at all.

These are very frustrating issues when trying to order specific items.  I am using an IPad Pro so not sure if that is the issue.

title: No longer works in landscape on iPad.  (Fixed)
review:
I would be sure that 90% of the iPad users use landscape all of the time.  It has worked in landscape for many years, why all of a sudden is it portrait only?

Issue fixed, all is well again.

title: Shopping Cart Bug
review: App works as advertised. Great for looking up for and buying everything you can from the website. My biggest gripe is that the shopping cart gets emptied out between the web and my iPad/iPhone. It‚Äôs really annoying to have a list of things in the cart in one place, see the number of items in the cart icon (on my iPad), the see it go to zero when I open the cart on my iPhone. Weird bug - please fix!

title: Problems FIXED
review:
(1) For the first few minutes after installing the present app (for a second time!), I could press "Your Other Lists" and view my Shopping List. Then, it's stuck in Wish List. 

(2) I often press the "Return". Nothing happens. 

Never had these problems before the app was changed.

title: iPhone X issue
review: The top control features do not respond. The left error or back button does not respond on iPhone X after the latest update. Also the search field that brings up the keyboard does not always respond after the update. You have to close the app and restart to get it to work, then only works for a few clicks. Needs a bug fix ASAP for iPhone X

title: Stop asking me to sign in every 2 seconds, please
review:
This is a recent issue, but for the last 3 weeks when I‚Äôm using the app, it keeps asking me to sign in. Most of the time it‚Äôs serval times in a row. I mean seconds from one another. Please fix this glitch.

Also, can you please integrate the AmazonSmile feature on the app? We didn‚Äôt realize thousands of dollars that we spent on the app did not go towards our organization of choice - Make A Wish.

title: Power rangers
review: Ok so we know the power rangers but see I really want more costume options on white ranger costumes because when I look for some keep in mind I‚Äôm 10 and all I find is some for adults please sell some for kids

title: What happened to landscape mode?

Then I have to turn it back to landscape mode to type in what I want to purchase. It‚Äôs NEVER been this difficult before. Are you seriously trying to make purchasing more difficult? Doesn‚Äôt sound like good business practice to me. Please fix this before I go completely crazy.

title: Something wrong with the ‚Äúadd to cart‚Äù
review: Every time I try and add an item to my cart, it tells me to check my connection settings and try again. I absolutely will not let me add anything to my cart, but I can ‚Äúbuy with one click‚Äù it makes no sense and it super frustrating, especially when trying to order multiple items! Also, you can‚Äôt add ‚Äúadd on items‚Äù because you cannot put anything in your cart!

title: Eh

And when you google specifics it gives you the exact opposite of what you specifically ask for (ex. Search: vanity mirror touchscreen makeup desk - then vanity touch screen mirrors show up with no mf desk) bum ash.

title: What happened!!

I have to then click on the order to even than see if it‚Äôs shipped.  Every time I go to checkout, I have to select my payment method.  Ughhh. Why couldn‚Äôt well enough be left alone?!?!?!?

title: Probably an essential app

title: App needs improvement

title: Superb

title: Running Late Status

title: Country Selection

title: Love it
review: This app makes it easy to shop and find everything you need and can think of, and  makes returns easy if the product does not fit your needs.

title: Info
review: The representative was great , she walked me through step by step until the problem was fixed. The best customer service I have had in a very long time. Thanks Mary   (I think the names correct) ü§î Thanks Again !

title: Freezing
review: So when I open up the app it loads but if I search something the page goes blank and it won‚Äôt reload I‚Äôm constantly having to close the app and restart it and open it back up hoping it‚Äôs gonna work it‚Äôs very aggravating to say the least please fix this my company depends on it

review: My favorite site to find whatever I need. Great selection on clothes, house wears, food etc. also best prices and rewards that add up! Representatives are great if you have to contact them. Returns are simple and fast. Best place to shop!

title: Watch you account

If something isn‚Äôt available to be shipped then mark it as such. Don‚Äôt let a customer ‚Äúpurchase‚Äù it and then come up with some legal speak way to explain why they are taking your money again

title: One app shop
review: I can most often find what I need on this app, and not wait forever since I have Prime, although it is not always next day delivery.  Good comparison price shopping when out in the store or flea market.

title: I just love it!
review: I can pretty much always find what I‚Äôm looking for and I love getting it delivered to my place. It‚Äôs extremely convenient, consistent, and I feel fortunate to get most things delivered free because I have prime. It‚Äôs not perfect but darn near close.

title: I guess Amazon‚Äôs doesn‚Äôt want me to purchase anything
review: Every time I try to click on photos of reviews it just says ‚Äústill loading‚Äù with the whole page white and it gets stuck there. I have to close the entire app and reopen it, then go to my profile and look for browse history just to find the item I was looking at just to still not be able to see review photos. SMH this is so frustrating.

title: Excellent

title: Delivery service scam
review: Ive been waiting for 2 packages over a week that say our for delivery. After speaking with the UPS driver he told me because of the snow the packages for that day are put into a warehouse and ‚Äúwe will get to them when we get to them‚Äù.  Orders placed AFTER the snow day get delivered before the snow delay packages. He said once the package is marked to denote a weather delay, UPS Is off the hook for return charges hence the lackadaisical attitude from UPS.   This is B.S. and clearly needs to be addressed by Bezozon.

title: Review

Won‚Äôt be buying any more from them. Stampin Up is the best.  Don‚Äôt bother trying the cheap knock-offs.

title: How to report already arrived??
review:
I have notifications telling me an item is on its way, yet it arrived days ago already. There‚Äôs no option to stop the notifications due to this.
There‚Äôs also no option to state an item never arrived. Especially if you have cameras and can see nothing being delivered.

title: Price gouging
review: I own my own business with my family, I am 3rd generation. And the price gouging being allowed on this monopoly that nobody else can compete against is ridiculous. I know whomever reads this is just doing their job, in the ‚Äúcorporate world.‚Äù But if you really cared you folks would walk out for more than just fair pay, you should also walk out for the monopolistic business practices that are ruining small business America. Merry Christmas and Happy holidays!

title: No hassles
review:

title: Happy customer

title: Alexa icon placement is intrusive.
review:
Please give us a way to get rid of the Alexa icon at the bottom right of the app screen. It‚Äôs in a terrible place for right-handed scrollers. I hit the icon and open the pop-up so often I‚Äôve started using the mobile site instead.

title: Deliveries unreliable
review:

Additionally many time marked as delivered and when I call to make an inquiry i am told that I should give it a few days or talk to my neighbors, that is not acceptable.
Most deliveries are not within two day window as promised‚Ä¶.. your delivery service is horrible!
