title: Ease of finding the items I need.
review: Over the years l have ordered numerous items and always been satisfied with them , have sent back very few purchases and always very accommodating. Mike

title: Private/Shopping List
review:
Please include in your next update the ability to select multiple products in the shopping list. I am organizing my list and it‚Äôs taking time because I have to go in each item one by one to move it to another List or Buy section.  

Select all and select the next action are missing, as well the ability to change the featured picture for the list.

title: Won‚Äôt let me log in
review: I had a old prime account. I log in my new one. I got a new phone and now it won‚Äôt let me log in the new and forcing me to use it. Doesn‚Äôt let me log in to any other accounts. Please fix!

title: Freezes during ‚Äústill loading‚Äù screen
review: Recently, whenever I click on reviews to read, the app completely freezes and says ‚Äústill loading‚Äù with a yellow button at the top I cannot see because it is completely out of frame. I hope this gets fixed soon! It‚Äôs been super frustrating.

title: Checkout page & free shipping
review: The changes to the checkout page make it easy to checkout without selecting your desired shipping speed and it doesn't default to free shipping so now I find myself canceling and reordering because the checkout button is above the shipping selection

title: Credit Card
review:
I have to change my credit card 
Every time I buy something depending on if it‚Äôs for the business or personal it is sometimes inconvenient to get to that screen.
Can this be improved upon?

title: Makes life So simple
review:
Love it last minute items I need with next day delivery makes my life so much easier than having to go out and waste hours in lines and traffic and be in the cold gotta love it. 
Faithful customer Elsa

title: App is easy to use and very in depth
review: Easy to order things and reviews are helpful would change only the way some items are bundled together for reviews.

title: What happened to CUSTOMER SERVICE?
review: What did you do with the easy access to CUSTOMER SERVICE?  I‚Äôve been sitting here for 10 minutes trying to locate and FINALLY did. It used to be all over your app. Now I can only find it in one spot. It used to so easy to CHAT with a rep. While I was chatting with her, I had to go back to my account to look up something on my order. I got so frustrated trying to get back to my original chat with her!!  This is RIDICULOUS!!

title: Great except for constant changes
review: Recently changed app - again!  Had to find where things had moved. Discovered the ‚Äúupcoming‚Äù list was not to be found.  Frustrating.

title: They sell almost everything!
review: Quick, easy, and safe with easy returns and promotions.  Makes us look forward to seeing the delivery truck in the neighborhood!  It‚Äôs like Christmas - without all the hassles.

title: Stupid Clothing items
review: I love shopping and stuff but when I go in this app looking for clothes even when I specify like when I write ‚Äúblack shirts for girls not cropped size 14/16‚Äù it always shows stuff for men or women or even infants.I also see stuff that‚Äôs almost what I‚Äôm looking for but it obviously has to be cropped üòíPlease add more clothing items on the app because I can never find the clothes I want.I hate this app üëéüëéüëé

title: Shipping is a joke.
review: Prime shipping clearly does not exist anymore. I have purchased many ‚ÄúPrime‚Äù items that say delivered in 2 days and it has almost always been 4+ days before receiving my items. Multiple times I have not received and item. I have requested refunds but never even talk to a real person because the app makes you do a text chat with an automated response. I‚Äôm not sure why anyone even pays for Prime anymore. Very disappointed.

title: Screen orientation needs to be like it was. Landscape
review: Please change back to like it was before. I could use my iPad without a problem then. My shopper was good then. NOW I don‚Äôt care to even try to shop here.

title: No way to report iPad app errors
review: The latest iPad app update creates a white bar covering the bottom third of the screen. Also the view keeps reverting to portrait. There is no way on the app to report this. While I‚Äôm here I should also mention there is no way to share a link which seems like a glaring omission for a shopping app.

title: Error messages
review: Keep getting error messages when trying to go to my account last update has major bug please fix asap

title: Please clearly instantly show where product was made
review: Please clearly instantly show where product was made. So we can check quality indicatir, if made in China we like to avoid.

title: Overall great except one thing
review: I would greatly prefer the app if I could go into the settings and use a dark mode it strains my eyes and for me personally and probably others it‚Äôs much easier to look at white text on a black background

title: Notifications Issue
review: I was really happy with the app, until the phone notifications stopped working . I have them all turned on, so I can get them on my phone and it hasn‚Äôt worked since end of July . I don‚Äôt know if an update messed it up . I called customer service and they told me to install and uninstall the app and still nothing. . Very disappointed.

title: Prime me!
review: Our daughter and son in law gave us prime membership for a gift one year because I was constantly asking her to buy and send me things.  I hope it continues forever.  Such a lifesaver during the pandemic and ever after!

title: PLEASE READ!!!!
review:
This is a terrible app: Not only does it dump 100,000 products in a landfill in the UK EVERY WEEK !!!! But it is so used that every one is online and not buying better and more local things. I would highly recommend that you try to shop more local and try to buy recyclable and ECO friendly products. If we don‚Äôt act fast we are doomed!!!! Do your part help the earth: shop more ECO friendly, reduse,reuse,recycle,and thrift. 
PLEASE try to shop LOCAL !!!!
This is very important

title: App has issues while searching
review: I‚Äôm on the app, searching for some decorations, when I tap on item I would like to see, it goes back to home page. I have tried three times and each time tapping on different items, it again went to the home page each time, not the item. Please fix this, and yes, I‚Äôm up to date on updates for your app.

title: Amazing
review: I love having the convenience of shopping online and you can‚Äôt beat the timeliness either. Most orders arrive in 2-3 days all without the hassle of driving to the mall, finding a parking space and long lines!

title: Similar to the website, only worse
review: Basically it‚Äôs a version of the web app with some key functions missing and many basic browser features (like refresh) don‚Äôt exist which is a problem because the app doesn‚Äôt update its when info is updated and you follow a breadcrumb back. You might as well just use a browser.

title: Free shipping means free shipping.
review: Sick and tired of canceling my order because free shipping isn‚Äôt selected first. Last time I stayed off of here for months. Think I‚Äôm going back to Walmart for now. It‚Äôs not even the charge or the inconvenience... it‚Äôs the fact that you offer free shipping then try to slip in shipping anyways, it‚Äôs deceitful if you ask me. But of course corporations always have a way to explain why they screw people over. Save the excuses for someone dumb enough to believe them.

title: New view dizzying
review:
Used to love this app. Still do, but... the brand new view where you can only keep scrolling on your phone and see one vertical column of images one by one is absolutely dizzying. 

I liked the old view where you could see rows of images and items side by side more. Please bring back the old view, or give the ability to change view so instead of column / list it's collage of products / images

title: Is 5 stars good for what it stand for?
review:
Consistently excellent delivery to me and when I was traveling was awesome unexpected perk.
This gave me more time to bond with my family
( water-colour brushes for my son) without hunting various shops during Mardi Gras,  which was basically out of question.

title: Easy, fast, convenient but expensive
review: I like this app. I wish they could have some better prices. But sometimes we have to pay extra for the convenience of order online with out leaving the house.

title: Almost perfect
review: The app does everything I need, which is great, but when I‚Äôm listening to music it messes with the audio because of the listening feature for Alexa. I tried to turn off microphone permissions to see if it would help and it didn‚Äôt.

title: Everything! Now!
review: I can stay safely at home in these jeopardized times,  enter a desired item on my phone app and receive it at my door quickly. Near instant gratification while much else in these days is fraught. Nice relief

title: So much lag!!
review: They used to have such a great app and now that they keep adding and updating their app lags so much. I go to buy something and it won‚Äôt load so I get frustrated and turn around to buy it somewhere else, even if that means paying for shipping. It is so annoying to sit there and wait for it ALL the time. I‚Äôm about to cancel my prime membership, no point if I can‚Äôt use it.

title: Customer service
review: Poor customer service, I told them my items never got to me and they said sorry for the inconvenience and I should order the items again.

title: Stopped showing multiple prices
review: The app suddenly stopped giving me multiple sellers and prices to choose from and just lists the prime option for items.  Occasionally it will show one other used condition option and say ‚Äúsave by buying used‚Äù and give a price saying it has free shipping, then as soon as I get to checkout it charges me the full shipping rate anyways.  Is this a broken feature of the app or an intentional scam?

title: Subscribe and Save
review: Good service.  I would like the subscribe and save to send out a product immediately instead of shipping it out a month later.  Usually if I am on the site ordering something, I need it now in addition to 2 or 6 months later.

title: Whole Foods section is broken
review: On an IPAD the Whole Foods portion of the application does not work. A simple selection and search for ‚Äúeggs ‚Äú, returns item not found. This is common for a number of items that are actually available. There are other bugs with looking at your cart or searching for other items. Makes it useless for Whole Foods shopping. These issues do not exist for using the application on an iPhone.

title: Good stuff if you look closely
review: I found this great quality tapestry for my room but people give it low starts because they don‚Äôt look at the reviews if you look at them you‚Äôll know if they are good or bad.

title: Uhm where‚Äôs my money
review: I canceled an order that I made that consisted of a keyboard and a mouse but I then canceled it because I wanted to see if there was a better price when I saw that there wasn‚Äôt I ordered it again but now it‚Äôs saying that I don‚Äôt have the funds for it! Keeps in mind I had the funds before canceling the order! So where is my money?! I‚Äôd like to have my money back or my package at my door the time it says! Which would be tomorrow (January 28) by 10 pm!!!

title: Gross misuse of authority
review: Taking Parler off your servers just to infringe on our right of Free speech is despicable and I will never use your company again for absolutely anything....I‚Äôm calling all Americans to do the same! An absolute disgrace to think you‚Äôre so big that no one can touch you.... just remember, the American people are the ones that use your service and buy millions and millions of products from you ... it wasn‚Äôt smart to make moves against us.

title: Customer service
review: I had ordered a item that never showed up contact customer service and with in 5 minutes they had a new one one the way. Best customer service I‚Äôve ever had.

title: I‚Äôm going to keep contacting you.
review: It‚Äôs honestly so ridiculous that they can‚Äôt remove MY card from an account that‚Äôs using it for prime (like I don‚Äôt know who has it). They say the reason why I can‚Äôt take my card off that account is because I don‚Äôt have the account information so they can‚Äôt do anything. SO what I have to do from now on is contact them so they can give me my money back because I‚Äôm fed up. Like that‚Äôs such a dumb reason ITS MY CARD NOT THE OTHER PERSONS!!!!

title: Just stop changing it so often
review: App is perfection and they keep messing with something that‚Äôs not broken. The changes are too soon. They changed where you go to find orders and before everyone could even get used to that they changed the scaling too. Like just stop it was fine as it was.

title: Problems with ipad
review: This app works fine with my iPhone 11, however it is not really usable now with my iPad. I can search, but anytime I look at an item it doesn't respond to anything else. I have tried multiple ways to fix, but it keeps happening. I looked for a way to contact the developers, but it only seems to bring you to the app's help area and has nothing related to reporting bugs, so I left a review instead.

title: Complaint
review:
For months now I have tried to get my info changed to English it‚Äôs in Spanish and I do not have any idea what it says I have called and talked to a fox people that don‚Äôt have a clue how to fix it in my settings it says English snd the United States I have to be careful what I order because there‚Äôs no way I can understand Spanish it‚Äôs very difficult 
I wish someone can fix it I would think customer service would be very inmportsnt to you

title: Need more filters
review: This app makes it easy to shop but I wish they‚Äôre were features to sort better like having a size query if you search for shoes. Sometimes it shows up, other times it doesn‚Äôt. It would just make things easier instead of searching through every item that comes up.

title: Prices
review: Since the corona amazons prices are rediculously high, me and my family have been dedicated customers for years, but now we question the companies integrity.  At a time like this companies like you should be thoughtful to your customers and show them your appreciation by at least keeping the prices as they were.  Shame on you, very disappointed.  I paid $35 for 2 cans of Lysol disinfectant, absolutely ridiculous you guys are a bunch of crooks, no different than the corrupt democrats!

title: Why just wrap your website?
review: This change that happened in the couple of weeks is awful.  It used to be native iOS app with good interface, flick of a finger through pictures etc.  Now it is like the old failed html 5 wrapped app.  Come on, a trillion $ market cap does not give you enough to maintain the experience?  Give me a break.  It frustrates me to the point that I give up shopping before I make my decision.  It takes twice as long to navigate through and decide what I want.

title: Ease of searching
review: Extremely easy to search and even looking for specific items and details it provides exactly what I might be searching for

title: Update
review: The new update has made it very slow.  Takes forever to load and Alf the time products show up as discombobulated words with no picture.....  disappointing

title: Unable to make purchases on iPad
review: After the iPhone app was updated, the iPad app no longer works. I am no longer able to make selections for items that require choices of size or color and cannot add them to my cart or browse.  Additionally, the sort features do not work instead of sorting, they eliminate the majority of items.  The filters also do not work properly.  Putting in a broad search term will often eliminate the ability to use a needed filter.

title: iPad use extremely frustrating.
review: Use on an iPad is almost impossible.  Cannot see multiple colors of an item.  Cannot get items to display with prices.  Not much interest in purchasing here at all even though I have purchased thousands of things for my employer through the site by computer at work in the past.  I‚Äôd like to shop from my ipad at home and it‚Äôs just not convenient or enjoyable when it‚Äôs not showing what I want to look at.

title: Bring back old app!
review: Terrible changes to new app. Hard to navigate and turn on prime activation button. Don‚Äôt like the cart at bottom. Makes me frustrated and wanting to shop Walmart instead!

title: Hate the new app
review: Hate the new app look and feel. Not very user friendly and very childish cartoony look. I also have issues with ordering. Nothing shows up correctly and is all over the place.  It‚Äôs horrible!!! Put it back the way it was!

title: This used to be better
review: The search option and filter just don‚Äôt work very well.  I search for ASICS running shoe and I get every brand available.  I try to narrow the results and I either get only ASICS clothing or every brand EXCEPT ASICS! Really?! And why in the world does the filter option bounce you back to the search list after every single selection?  What if I need to narrow the results by department, gender, and rating? That‚Äôs a lot more work than it used to be.  It‚Äôs easier on google shop now.

title: Love it!
review: I am a frequent shopper and I absolutely love it. I‚Äôm not sure about others but shipping for me is very fast, always gets here on time, and if I need help they always provide it. I never had a problem with them. So I have to say I really love it!!

title: Dumb designer
review: It‚Äôs so dumb, the 2 most used applications is no where to be found!  Like messages and smile.  You literally have to go through portals to find it!  Like hello?  I‚Äôve missed messages for weeks and months because the app didn‚Äôt show any message notifications.  Only until I logged via website. When I want to change my donation, I went through every area to find out it was in set up?  What a big company with cheap stupid app designers!  Must be cheaper to hire monkeys?

title: The unavailable items üòëüòë
review: It used to be that the app would only show me what I could buy, but the last month or so 90% of what shows up on my results page are ‚Äúunavailable‚Äù. A few here and there is fine but when I‚Äôm trying to find storage furniture and other items for our new house and I have to scroll through 3 pages of unavailable to find 1 buyable piece it‚Äôs EXTREMELY frustrating.

title: Return
review: I had a problem with my order, I doubled order by mistake , called customer service they manage to take care of it immediately , thank you, Also Ester called to make sure my order is to be refunded took care of me immediately, so 5 stars to everyone .C. Ramuno

title: Last update screwed things up
review: I‚Äôve been using this app for the past 3 yrs and whatever happened with the last update, it screwed things up. When I hit the deals of the day section now, it‚Äôs stuck on the coupon section and won‚Äôt let me view  any of the deals of the day or the lightening deals on my iPad. Oh well, guess I can save some $$$ now.

title: Always asking for user and password
review:
Always asking for user and password and it's send a confirmation number via text every time a use the app this problem started after this update 
Please fix it...

title: The app was perfect..
review:
For whatever reason, they‚Äôve changed 2 things with this app that make it less user friendly. 

1. Each day, I have to type in my email address and password to use the app. Used to, I always stayed logged in. 

2. When browsing through product search results, there‚Äôs no longer a continuous scroll like there was in the past. So whenever you are looking through items, you now have to click to go to the next page for it to load more. It sounds like a silly complaint, but I didn‚Äôt realize just how convenient the continuous scroll was until they took it away. 

If the above could be fixed, the app would be great. I‚Äôm not sure why either would have been changed in the first place.

title: What happened!?!!
review: I have never had a problem with this app until the last update. Now everything i click on gives me the something went wrong dog photo! I can‚Äôt even order anything. It‚Äôs driving me nuts. I‚Äôve reinstalled and everything. Please fix this problem! I already ordered from another company because of this.

title: Continuously Having to Log In
review: Recently, I have been having to log in every time I open the app.  Checking the ‚Äústay logged in‚Äù box doesn‚Äôt prevent me from having to do this.  Because I‚Äôm using 2FA against my Google Authenticator generated passcode, this is becoming a great nuisance.  This has already prevented me from browsing products in the app several times, and consequently has resulted in you having lost at least a few sales.  Please correct this as soon as possible.

title: Change it back
review: When I 1st go the app, to get to the camera to scan bar codes was easy to use and quick to get price. Now you have to go around and around just to find the camera to scan bar codes. And now, what did you do to the filters? Go back to simple taps to retrieve your filters and the more you can narrow the search to, the better. I just tried to do so and it was ridiculously complex!

title: Terrible App
review: I only gave it 2 stars because when looking for a part for my car, the app told me when the part was compatible and when it was not.  Other then that, this app is terrible.  It rarely works correctly.  I always get the Uh-oh with a dog picture when I am searching and end up just going to the actual website.  It is suppose to be convenient, but it is actually more of an inconvenience.

title: Put the categories back please
review: I am on this app daily. Usually several times a day because I order stuff for my small business. You recently took away the ability to sort through the daily deals. I don‚Äôt have time to go through every single deal you have going. Please put the ability to sort through each category or department back so that it can be more efficient.

title: Crappy customer service
review: My account was suspended the first time I tried to use it to purchase something for over a year for no reason. Then I asked customer sercie why and they told me I would have a to wait another 24 hours to hear anything back. 2 days later and still have heard nothing, not even a email saying it will take longer, no nothing. Then I ask a different person and he talked like a robot repeating the excact same thing over and over.

title: Download!
review: All the other reviews saying this app I bad are bull! I so far haven‚Äôt been disappointed once! It always has what I‚Äôm looking for for very cheap prices. They are also very family-friendly and everything always comes in good condition.

title: Frustrating
review: You guys need to make it much easier to purchase an audible book from audible. The fact that I can view the books on your site but it takes quite a bit of effort to actually purchase the book from your site is extremely frustrating. I should be able to go to Audible, find a book and order a book off from that app. Help me out here

title: Never had a problem!
review: Ordering is quick and easy. When I‚Äôm on the go and know what I need to order quick, I just open the app and it‚Äôs done. A bit annoying browsing for things but that‚Äôs iOS and not the app.

title: New Fucntion
review: Anyway you guys can work towards making a function that you can swipe an item to the left and right with shortcuts to saving to list or putting in cart. Something similar to Spotify‚Äôs function to save to library or queuing a song. Would be beneficial for you and you and customers

title: View list button is messed
review: There seems to be a glitch or bug with the lists on mobile because once I click on view list and pick one I can‚Äôt click on it again for a while. That forces me to use the tray and change list and then click view list from there which is tedious and annoying.

title: Auto play adverts stop my music/podcasts...
review: This new feature introduced with the video adverts, is very annoying. I listen to audiobooks/podcasts very often, and when I scroll past one of these ads it stops my program, forcing me to go back to the app to start it again. First world problem, I know, but it would be great if it could be fixed.

title: Feels super dated on iPad
review: App feels super dated on iPad which I guess isn‚Äôt that big a deal for a shopping app. It‚Äôs functional- but what really bothers me is that you can‚Äôt see pictures customers upload as part of their review. This pictures are more influential to my buying decision than the product photos. I‚Äôll be sticking with the webpage until this feature is added to the app.

title: iPhone X Incompatibility
review: The app works for most tasks on the new iPhone. But, when reading reviews within users pictures, the app malfunctions. It shows just the picture! I can‚Äôt see the review. It just has a black bar with no option to read the review that goes with the picture like I used to be able to do on my old phone! Very irritating...

title: Needs to be fixed
review: I can't place orders from the app.  I saw another review with the same problem, that when you hit 'proceed to checkout' it asks which address to ship to and you can't get past that!  It just slams you right back to the cart!  I have to go to my browser to actually order!  And the Touch ID always has an error!  The current version of the app is just a mess!  I will say that for the most part it works like it should, but just not the important parts!

title: Missed a lot of black Friday deals because of glitch
review: Every time I log in it tells me to enter my password, after doing so it tells me: "an error has occurred....please try again". After multiple attempts it keeps giving the error. Deleted the app twice and reinstalled and it still refuses to keep me logged in so I can make a purchase. Had to wait until evening to use a computer to shop and missed a bunch of deals I was looking forward to. Please fix this asap.

title: Same annoying glitch
review: This app consistently has the same problem: No matter how many times I put in my password, it says ‚ÄúSomething went wrong. Please try again.‚Äù It‚Äôs not like it doesn‚Äôt recognize me‚Äî it knows who I am, what‚Äôs in my cart, etc, but whenever I try to proceed with buying anything, it sends me in an endless loop of logging in, to no success. I‚Äôve tried changing my password, un- and re-installing, and all the other troubleshooting fixes. It‚Äôs just a bad app, plain and simple.

title: Amazing
review: I am stupid and at 3am I buy the most random crap I don‚Äôt need but it brings so much joy when I I wait and then find it sorry if anything is missspelled I a can not see what I am spelling because my phone is glitching

title: I CAN‚ÄôT CANCEL MY DELIVERY THAT IS NOT SHIPPED YET!
review: So, I needed a gift for my sis for thanksgiving. I ordered it NOVEMBER 6!!! It told that the package is expected at November 18 but it was a lie, than it told me that the delivery is gonna be DECEMBER 5!! Like it‚Äôs a whole month, and when I tried to cancel my delivery IT LITERALLY DIDN‚ÄôT LET ME!! Of course I texted costumer service and customer service assistant, he didn‚Äôt careüëéüèª I texted then again, this one tried to help but it didn‚Äôt work though. So I just wanna cancel my order, please help me

title: Won‚Äôt work as of Black Friday
review: As soon as Black Friday came around, I went online to look for a few things, when the ‚ÄúNo internet connection ‚Äú came about. Doesn‚Äôt matter I have strong wifi and data, doesn‚Äôt matter that I restarted the phone and reinstalled the app. It doesn‚Äôt work in the browser as well. Waste of money as a prime user. Good app otherwise, even if pricing has gone from a deal to a convenience.

title: Update with videos
review: Products now have videos that automatically play as you scroll past them. Highly suggest during the next update making this an optional setting. Super annoying to be trying to watch something while scrolling and it pauses every time you scroll past something with a video.

title: Won‚Äôt allow me to ask a question
review:
When trying to ask a question about a product it ask me for a password or fingerprint ID but when I do give a password or fingerprint it just cycles back to the same place. 
App glitch needs to be fixed so I can ask a question.

title: Great app but a problem
review: This app is great but a problem with ordering.  I always needed to revise my payment method and I don‚Äôt know if the Visa Gift Card is supposed to put the name on the card saying ‚Äúa gift for you‚Äù or just Put the persons name. My shipping took so long that I canceled 4 orders for my mini 12 case and there is a bit of like a glitch.

title: Blank screen
review: When I click on an item it takes me to a blank white screen. I have to go back and re click the item to work. While on that item I scroll down and click on other items same issues. Been happening for months now.

title: Average
review: Good app just one problem whenever I type a certain thing it doesn‚Äôt show what I want all ways for example I type red rolling backpack and it shows non rolling backpacks that don‚Äôt even have an option to come in red otherwise good app

title: Feedback
review:
I would like to start off by saying I have never had
trouble with the app, hence the 5 star rating. The
driver on the other hand was horrible! I watched
him throw a water bottle of pee out of his window
into my yard. I asked him to pick it up and he was
kind enough to do so. As he was driving down my
road he threw it out again in my yard again! I tired
contacting customer service about the issue but
got "cut off" all four times. You might have better
luck becoming a target member.

title: Reliable, Affordable, Easy to Use
review: I live in a small town in Oregon with limited shopping. I‚Äôm very happy with the products, the quality, and delivery.   If there have been problems it is promptly fixed.

title: Shopping easy
review: Shopping from home sitting watching TV , navigate relaxing click the button and a day or two I got everything on my door . Can‚Äôt be easierüëèüòä

title: Surprised
review: I have never had a problem returning items or with the items and I have been using them for many years.  Keep up the great customer service.

title: Inflation/shipping methods
review: Products that I purchase monthly for my health such as the Sun Warrior Brand collagen builder, which I take for anemia, the price keeps going up and up, and the they ship it to you in a flimsy bag so the container gets all banged up, but no one listens to my complaints about this issue. Or when I leave something in my cart and come back the next day to find that it‚Äôs increased by $9 or $10!

title: Review for app itself not service
review: The app itself goes to a blank white screen so often now on my iPhone 11 Pro. I work a lot of hours and it‚Äôs so convenient yet ordering lately has been such a pain because I have to back out of the section that I‚Äôm in because it goes blank. Please fix this.

title: My account
review: Changing phones and number on account is awfully tough.  I forgot an item and was able to order it with out paying for shipping still.

title: Blank Pages and Poor Navigation
review: Pages often go blank mid-search or scroll and it‚Äôs very difficult to switch between wish lists. A recent upgrade fixed that problem and within a few weeks it‚Äôs gone. title: Product availability
review: Really like being able  to look and order items and compare

title: What are you thinking and who are you hiring

If you didn‚Äôt, you‚Äôre hiding it well and offer no updated help to locate it.  Please plan accordingly when changing programming and gui.  Give your customers some heads up.

title: Absolutely love

title: Electric fry pans
review: I purchased a Moss and Stone electric fry pan and should have returned it.  The heating  mechanism requires continues pressure for the pan to heat up.  Do you test these thing?  I wouldn‚Äôt buy another pan from you.  This is the 3rd one, but the others had problems also.

review: I have been customer forever. Always satisfied with product, price and customer service. Never have I been disappointed

title: Delivery status
review: When I signed up for prime a few years back the delivery service of bought items was great! Now it is terrible, I ask why am I paying for prime membership when it takes a week or more to get things ordered!

title: Delivery
review: I have had a few problems receiving my orders. When Amazon‚Äôs themselves deliver no problem. If they use other carriers like UPS or Fedex they seem to have problems delivering to the woods. The is mail carriers no problem. Would be nice if all merchants would use these carriers only.

My family was impressed originally with the speed of items arriving but the prime benefits no longer apply to most orders.  Really sad this company has gotten so large they don‚Äôt care about their customers anymore

title: It‚Äôs been locked
review: I got locked out of my account for some suspicious activity when all i was doing was checking when my packages were going to arrive. I have never had this problem until recently. My packages have also been moved back multiple times this is crazy.

title: Crashes and keeps crashing
review:
Keeps crashing when I select continue shopping. Since the last update not working 
As good as before on iPhone iOS.

title: Nowhere to contact this company -

review: Don't know why but recently, some buttons do not work. For example, editing/removing address buttons have no response at all. I do not think it is my network connection issue because this happened on certain buttons on some pages but not others. Please DEBUG ASAP!!

review:

I suspect the issue is the app doesn‚Äôt like my vpn, but that‚Äôs not my vpn‚Äôs fault, it‚Äôs the apps fault.  Other apps work perfectly fine with the vpn.  And I‚Äôm not giving my vpn up just to use this crashy app.

Doesn‚Äôt matter if I have a strong or weak signal, outdated or updated version, it‚Äôs always ‚Äòstill loading.‚Äô   Nor is it like the company lacks resources to find a fix.

Mom aka Santa

title: Internet Issue in App?
review: I‚Äôve used this app forever and all of a sudden it no longer works after the last update. every time i attempt to do something it gives me a internet connection error and I have everything connected, Am even running on the data not the WiFi and still doesn‚Äôt work. Totally frustrating!

title: Merchandise return process
review: #NAME?

It will never come in the time frame quoted either. I live in Monterey, CA not out in the middle of Montana. There should be no reason why my packages cannot arrive at the quoted time. You‚Äôre better off ordering your products from their actual home site. This company is a joke and a complete rip off.

title: Checkout Bug
review:
For the past six months I haven't been able to checkout using the app. It repeats screens several times and then will kick me back a step. It is very frustrating. 

I updated the app and I'm constantly checking the App Store for updates for this app in particular to see if it will get fixed. 

I guess it's saved some money on impulse buys, but I miss the convenience of being able to order things on my phone/not having to boot up the computer.

review: Just in time for  the holiday season, I have been unable to use the app to checkout for the past month or so. I can add items to my cart, but checkout no longer recognizes my Touch ID and won‚Äôt ask for my password, just shuts down. I then have to log in on the website and checkout from there. No update in sight!  Big inconvenience.

title: Updates are making app worse
review:
Thanks to the most recent update, when you try to add to cart or checkout, you're given a error message, "sorry, something went wrong," and nothing happens. 

Similarly, thanks to the update, you can find yourself stuck in checkout purgatory.  Clicking "place your order" will revert your screen to "proceed to checkout."

Fix these bugs that didn't previously exist.

title: PLEASE WORK ON IT
review:
I love the expedited, 2-day shipping with Prime!

However, sometimes I purchased international items that took 6+ weeks to arrive‚Ä¶if I‚Äôm lucky. 
My item was listed as Prime so I didn‚Äôt think twice about it.
Please do not list items as Prime when the company cannot get it to the customer within the 2 day delivery time. Shipping in 2 days does not count!
Also, no way to cancel the order, even immediately, when it is shipping internationally. 
I understand that you do business on an international level but, be transparent about DELIVERY TIME, please. Much appreciated!

title: Complicated

title: The app is crap
review: Over the last few months the app will no longer keep me signed in, loses chat and lags. I have everything updated and all other apps work fine. I want to be able to browse products easily. This is just annoying.

title: Recent Update is Horrible

title: Bad interface changes
review: The latest release of the app has introduced some terrible interface changes. For example, the filter is no longer useful. It‚Äôs slow, unresponsive, and no longer has the choices that it used to. Please revert the interface changes to the previous, useful version of the app.

title: BAD

title: Screen rotation bug in latest updates
review:
Last two updates have a bug that keeps displaying in portrait mode even though my iPad is in landscape mode. To replicate this:
1. Turn iPad to landscape view
2. Go to any item in the store that has user photos in the reviews
3. Tap on a photo to view it
4. Tap the close button
After the photo closes, the screen will automatically rotate to display in portrait mode. Now, you have to rotate your iPad to portrait mode and back to landscape mode to rotate the screen again. Hopefully the developers will see this and fix it.

title: Sponsored ads

Recently moved and have been looking online for rugs, couches, etc. Everytime I search for something for example:  ‚Äúchunky knit rug‚Äù it pulls up some random sponsored rug that is nothing like what I‚Äôm looking for, then right after that it will be a chunky knit blanket. title: Xmas items

title: So Slow & Never Loads

title: Absolutely perfect

title: still crashing- why is update taking so long?

Notifications settings are also buggy, they save for the session but once it's closed (that's why I'm prompted to login again) they are removed so In not being notified when my products are delivered

DS

Thank you.

title: AWESOME

What is a pain is how the app devours device resources: navigating items on the app will result in app slowness and eventually crash or waste the device‚Äôs battery by 1% every half a minute, which is awful and similar to watching a video or worse.

So two stars... it‚Äôs functional but not fully, a short way to put it.

So I check and it saids it‚Äôs been delivered so I look in the garage, and everyone‚Äôs rooms in the house to see if it‚Äôs there, and everyone said no package has came, so now I‚Äôm waiting for this dumb seller to contact me back.

title: Wait time is longer
review: Lately it has been taking a long time for my items to be delivered.. past the estimated day. I look forward to having prime for the 2 day delivery, but lately it‚Äôs been taking a week.

title: Poor customer service
review: For a company that promotes their customer service, I have sadly not encountered someone to provide that. I had a basic order request and was told that they do not do price adjustments under exception. That maybe I‚Äôll get an adjustment on their end at their own discretion. Instead, I will have to cancel my initial order (return it) and order the exact same thing again. That is not what I call good customer service!!

title: One trick pony
review:
Who would design an app that takes you back to Page One of your product list if you're stupid enough to click to view a product and expect to be able to return to your list?

Surely you can do better than this.

Day better LED light is my favorite item in the whole store because I really need LED light in my room. HIGHLY RECOMMEND DOWNLOADED THIS APP, AND BUYING THE ITEM!

title: New update is HORRIBLE
review: The newest update is horrible. The menu bar at the bottom incredibly inconvenient and annoying. I cannot scroll now without accidentally hitting it. Please remove and re-update! Also- please show all lists. It‚Äôs annoying to find and open my baby registry- way too many clicks needed.

title: Your app is worthless.
review: I have been trying to find a contact number to get a general question answered for twenty minutes without success.  Ridiculous!!!!

title: Needs copy/paste tracking

title: Cancel my order without me knowing
review: I ordered a pair of gaming headphones everything was fine until the day it was supposed to arrive I checked the app just to find out that the order cancelled it self without me knowing so I go back to buy it again just to see the price was raised to $129 dollars this app really gets on my nerves when it does stuff like this would give it 0 stars

title: Why?
review: This is probably not that serious, but why would you change ‚Äúmy orders‚Äù? Before it made sense, things that hadn‚Äôt arrived and things that were delivered were separated. Now they are all in one big list, doesn‚Äôt show if it was shipped unless you go to the product, and it‚Äôs a big mess. Also, it looks awful.

title: Fix filtering options
review: Need to fix the app filtering options screen.  As soon as you tap anything it immediately searches. App needs to wait until I'm done setting all the filters and search only when we click on Done.  Otherwise it's a pain in the  __ to repeatedly go back into search options for every type of filter setting

title: Hello
review: First time I use the app and it turns out that it tells me that something went wrong in the form of payment and everything is correct, after I put it on, it tells me that everything went right, I leave the app and not even half an hour later I go back in  and I look again at the same thing that the order is not because something is not right in my payment method and Yes, if it is correct

title: Unable to post questions/reviews

title: It won‚Äôt even let me buy stuff

I would ask for a refund but like I mentioned earlier it won‚Äôt let me buy stuff. Like stuff I want and would pay money for. Love the app though very user friendly.

title: Didn‚Äôt receive what I paid for
review:
I ordered 3 boxesof cavilon colostomy wipes. There were supposed to be 30 individual wipes per box. One of the boxes only contained 8 wipes in the box instead of the 30 wipes I ordered. I contacted customer service but didn‚Äôt receive a reply. I feel I should be sent a new box of Cavilon wipes with the correct amount.
Another time I received the Cavilon wipes in baggies. Very poor service for such an expensive item. 

One star given for this service.

title: Awesome
review: I‚Äôm new to online shopping and have ordered two things so far. One arrived on time the other day and the other just arrived a few hours ago on time. I like how it tracks the full process. Reliable

review:
Love the app. Best shopping app I‚Äôve used. One thing that seems to be missing is somehow having multiple products opened at the same time. Kinda like multitasking or having several tabs in a browser. 

Anything like that possible?

title: Hate the update
review: The new update makes searching IMPOSSIBLE. Trying to filter your results you have to keep going back to the filter screen after each selection because it automatically takes you to the search page. Next and previous button I find unnecessary just let me scroll through all my results. Ugh.....

I have no idea why they would change the app format so much and I really hope they revert back to what it was before.

Nor do we want to have to click the back button to have to go back to find the products we were interested in. I get creating room for ads but please bring the continuous scrolling back. It was way more convenient.

title: What is wrong with this app?!?
review: For being the second richest man in the world, I would think Jeff would be able to stay on top of technology and keep the foundational piece of his company from crashing EVERY DAY!!! I don‚Äôt write reviews, but this most recent update is consistently giving me the ‚ÄúUh-Oh, something went wrong on our end‚Äù message! No kidding! Please fix, as I am discouraged to continue trying when it keeps crashing every time I use it. Thanks!

title: Wish list
review: Please bring back the wish list at the bottom of the page. I loved the feature when you could hold an item and it would save at the bottom! I definitely buy less stuff without it right on the main page

review:
Not sure why they would get rid of the drag and drop into the wish list feature, instead adding a heart you can tap. You also cannot tap and hold on an item in the wish list to select options such as remove, move to another list, etc. 

Now that I‚Äôve gotten used to those two features, they take it away and it‚Äôs super frustrating.

Nerd rant over.

title: I don‚Äôt like this update

title: Please Add a Feature to Nickname my Payment Options

title: App crashes every time

title: Deals

title: Horrible bug: won‚Äôt add shipping address
review: This app g‚Äùrefuses to allow you to enter a new shipping address. When you create the address it looks like it has succeeded, then it throws you all the way back out of the shopping cart to the order summary page. The new shipping address is not saved. I contacted customer support about this and they argued with me about it. I uninstall/reinstall did nothing to fix the problem. Very frustrating when traveling.

title: Shipping
review: The app overall with the product and the prices are decent. What I‚Äôm having an issues is if I order something and pay for the one day shipping and get a notification that it will be here guaranteed the next day... and then it‚Äôs not why did I pay 10 dollars then if you pay for 1 day and I does not show up the next day you should get your money back.

============================

Keeps going blank every time I try to view tracking/shipping updates. iPad version works fine though.

title: Please fix menu bar bug
review: When shopping around and navigating through various products, the top menu bar (back arrow, menu, search bar, checkout, etc.) occasionally becomes unresponsive. I‚Äôve found that the only way to fix this is to restart the app, which is really frustrating and causes me to lose where I was. review:
There needs to be a fix for the high background activity.  According to my battery, I‚Äôve used the app for 2 mins but had 15 mins background activity.  Even when I turn it off it still registers, so something is hanging when I suspend the app.

Please fix, I will be uninstalling until a fix is issued.

title: No App Ever

There‚Äôs a big white band across the bottom of the screen that blocks off a significant amount of what you need to see.  Roll it back.  I couldn‚Äôt order anything now if I wanted to.

title: Service is degrading

I don‚Äôt get anything in 2 days anymore, as it takes a long time. You have opened up your store to substandard retailers and some of the items I receive are junk.

Can we get fingerprint verification? or another form of authentication to secure opening the app rather than signing in/out each time? Since SO much of your personal info is in the app settings. Thanks so much!

title: Bug in new update doesn‚Äôt allow you to login.
review:
The most recent update will not allow you to sign in with two step verification.  When the password is sent it either brings you back to the first login screen with your login or gives you a server error page. 

This is especially frustrating since this issue doesn‚Äôt occur until after you have filled your cart.

title: Keep me signed in!
review: It seems that this version is signing me out, multiple times a day. I can also not tell when I open the app if I am signed in or not. This causes a loss of search history, any personal preferences and the inconvenience of having to log in. Most of the time, at the sign in page, my own email address is not populated. AMAZON-fix this! There is no reason why a ‚Äútech company‚Äù could not add Biometric identification to its own app.

title: It erased ever thing in my cart.
review: I have had this app for about 2 years and I had lots of things in my cart. I was using the app when all the items in my cart got erased. I don‚Äôt know what caused this, but I‚Äôm unhappy with the app.

title: Won‚Äôt synch with my account
review: This app is annoying. If I use my computer to make a purchase or put something in my cart, that information doesn‚Äôt appear in the app. Ditto when I purchase/select an item using the app. I have to ‚Äúsynch‚Äù manually (go into each basket and add/remove so their contents match). This seems to defeat the purpose of the app altogether. Fix it folks. This isn‚Äôt rocket science.

title: Why only 18 items per page?
review:
Today my app has started only displaying 18-20 items per page and then I have to click Next and wait for the page to load. I can‚Äôt find a setting to change this. 

Previously it was a continuous list of items. What happened?

title: Get rid of the next button
review: Good lord. Listen to your customers! The next button is horrible and makes shopping with you painful. Get rid of the next button!

title: Why is continuous scrolling feature gone?
review: Having to continuously click ‚Äúnext‚Äù after only seeing a few items from my search results is really frustrating. I end up just stopping after one or two times and look on other platforms because it‚Äôs so annoying. Without the continuous scrolling feature, the app rating goes from a 5 to a 1. Please bring it back.

title: Fix the glitch!!
review: There is absolutely NO need for there to be a ‚Äònext‚Äô button after every 15 or 20 items... this is ridiculous and annoying. Oh, and get rid of all the Chinese/Asian knockoff garbage that has to be filtered through when one is trying to find quality products sourced from companies who have standards.

title: Latest update made the app worse

I haven‚Äôt seen anyone with the same problem as me, and it seems that restarting the app, the phone, and redownloading the app doesn‚Äôt work.

title: Can‚Äôt zoom in...will keep preferring Web
review: I don‚Äôt understand the need to have an App. Until Apps like this let users zoom in on a page, one of the main reasons to even use a mobile OS, I will continue to prefer a web browser so I can zoom in on an item quickly. title: Faster delivery with Prime Now app
